line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;<i>&nbsp; Brahm\u0101 disguised himself as a renounciate\nand ventured to this hermitage just before sunset, where the two engaged in\nphilosophical debate. Niyam\u0101nanda, being victorious, then offered the guest\nsome refreshments, but he refused, as the sun had set and it would be against\nthe rules of the renounciates. Niyam\u0101nanda had to make sure the renounciate\nate, otherwise the rules of receiving a guest would be broken. The enlightened\nNiyam\u0101nanda projected some of the effulgence of his being over the neem trees\nand the renounciate agreed to accept the refreshment. Thereafter, Brahm\u0101\nrevealed himself and blessed him on his knowledge of the Supreme, and gave him\na new name \u2013 Nimb\u0101rka, the one who has placed the Sun in the midst of the Neem\ntrees</i>. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">&nbsp;\"Pure in her course from the mountains to\nthe ocean, alone of streams Sarasvati hath listened.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7012835143634971506\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/11388041003733694108\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">nobeatingroundthebush</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_29.html?showComment=1464499383562#c7012835143634971506\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">May 29, 2016 at 10:53 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain....<br />\n<br />\nIn ur own lingo....<br />\n<br />\nFor the crooked white man who is still the policeman on earth......<br />\n<br />\nYeh Le....<br />\n<br />\nIndus era 8,000 years old, not 5,500<br />\n_______________________________________<br />\n<br />\nKOLKATA: It may be time to rewrite history textbooks. Scientists from IIT-Kharagpur and Archaeological Survey of India (ASI) have uncovered evidence that the Indus Valley Civilization is at least 8,000 years old, and not 5,500 years old, taking root well before the Egyptian (7000BC to 3000BC) and Mesopotamian (6500BC to 3100BC) civilizations. What's more, the researchers have found evidence of a pre-Harappan civilization that existed for at least 1,000 years before this.<br />\n<br />\nThe researchers believe that the Indus Valley Civilization spread over a vast expanse of India \u2014 stretching to the banks of the now \"lost\" Saraswati river or the Ghaggar-Hakra river - but this has not been studied enough because what we know so far is based on British excavations. \"At the excavation sites, we saw preservation of all cultural levels right from the pre-Indus Valley Civilization phase (9000-8000 BC) through what we have categorised as Early Harappan (8000-7000BC) to the Mature Harappan times,\" said Sarkar.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe discovery, published in the prestigious 'Nature' journal on May 25, may force a global rethink on the timelines of the so-called 'cradles of civilization'. The scientists believe they also know why the civilization ended about 3,000 years ago \u2014 climate change.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.xossip.com/showthread.php?t=1436529</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_1BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word yoga is\nderived from the root yuj, which means to unite or to join together. &nbsp;&nbsp;The practice of yoga leads to the union of\nthe human with the divine - all within the self. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aim of yoga is the transformation of human\nbeings from their natural form to a perfected form. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogic practices\noriginated in the primordial depths of India's past. &nbsp;The inner attitudes and disciplines were given\norderly expression by Patanjali.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the mind is calm it can reflect\nobjective reality without its own subjective distortions.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JZPQVVqWG7E/V0vXfjb7o0I/AAAAAAABJPM/XJnV_fnPEQI5vWGiMWcmhQvsa7GNU1S2wCLcB/s1600/imaeeee3ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JZPQVVqWG7E/V0vXfjb7o0I/AAAAAAABJPM/XJnV_fnPEQI5vWGiMWcmhQvsa7GNU1S2wCLcB/s400/imaeeee3ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga does not create\nthis reality, which is above the mind, but only prepares the mind to apprehend\nit, by assisting in the transformation of the mind \u2013 from an ordinary mind full\nof chatter to a serene &nbsp;mind.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9UexjZXGImc/V0va5DEsYFI/AAAAAAABJPs/lw1VrbIxsucm8jMwe4-v_BdAiSzHhHDzACLcB/s1600/524053_23859213ff9614358_475448_n.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9UexjZXGImc/V0va5DEsYFI/AAAAAAABJPs/lw1VrbIxsucm8jMwe4-v_BdAiSzHhHDzACLcB/s640/524053_23859213ff9614358_475448_n.jpeg\" width=\"564\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga is an integral\npart of Sanatana Dharma.&nbsp; There is no\nYoga without Hinduism and no Hinduism without Yoga. For thousands of years yoga\nhas been part of the Hindu psyche , and it helped the Hindu towards higher\nspiritual achievements. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-nuDZayGqrMs/V0vbIOxFeUI/AAAAAAABJP0/PuQUpCh1twUNK3k6hI69Hg03xYG8xTTUwCLcB/s1600/subconscffious-mind2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"434\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-nuDZayGqrMs/V0vbIOxFeUI/AAAAAAABJP0/PuQUpCh1twUNK3k6hI69Hg03xYG8xTTUwCLcB/s640/subconscffious-mind2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga Philosophy is\npeculiar to the Hindus, and no trace of it is found in any other nation,\nancient or modern. &nbsp;It was the fruit of\nthe highest intellectual and spiritual development . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our ancient Maharishis with 12 strand DNA and\nking sized pineal glands were supermen.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ey0xkb82NXg/V0vaUjO_fDI/AAAAAAABJPk/3nJBVUuNdvMBcudWjDC-QQhAu-xJoTXjgCLcB/s1600/imftages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ey0xkb82NXg/V0vaUjO_fDI/AAAAAAABJPk/3nJBVUuNdvMBcudWjDC-QQhAu-xJoTXjgCLcB/s400/imftages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZT_MPLzU-aw/V0vY9icJwbI/AAAAAAABJPY/3zfF7TIkGl0Q7BqC-uOUDbfLFfZ_LSkRwCLcB/s1600/yoga-meditation-layers-rt5of-the-mind-6-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Living souls are\nprisoners<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>of the joys and woes of\nexistence<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>to liberate them from\nnature's magic<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>the knowledge of the\nbrahman is necessary.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>It is hard to acquire,\nthis knowledge,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>but it is the only\nboat,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>to carry one over the\nriver of Samsara<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>A thousand are the\npaths that lead there,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Yet it is one, in\ntruth,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">knowledge, the supreme\nrefuge!</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - <b>Yoga Upanishad</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SBH-9eynxtI/V0vZ8QaUBvI/AAAAAAABJPg/0i2kg2mV28E1gDJgpcMX_2K-C5QFfhgqwCLcB/s1600/doffwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SBH-9eynxtI/V0vZ8QaUBvI/AAAAAAABJPg/0i2kg2mV28E1gDJgpcMX_2K-C5QFfhgqwCLcB/s640/doffwnload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For thousands of years\nMaharishis made creative efforts to explore the higher dimensions of Existence\nand Consciousness for enrichment of human knowledge and personality.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole\nworld lifted from Indian philosophy without really understanding the depth.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Philosophy of Sanatana Dharma &nbsp;has been more than a sheer speculative quest,\nlinked as it is with a living, creative and illuminating discipline which is\nknown as Yoga. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZV77vYbVQV0/V0veb38VkhI/AAAAAAABJQQ/F1K2OsSxLPwG3HInmkqkMdUoSSUoAGFwgCLcB/s1600/downesload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZV77vYbVQV0/V0veb38VkhI/AAAAAAABJQQ/F1K2OsSxLPwG3HInmkqkMdUoSSUoAGFwgCLcB/s400/downesload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga is a unique\nscientific discipline that leads to inner transformation and a definite\npsychological state of conscious enlightenment. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DprAmvkUNLs/V0veqpsJIWI/AAAAAAABJQU/LHAC5iMVDuopHApPagZMPRjeAZGhi5BvACLcB/s1600/175ac67619fd5d94d7832d3ae3405a4968.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DprAmvkUNLs/V0veqpsJIWI/AAAAAAABJQU/LHAC5iMVDuopHApPagZMPRjeAZGhi5BvACLcB/s400/175ac67619fd5d94d7832d3ae3405a4968.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern\nscience has NOT yet understood the inner workings of Yoga with respect to the lymph fluids, vagus\nnerve and the amygdala. &nbsp; &nbsp;That is why they scoff when Yogis say we can cure homosexuality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Below: JOG ( yoga ) is the junction&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8Ch_rw-wNKY/V0veESsGwZI/AAAAAAABJQM/amgMIkbCpDw49PAdj2tfphSzP0U2SFt3ACLcB/s1600/wikiyoeega3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8Ch_rw-wNKY/V0veESsGwZI/AAAAAAABJQM/amgMIkbCpDw49PAdj2tfphSzP0U2SFt3ACLcB/s1600/wikiyoeega3.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga gives your high\nperception and intuition.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Divya\nChakshu is the divine prophetic eye, the power of seeing, what is not visible\nto the naked eye. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"To thee, I grant\nthe Eye Divine,<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Behold my Cosmic\nSplendor Line.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<b>&nbsp;&nbsp; - Bhagavad Gita xl.8. 4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ONSh4Msj5nA/V0viXy3I6fI/AAAAAAABJQw/5m51p-zIwV0TeZSgQ0Dpfj-KdoJ-Z0JKgCLcB/s1600/anilrekhesa-16-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"494\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ONSh4Msj5nA/V0viXy3I6fI/AAAAAAABJQw/5m51p-zIwV0TeZSgQ0Dpfj-KdoJ-Z0JKgCLcB/s640/anilrekhesa-16-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panini, the Sanskrit grammarian,\nexplains the meaning of yoga as union with the Supreme. Patanjali, in his Yoga\nSutra, defines yoga as 'cessation of all changes in consciousness.' <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-swwKGHR4ekM/V0vnA33odaI/AAAAAAABJRM/ZeOR-63ROpk--b4AG1MpI1bMSkqnLRrJACLcB/s1600/imaFFges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"249\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-swwKGHR4ekM/V0vnA33odaI/AAAAAAABJRM/ZeOR-63ROpk--b4AG1MpI1bMSkqnLRrJACLcB/s400/imaFFges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga makes you a better\nperson as it leads to to follow the laws of the universe. Is the science and\npraxis of obtaining liberation (moksha) from the material world. It not only\npoints the way to release, but offers a practical means of arriving there. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gPhKwpRlVYM/V0vh9NJIxoI/AAAAAAABJQo/-qIv-6UJSiod-lzqqyqXD9tep5YuVgQfwCLcB/s1600/1b6255ebf0babcd1daef7e15267ab54b9.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"574\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gPhKwpRlVYM/V0vh9NJIxoI/AAAAAAABJQo/-qIv-6UJSiod-lzqqyqXD9tep5YuVgQfwCLcB/s640/1b6255ebf0babcd1daef7e15267ab54b9.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga is a practical\npath to self-realization, a means of attaining enlightenment by purifying the\nentire being, so that the mind-body can experience the absolute reality\nunderlying the illusions of everyday life. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1033925368922980354\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_71M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_29.html?showComment=1464591852709#c3296586870237963243\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">May 30, 2016 at 12:34 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>I HAVE IMMORTALISED MODI -- BY INCLUDING THIS COMMENT IN THIS POST<br /><br />AFTER A MILLION YEARS PEOPLE WILL WONDER WHO THIS FELLOW MODI WAS .</b></span></div>\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga has been embraced\nby the whole world for its inherent goodness. Really nobody cared for the\nMullahs who keep bitching about yoga.&nbsp;\nThese bigots in green tinted glasses &nbsp;do NOT deserve yoga .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RO6Y-nqB3Pg/V0voK1ZIvFI/AAAAAAABJRc/DscW8nNOuG0hWxIQpZTFsDStki-Sv3g0gCLcB/s1600/imagdes.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If Zakir Naik has his\nway he would have declared A LL HULL BURR from Saudi Arabia invented Yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Yoga is known as\nthe disconnection (viyoga) of the connection (samyoga) with suffering.\" -\n<b>The Bhagavad Gita</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vBQ0ECVKWXA/V0vhf3hvAAI/AAAAAAABJQk/sF1g-hyfw5wtLoSTP0OcTiF6I3Ylli4EACLcB/s1600/Bhagavad-Gita-quote-ceenditioned-living-entities.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vBQ0ECVKWXA/V0vhf3hvAAI/AAAAAAABJQk/sF1g-hyfw5wtLoSTP0OcTiF6I3Ylli4EACLcB/s640/Bhagavad-Gita-quote-ceenditioned-living-entities.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"This they\nconsider Yoga: the steady holding of the senses.\" - Katha-Upanishad<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 7000 year old Upanishads\nthe term Yoga signifies the union of the personal soul with the soul of the\nuniverse ( brahmAn ) . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;One of the\nprincipal meanings of yoga is sangati - harmony. Joy of positive health depends\non harmony between all bodily and mental functions. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;True Yoga is in all things wise and calm.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Qg3NE-bwdvg/V0vmyu9mPJI/AAAAAAABJRI/H_TJX4STGs8Rm_T17V2zPPSkr4-a8t2ZwCLcB/s1600/10%2BUpaDDSnishads.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Qg3NE-bwdvg/V0vmyu9mPJI/AAAAAAABJRI/H_TJX4STGs8Rm_T17V2zPPSkr4-a8t2ZwCLcB/s640/10%2BUpaDDSnishads.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ordinarily a man is\nlost in his own confused thought and feeling, but when Yoga is attained the\npersonal consciousness becomes stilled 'like a lamp in a windless place' and it\nis then possible for the embodied spirit to know itself as apart from the\nmanifestations to which it is accustomed, and to become aware of its own\nnature. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is not only a good\nexercise technique to cure the ills of the body and to keep in good shape but\nit is also excellent for mental and spiritual health..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kriya yoga is a\nsystem consisting of yogic techniques that accelerate spiritual development and\nbring on a deep state of serenity and ultimately, communion with God and\nnature.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the yoga sutra of Patanjali, as long as the soul is attached to\nsense enjoyment, it is called pratyag-atma.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-O3bH84AZptc/V0vqbj75K2I/AAAAAAABJRo/AvmvXZBkFnIORg6CzDnQ_CIGMbchN3FYQCLcB/s1600/direcfftion.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-O3bH84AZptc/V0vqbj75K2I/AAAAAAABJRo/AvmvXZBkFnIORg6CzDnQ_CIGMbchN3FYQCLcB/s400/direcfftion.jpg\" width=\"297\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The traditional yoga\nlifestyle strives toward the goals of asceticism, which seeks to zero-out all\ndesires, attachments, emotions, and ego clinging. &nbsp;&nbsp;The goal of yoga is essentially to cause the\nmind to become like zero.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The goal of\nmeditation (the central feature of the yoga) is to zero-out thoughts, to\nzero-out the mind and realize the true condition of reality... zero. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>\u201cHe who contemplates on\nsunya...is absorbed into space...<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>think on the Great Void\nunceasingly. The Great Void,<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>whose beginning is\nvoid, whose middle is void, [and]<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>whose end is void. . .\nBy contemplating continually<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>on this, one obtains\nsuccess [enlightenment].</i></span>\u201d&nbsp; - <b>Siva\nSamhita&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rZqolh3nHD0/V0vsrGnNbvI/AAAAAAABJSA/o3WF4VXuMqceyAZFsruJR1lzRAcgRap_ACLcB/s1600/iddmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"285\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rZqolh3nHD0/V0vsrGnNbvI/AAAAAAABJSA/o3WF4VXuMqceyAZFsruJR1lzRAcgRap_ACLcB/s400/iddmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By practice of yoga one\nbecomes gradually detached from material concepts. &nbsp;&nbsp;This is the primary characteristic of the\nyoga . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga, is the union of\nthe individual soul with the Supreme Soul. &nbsp;&nbsp;Just as camphor melts and becomes one with\nthe fire; just as a drop of water when it is thrown into the ocean, becomes one\nwith the ocean, the individual soul, when it is purified, when it is freed from\nlust, greed, hatred and egoism, when it becomes Satvic, becomes one with the\nSupreme Soul. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Katha Upanishad,\nyoga is likened to a chariot in which the reasoning consciousness is the\ndriver, and the body is the cart. &nbsp;Mastery\nof the body is thus achieved by control of the senses. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JhmJvldWZ4g/V0vsWvT_A0I/AAAAAAABJR4/YtKpc_PVA4wBTbhAUTHmVIN_dqS5L8lFgCLcB/s1600/i22smages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JhmJvldWZ4g/V0vsWvT_A0I/AAAAAAABJR4/YtKpc_PVA4wBTbhAUTHmVIN_dqS5L8lFgCLcB/s400/i22smages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This text is an early\nexample of the basic yogic belief that the mind and body are not inherently\nseparate but linked. The Upanishads accept the Yoga practice in the sense of a\nconscious inward search for the true knowledge of Reality.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-P7iazh5agDM/V0vs_xnI9oI/AAAAAAABJSI/fyDOUB5gxjU6BEqpalqt42xGGMYFgkhSgCLcB/s1600/imszages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"251\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-P7iazh5agDM/V0vs_xnI9oI/AAAAAAABJSI/fyDOUB5gxjU6BEqpalqt42xGGMYFgkhSgCLcB/s400/imszages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Katha Upanishad speaks\nof the highest condition of Yoga as a state where the senses together with the\nmind and intellect are fettered into immobility.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QjdITXvhvog/V0v4SK_ms8I/AAAAAAABJTY/4ATNh4FkMjM3_lR_9Y4Ejc1vLCNHaEdJgCLcB/s1600/ima99ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QjdITXvhvog/V0v4SK_ms8I/AAAAAAABJTY/4ATNh4FkMjM3_lR_9Y4Ejc1vLCNHaEdJgCLcB/s400/ima99ges.jpg\" width=\"314\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Indians knew\nhow to celebrate life, but they also had a penchant for deep thought, solitary\nconcentration, and penance.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bky1T2aoAbc/V0vsJHDVjdI/AAAAAAABJR0/PKtT6iJ8x1ANoEb9CxVAz-xFLEKmyCUVwCLcB/s1600/im22aages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"262\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bky1T2aoAbc/V0vsJHDVjdI/AAAAAAABJR0/PKtT6iJ8x1ANoEb9CxVAz-xFLEKmyCUVwCLcB/s400/im22aages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma yoga means the\ndiscipline of action or integration through activity. &nbsp;&nbsp;Karma Yoga is the Yoga of self-surrendered\naction.. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yhy4EBEnB8U/V0vvSWArfmI/AAAAAAABJSo/1I6_7A3jqu8Czh71TPDqV7Qbm4Yqzpc6wCLcB/s1600/imagmmes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yhy4EBEnB8U/V0vvSWArfmI/AAAAAAABJSo/1I6_7A3jqu8Czh71TPDqV7Qbm4Yqzpc6wCLcB/s400/imagmmes.jpg\" width=\"333\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma Yoga is the Yoga of\naction which purifies the heart and prepares the heart and mind for the\nreception of Divine Light or the attainment of Knowledge of the Self. But this\nhas to be done without attachment or egoism. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HpAhGlvKbB0/V0vuU3iia-I/AAAAAAABJSc/-zOCUPyKvVUKHfwfoq53pQrMKGiTs6XpwCLcB/s1600/KAR9lmMA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HpAhGlvKbB0/V0vuU3iia-I/AAAAAAABJSc/-zOCUPyKvVUKHfwfoq53pQrMKGiTs6XpwCLcB/s640/KAR9lmMA.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The karma yoga of The\nGita is a unique philosophy of action and it declares that nature has given the\nright of action to man only and the right of the result of action is under the\nauthority of nature. But the action is a duty of man; therefore he should\nperform actions without the desire of fruit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-laFfSc3mco0/V0vu109Q3XI/AAAAAAABJSg/KXEyGfhE87YL64VpF57-OPIU9p-dggxpgCLcB/s1600/ima87jges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"236\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-laFfSc3mco0/V0vu109Q3XI/AAAAAAABJSg/KXEyGfhE87YL64VpF57-OPIU9p-dggxpgCLcB/s400/ima87jges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Krishna says:\n\"Not by abstention from actions does a man enjoy action-transcendence, nor\nby renunciation alone does he approach perfection.\" (III, 4). n:<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2iVBd47JlCY/V0v2BsOGYUI/AAAAAAABJS8/wLrIlHbJzTkHluwd92AA6E_F9aO1KCFEACLcB/s1600/imaerges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2iVBd47JlCY/V0v2BsOGYUI/AAAAAAABJS8/wLrIlHbJzTkHluwd92AA6E_F9aO1KCFEACLcB/s400/imaerges.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"For Me, O son of\nPritha, there is nothing to be done in the three worlds, nothing ungained to be\ngained - and yet I engage in action.\" (III.22).&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Au583TCMUKY/V0vtwyHzUjI/AAAAAAABJSU/aTjFdn7u0mEM71LSXSuXaqM5Ch6rAzupgCLcB/s1600/Karma%2BYodga.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Au583TCMUKY/V0vtwyHzUjI/AAAAAAABJSU/aTjFdn7u0mEM71LSXSuXaqM5Ch6rAzupgCLcB/s640/Karma%2BYodga.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n<b><br /></b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga was devised to meet\nall the deepest needs of the soul.&nbsp;\nVedanta was seriously preoccupied with the structure of the human\ncondition. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-PVJi-VRf73I/V0v3pu6BHwI/AAAAAAABJTQ/3knCZGhZ2owOKdg2QIii_4yifK1-8ZM2gCLcB/s1600/imag88es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-PVJi-VRf73I/V0v3pu6BHwI/AAAAAAABJTQ/3knCZGhZ2owOKdg2QIii_4yifK1-8ZM2gCLcB/s400/imag88es.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With a rigor unknown\nelsewhere, ancient India has applied itself to analyzing the various conditionings\nof the human being.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MEgk0zR_9Y4/V0v22J0NHKI/AAAAAAABJTE/yx8fHwkJmcoFod9u4OG2BF7DlqpGV725gCLcB/s1600/four-streams-ofvv-yogappt-2-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MEgk0zR_9Y4/V0v22J0NHKI/AAAAAAABJTE/yx8fHwkJmcoFod9u4OG2BF7DlqpGV725gCLcB/s400/four-streams-ofvv-yogappt-2-728.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga is a discipline\nwhich enables man to discover his true Nature. &nbsp;&nbsp;According to Yoga, man\u2019s essence is\nspiritual; and his true nature may be described as freedom.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-n-eWofJtwSI/V0v53OY-zJI/AAAAAAABJTk/CaIXO529KxAf0SZ83YlaMxiM4-M1M7pwgCLcB/s1600/ls998.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-n-eWofJtwSI/V0v53OY-zJI/AAAAAAABJTk/CaIXO529KxAf0SZ83YlaMxiM4-M1M7pwgCLcB/s400/ls998.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The supreme bliss\nis found only by the tranquil yogi, whose passions have been stilled. His\ndesires washed away, the yogi easily achieves union with the Eternal. He sees\nhis Self in all beings, and all beings in his Self, for his heart is steady in\nYoga.\"</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<b>Bhagavad Gita 4000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bhagavad Gita is indeed\na grand book of yoga. It emphasizes self-discipline and control over the senses\nas essential techniques of a yoga that it defines as the \"balance\" of\nthe individual and universal consciousness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The wavering,\nrestless mind goes wandering on\", Krishna advises the despondent Arjuna\n6000 years ago on the battle field of Kuruksheta - \"you must draw it back\nand have it focused every time on the soul...Yoga is a harmony- a harmony in\neating and resting, in sleeping and keeping awake: a perfection in whatever one\ndoes.\"&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b9f-xB5zBmA/V0v7sckurBI/AAAAAAABJTw/7rz7FPfi5pMjK894kZd_krNmXMiv1ktBACLcB/s1600/Kurukshgetra1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"318\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b9f-xB5zBmA/V0v7sckurBI/AAAAAAABJTw/7rz7FPfi5pMjK894kZd_krNmXMiv1ktBACLcB/s640/Kurukshgetra1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n\n\n\n<b><br /></b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_79M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_29.html?showComment=1464600960132#c7729337724455697262\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">May 30, 2016 at 3:06 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_79MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.telegraph.co.uk/science/2016/05/28/comets-could-have-sparked-life-on-earth-as-building-blocks-of-dn/<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN I FIRST WROTE OF SHIVA LINGAM BLACK METEORITE STONES BEING THE CAUSE OF LIFE ON EARTH, ALL SNIGGERED.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">ENEMIES OF HINDUISM USED TO CALL SHIVA LINGAM SHIVA PHALLUS IN EXTREME SARCASM . &nbsp; INDEED IT IS THE STONE WHICH GAVE THE SEED DNA .</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTODAY THEY HAVE TO LICK BACK THEIR OWN SPIT FROM THE GROUND.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THIS BLOGSITE HAS MADE MORE THAN 10,000 REVELATIONS FOR THE FIRST TIME ON THE PLANET-- &nbsp;ALL WILL BECOME TRUE&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nIF I WERE A WHITE JEW I WOULD BE AN INTERNATIONAL CELEBRITY . .<br />\n<br />\nWHO CARES ?<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vrUj5fPByJw/V0wSHlzej6I/AAAAAAABJUA/EpdnSOLvpFs5qIzfDItD2NTxznpDtSh-gCLcB/s1600/10914290_32388157484550575_1933201945_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vrUj5fPByJw/V0wSHlzej6I/AAAAAAABJUA/EpdnSOLvpFs5qIzfDItD2NTxznpDtSh-gCLcB/s640/10914290_32388157484550575_1933201945_n.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Someone asked me.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How can you say that orgone\nwas coming out of the apex of Egyptian pyramids.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OK\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here we go\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why do I say that\nEgyptian pyramids was made by Imhotep ( Ayyappa ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because the dimensions\nare the same as the Sri Yantra triangle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is EXACT and there\nis NO scope for speculation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Egyptian pyramid is\na huge version of a Agnihotra copper vessel<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The great pyramid of\nCheops Egypt has a base angle<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> 51 deg 49 minutes </b>like the 10000 year old Sri\nYantra large pyramid, showing exactly the same relationship between pi and phi\n.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ratio of the hypotenuse to half the base is phi, the Golden Ratio-- or\n'divine proportion', given by (1 + square-root 5)/2 (its value to five decimal\nplaces is 1.61803). It is a sure indication that the Pharaoh's architects were\nNOT from Egypt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>THIS ANGLE IS THE SAME\nAS THE AGNIHOTRA VESSEL.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qEhUCW7uceE/V0wSTjwzyUI/AAAAAAABJUE/WnvL3fF-_oog32HTNlWnjR2F_efOUfZsQCLcB/s1600/000%2B%2528w7%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"244\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qEhUCW7uceE/V0wSTjwzyUI/AAAAAAABJUE/WnvL3fF-_oog32HTNlWnjR2F_efOUfZsQCLcB/s640/000%2B%2528w7%2529.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-D2ugOd9EHQc/V0wVVMCcxKI/AAAAAAABJUs/aKPZ2RRFHR0aAKHaqH1Yh1gA3yurokydACLcB/s1600/2012-1009-2kk04.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Someone asked me \u201c How\ndo you know this or that is a POISON INJECTION\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let that remain a\nsecret.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However I am very sensitive\nto the meter of a verse in Sanskrit.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He asked \u201c How do you\nknow that some documents are fake?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma has\nnever ever tried to push any doctrine or dogma down the throats of Hindus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is NOT our style.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leave alone maharishis,\neven our Gods ( Vishnu avatars )&nbsp; have\nNOT done it<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have only provoked\nyou to think and make your own decisions .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Krishna does NOT\nimpose his doctrine on Arjuna , he only counsels -- for at the end of his\nlecture he tells \"It is my opinion; you are at liberty to do whatever you\nthink is right for you.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let us take a verse in\nNasadiya Sukta<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VERSE NO 6 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0947\u0926</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot;
