, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BUT GANDHI IS A BRAHMACHARI, RIGHT ?<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">HOW CAN GANDHI BE A BAD MAN ?<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">YEAH, HE TOOK VOWS OF BRAHMACHARYA IN FRONT\nOF ROTHSCHILDs JOURNALISTS \u2013 YEAH , HE SURELY DID . <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">YOU SEE,&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;THERE IS DIRECT OBJECTIVE\nEVIDENCE OF GANDHI BEING A BRAHMACHARI WHO RETAINED HIS SEMEN AND DERIVED DIVINE FUCKIN' OJAS OUT OF IT, RIGHT ?</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">\"One who conserves his vital fluid acquires unfailing\npower,\" -Gandhi&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://www.independent.co.uk/arts-entertainment/books/features/thrill-of-the-chaste-the-truth-about-gandhis-sex-life-1937411.html\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">http://www.independent.co.uk/arts-entertainment/books/features/thrill-of-the-chaste-the-truth-about-gandhis-sex-life-1937411.html</b></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><b><a href=\"http://www.ibtimes.co.uk/ghandi-slept-grandniece-historian-tells-uk-government-1460499\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"></span></a></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://www.ibtimes.co.uk/ghandi-slept-grandniece-historian-tells-uk-government-1460499\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.ibtimes.co.uk/ghandi-slept-grandniece-historian-tells-uk-government-1460499</a></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large; line-height: 115%;\"><b>Below: GUJJU No 2 praying to GUJJU No 1-- &nbsp;Rothschild khush hua !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HqRQqa1kuk8/V0fFu30PpFI/AAAAAAABJJ4/UpiU39sYNwg_YoNFATFHBh2RNWvHpuu7ACLcB/s1600/06lerrad2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"638\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HqRQqa1kuk8/V0fFu30PpFI/AAAAAAABJJ4/UpiU39sYNwg_YoNFATFHBh2RNWvHpuu7ACLcB/s640/06lerrad2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BELOW IN BLUE FONT IS NOT PART OF SANATANA DHARMA --&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">I AM PUTTING IT SO THAT HINDUS KNOW HOW THIS GREAT NATION WAS WOUNDED BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs BRAHMACHARI AGENTS&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">On 1<sup>st</sup> Jan\n1947, Gandhi\u2019s secretary RP Parashuram resigned because of Gandhi\u2019s immoral sex\nhabits \u2013 here is a part of his 16 page letter</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"http://www.dialogueindia.in/magazine/%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%B6%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%B7%E0%A4%A3/gandhi-used-his-position-to-sexually-exploit-young-women.-the-way-we-react-to-this-matters-even-today-5009\" style=\"background-color: lime; line-height: normal;\">http://www.dialogueindia.in/magazine/%E0%A4%B5%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%B6%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%B2%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%B7%E0%A4%A3/gandhi-used-his-position-to-sexually-exploit-young-women.-the-way-we-react-to-this-matters-even-today-5009</a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">1 January, 1947<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Srirampur<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Revered Bapu,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I write these lines in\nsorrow and pain\u2026You know how shy and unforward I have been these two years. You\nmust imagine to what depths I must have been agitated then to overcome my\nshyness and become bold and that too with a man who is considered by many to be\nthe greatest man living\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">You must also ponder\nover the fact as to what it is that has made me bold and say things so boldly.\nIt is because I feel I am so clearly in the right and you so clearly in the\nwrong. It is the cause that gives me the courage.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">It is not that I did\nnot know these before. I knew and kept quiet. I thought \u201cWhy should I bring\nthese to him?\u201d There are men like Kanu [Gandhi], Kishorilal-bhai [Mashruwala],\netc., experienced men and men knowing you fully. And then I had not the\ncourage. I have come over my shyness with you\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">When first I came to\nthe ashram I came with high respect for the ashram and its inmates and its way\nof life. All that was knocked off in 24 hours\u2026After coming here I must confess\nto having lost a portion of the respect I had for you\u2026.You are the Father of\nour Nation\u2026You have taken us so far along the path of freedom and\nindependence\u2026You must see the hand of God\u2026in the fact that I have overcome my\nshyness.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I object to your\nsleeping in the same bed with members of the opposite sex. In February 1945 or\nso I was given the draft of a statement to type. I was shocked by the\ncontents\u2026I must tell you that even before I know of this. One day Amin-bhai\ncame and told me that he was shocked to see Manu [Manu Gandhi \u2014 Gandhi\u2019s own\ngrand niece] getting into your bed.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In those days I was\nmore shy than I am now. My only friend in the ashram was Amin. Even then I came\nto know of the discussions about this affair because the ashram people are so\ncareless and can\u2019t keep their mouth shut. Everybody objected to your doing\nthis\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Apart from the question\nof any affect on you what about the effect on girls?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">There is something of\nother wrong with them [the women who sleep naked with Gandhi]. [The] Punjabi\ngirl who lived opposite my room in Matunga\u2026She used to weep unrestrainedly and\nthat not caring whether others saw her or not. She laughed also unrestrainedly\u2026And\nthen here is Dr. Sushila-behn [The 24-year-old in-house physician at the ashram\nwho Gandhi also used for his \u2018experiments\u2019]. How many are the days when she has\nnot wept? She is a doctor and yet she is always a patient, always is ill. Who\nhas heard of a doctor who cries out at night?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Even then the whole\nthing is considered wrong by the world. I do not like it. Nirmal babu [Bose]\ndoes not. Sucheta-behn [Kriplani] did not like it and said \u201cHowever great he\nmay be, he cannot do such things. What is this?\u201d You must admit that there is\nsomething in our objection. You cannot waive it aside.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">As for blood relations\n[This is reference to Manu Gandhi]. The world is sceptic even there. There have\nbeen cases of immorality between father and daughter, brother and sister\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I object to your having\nmassage done by girls. When I was studying in college I read a report saying\nyou were being massaged by Dr. Sushila-behn\u2026And now I find you do get yourself\nmassaged by girls.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Those people who know\nthat you are naked during massage time say that you could at least put a cover\nover it [his genitals]\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The same objection I\nhold against girls coming to the bathroom when you go there. Ramachandran saw\nyou like that and said you had fallen a little from his estimation. However\ngreat you may be, you cannot do these things.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Your placing your hands\non shoulders of girls. You had written once that you gave up this practice\nbecause others intimated you with evil intention. I have not come across any\nother writing saying you could resume it. So it was strange to me why you\nresumed it\u2026During the two years I have been with you, about 50 letters or so\nobjecting to this practice from admirers and calumniators came. None of them\ngot any reply\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Your being seen naked\n[during his bath and massage] jars on the mind of strangers, admirers though\nthey might be. Ramachandran did not like it. He said it was the limit\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Ever since the 17th\nDecember [1946] when in the small hours of the morning you made those dreadful\nsounds, dreadful because it came from you man of such eminence, even otherwise\nunbecoming for any wise or old man, my head has not been at peace</b></span>. I have heard\nof another such instance from Mr. Ramachandran of the API [Associated Press of\nIndia] when you told Sushila-behn to leave you. I have seen such another\ninstance at Delhi\u2026But this event shook me to my depths. I said to myself that\nGod and the nation would not forgive me if I kept quiet\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">You commit Himalyan\nblunders. But you refuse to see these things and when told, you are irritated\u2026I\nsay you are conceited and constitute yourself to be the repository of all the\nwisdom in the world\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">And now to my charges.\nUnless [my demands] are fulfilled I depart\u2026I beg to differ and go away\u2026Your\nactions to which I object:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">1. Your sleeping with\nany member of the opposite sex.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">2. Being massaged by\nany member of the opposite sex.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">3. Allowing yourself to\nbe seen naked by any member of the opposite sex.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">4. Allowing yourself to\nbe seen naked by strangers and even by people who are of your party who are not\nso intimate.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><i>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">5. Placing your hands\non the shoulders of girls when walking.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">REGARDING \"DREADFUL SOUNDS\" MADE BY GANDHI IN THE EARLY HOURS OF THE MORNING - I HAVE SPOKEN TO A MAN WHO HAS HEARD IT &nbsp;SEVERAL TIMES ( MY SHIP &nbsp;IN CAPETOWN IN 1977 WHEN I WAS A SECOND OFFICER -- I VISITED THIS MANs HOME &nbsp;). &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a poem I wrote\nin 1977 at Capetown.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; VLCC &nbsp;Koyali was a huge SCI oil tanker which could\ncarry nearly 300,000 tonnes of crude . It was too big for the Suez canal. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I was 2<sup>nd</sup> mate of this ship for\n13 months.&nbsp; I knew who the REAL was Gandhi\nwas even 4 decades ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">i\nstill remember our days in cape town<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">our\nengines on koyali were sick and down<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">we\ndanced and sung the nights away<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">and\nscouted the hills during the day<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">the\ndeck officers had a well earned rest<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">the\ngirls they had were cape town's best<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">for\nthe work in hand , was no child's play<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swamy Vivekananda gave\nBULL that he was &nbsp;able to memorize\nwhatever he used to glance, in a book. By reading a few lines of a paragraph,\nhe used to get the meaning of the rest of the paragraph.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He used to say that if\none practices absolute abstinence for a period of 12 years, continuous, a\nspecial Nadi (nerve power) called Medha Nadi (Medha / intelligence) develops in\none\u2019s brain, which leads to tremendous memory and concentration. This is\nnonsense. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I can do better speed\nreading than Vivekananda did any day\u2014balls to OJAS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/speed-reading-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/speed-reading-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vivekananda said that abstinence\nis the fuel for spiritual journey&nbsp; and\nthere can be no spirituality without abstinence. Almost all our ancient\nmaharishis were happily married with children\u2014except a few who did that due to\nswearing unselfish and self sacrificing oaths like Bhishma or Ayyappa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma has\nnever asked for sexual repression .&nbsp; In\nthe Brahmacharya ashrama ( age till 25 ) it was a custom.&nbsp;&nbsp; In Vanaprasta ashrama ( ages 50 to 75 ) it\nwas a choice.&nbsp; In sanyas ashrama ( age 75\ntill death ) abstinence was compulsory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader\ninjected our ancient texts , about the benefits of sexual repression . QUOTE : eficiency\nof Ojas in human body leads to unhealthy and abnormal life and many diseases\nsuch as Vibheti (i.e. Fear complex), Durbala Abhikshanam (Symptoms of (physical\nand mental) weakness), Durmana (abnormal mental functionalities), Abhighatat\n(trauma), Kopat (anger), Shokat (grief)( etc. :UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS NONSENSE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RATHER IT IS THE OTHER\nWAY AROUND<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ALL KNOW THE MIND BOGGLING\nSADISM OF THE SEXUALLY REPRESSED CATHOLIC CLERGY SINCE AGES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Here is what Swami\nVivekananda wrote \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">QUOTE: \u201cThe\n\"Ojas\" is that which makes the difference between man and man. The\nman who has much Ojas is the leader of men. It gives a tremendous power of\nattraction. Ojas is manufactured from the nerve-currents. It has this\npeculiarity: it is most easily made from that force which manifests itself in\nthe sexual powers. If the powers of the sexual centres are not frittered away\nand their energies wasted (action is only thought in a grosser state), they can\nbe manufactured into Ojas. The two great nerve currents of the body start from\nthe brain, go down on each side of the spinal cord, but they cross in the shape\nof the figure 8 at the back of the head. Thus the left side of the body is\ngoverned by the right side of the head. At the lowest point of the circuit is\nthe sexual centre, the Sacral Plexus. The energy conveyed by these two currents\nof nerves comes down, and a large amount is continually being stored in the\nSacral Plexus. The last bone in the spine is over the Sacral Plexus and is\ndescribed in symbolic language as a triangle; and as the energy is stored up\nbeside it, this energy is symbolised by a serpent. Consciousness and\nsubconsciousness work through these two nerve-currents. But superconsciousness\ntakes off the nerve-current when it reaches the lower end of the circuit, and\ninstead of allowing it to go up and complete the circuit, stops and forces it\nup the spinal cord as Ojas from the Sacral Plexus. The spinal cord is naturally\nclosed, but it can be opened to form a passage for this Ojas. As the current\ntravels from one centre of the spinal cord to another, you can travel from one\nplane of existence to another. This is why the human being is greater than\nothers, because all planes, all experiences, are possible to the spirit in the\nhuman body. We do not need another; for man can, if he likes, finish in his\nbody his probation and can after that become pure spirit. When the Ojas has\ngone from centre to centre and reaches the Pineal Gland (a part of the brain to\nwhich science can assign no function), man then becomes neither mind nor body,\nhe is free from all bondage.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">The great danger of\npsychic powers is that man stumbles, as it were, into them, and knows not how\nto use them rightly. He is without training and without knowledge of what has\nhappened to him. The danger is that in using these psychic powers, the sexual\nfeelings are abnormally roused as these powers are in fact manufactured out of\nthe sexual centre. The best and safest way is to avoid psychic manifestations,\nfor they play the most horrible pranks on their ignorant and untrained owners.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">To go back to symbols.\nBecause this movement of the Ojas up the spinal cord feels like a spiral one,\nit is called the \"snake\". The snake, therefore, or the serpent, rests\non the bone or triangle. When it is roused, it travels up the spinal cord; and\nas it goes from centre to centre, a new natural world is opened inside us\u2014the\nKundalini is roused.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Swami Vivekananda told\n(From Complete Works, Volume I, Raja Yoga)\u2014[Source]<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">The \"Ojas\" is\nthat which makes the difference between man and man. The man who has much Ojas\nis the leader of men. It gives a tremendous power of attraction. \u2014<b>Swami\nVivekananda</b><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">\u201cThe Yogi alone has the\nSushumna open. When this Sushumna current opens, and begins to rise, we get\nbeyond the sense, our minds become supersensuous, superconscious \u2014 we get\nbeyond even the intellect, where reasoning cannot reach. To open that Sushumna\nis the prime object of the Yogi. According to him, along this Sushumna are\nranged these centres, or, in more figurative language, these lotuses, as they\nare called. The lowest one is at the lower end of the spinal cord, and is called\nMul\u00e2dh\u00e2ra, the next higher is called Sv\u00e2dhishth\u00e2na, the third Manipura, the\nfourth An\u00e2hata, the fifth Vishuddha, the sixth \u00c2jn\u00e2 and the last, which is in\nthe brain, is the Sahasr\u00e2ra, or \"the thousand-petalled\". Of these we\nhave to take cognition just now of two centres only, the lowest, the Muladhara,\nand the highest, the Sahasrara. All energy has to be taken up from its seat in\nthe Muladhara and brought to the Sahasrara. The Yogis claim that of all the\nenergies that are in the human body the highest is what they call\n\"Ojas\". Now this Ojas is stored up in the brain, and the more Ojas is\nin a man's head, the more powerful he is, the more intellectual, the more\nspiritually strong. One man may speak beautiful language and beautiful\nthoughts, but they, do not impress people; another man speaks neither beautiful\nlanguage nor beautiful thoughts, yet his words charm. Every movement of his is\npowerful. That is the power of Ojas. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Now in every man there\nis more or less of this Ojas stored up. All the forces that are working in the\nbody in their highest become Ojas. You must remember that it is only a question\nof transformation. The same force which is working outside as electricity or\nmagnetism will become changed into inner force; the same forces that are working\nas muscular energy will be changed into Ojas. The Yogis say that that part of\nthe human energy which is expressed as sex energy, in sexual thought, when\nchecked and controlled, easily becomes changed into Ojas, and as the Muladhara\nguides these, the Yogi pays particular attention to that centre. He tries to\ntake up all his sexual energy and convert it into Ojas. It is only the chaste\nman or woman who can make the Ojas rise and store it in the brain; that is why\nchastity has always been considered the highest virtue. A man feels that if he\nis unchaste, spirituality goes away, he loses mental vigour and moral stamina.\nThat is why in all the religious orders in the world which have produced\nspiritual giants you will always find absolute chastity insisted upon. That is\nwhy the monks came into existence, giving up marriage. There must be perfect\nchastity in thought, word, and deed; without it the practice of Raja-Yoga is\ndangerous, and may lead to insanity. If people practice Raja-Yoga and at the\nsame time lead an impure life, how can they expect to become Yogis?\u201d UNQUOTE </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ABOVE IS BULLSHIT OF\nTHE FIRST ORDER.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OUR ANCIENT TEXTS DO NOT CONTAIN THIS\nMINDLESS NONSENSE .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE IN KERALA KNOW AYURVEDA\nAND ONLY NORTH KERALA HAD THE PRICELESS HERBS ( WESTERN GHATS SNAKE TEMPLES )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Ayurveda,\nOjas is the subtle essence that is responsible for life, radiant health, strong\nimmunity, vigor, longevity and overall well being of an individual.&nbsp; Ojas is extracted from the proper digestion\nand efficient metabolism of food nourishes the bodily tissues of blood, plasma\nand lymph, muscle, fat, bones, bone marrow and&nbsp;\nsemen <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ojas also forms the basic material of the five\nsense organs, ligaments, tendons,&nbsp; and\nlubricating fluids. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ojas is diminished by\nunder eating causing malnutrition , overeating without burning it out by\nphysical exercise , eating before the previous food has not yet been digested,\ndrinking excess water along with food,&nbsp;\nconsumption of poor quality food that results in the blocking of the\nchannels, consumption of stale / putrid foods, negative emotional stressors\nsuch as anxiety, anger, sadness, grief, hatred, jealousy, long held resentment,\nfear, grief, consumption of alcohol, smoking,&nbsp;\nlack of sleep, excessive discharge of mucus, blood, semen and other\nexcreta, with age and injury by other organisms, undue exposure to wind and\nsun, and excessive immoral sexual activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Ayurveda practice of\nYoga to drive lymph fluids , Pranayama , Surya namaskar and consumption of&nbsp; Chyavanprasham revitalizer and Agastya\nRasayanam tonic boosted Ojas. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ojas is the result of the\nquality of fresh organic food we eat in a good frame of mind,&nbsp; its proper digestion and efficient metabolism\nand the positive sensory impressions we imbibe in our daily life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eat a balanced\nmeal.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Ayurveda, a balanced meal\nconsists of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; all the 6 major tastes in\nmoderation: sweet, salty, sour, bitter,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nastringent, and pungent. Your tongue buds lead you to what is to be\neaten. This is why be clean our tongue after brushing the teeth.&nbsp;&nbsp; The taste buds are a collection of cells on\nthe surface of the tongue, which renew every 10 days to 13 days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today doctors\nunderstand what is pitta ( bile ). When the gall bladder is surgically removed\nthe patient knows what it means&nbsp; to have\nimbalanced pitta .&nbsp; Kapha, Vata and Pitta\nare interconnected.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When bile is imbalanced the patient will fart excessively\nor pass out mucous in stools ( with wrong diet)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/06/kidney-and-gallbladder-stones-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/06/kidney-and-gallbladder-stones-capt-ajit.html</a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People with imbalanced\nPitta ( bile ) are told to keep away from fatty foods, too much of spice\netc&nbsp; and this burns out Ojas.. It is NOT\nabout impotence or lack of hard on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do NOT drink the milk\nof HUMPLESS western jersey cow , excessive processed white sugar etc if you\nwant Ojas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tejas is high cell\nvoltage .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<o:p>&nbsp;</o:p><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/healing-by-increasing-cell-voltage-capt.html\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/healing-by-increasing-cell-voltage-capt.html</a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tejas is responsible\nfor inner radiance, glow , luster in one\u2019s eyes, clarity, fearlessness,\ncourage, intelligence etc.&nbsp;&nbsp; A man\nsuffering for jaundice with yellow skin and eyes does NOT have any Tejas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balanced tejas is\nneeded for metabolism.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If tejas in a\nperson is too high it burns out the ojas (just as fire evaporates water).&nbsp; The myelin sheaths which are composed of ojas\nare burned by excessive high tejas <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tejas gets diminished\nby:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Excessive negative\nthinking and talking<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Psychological\n/emotional imbalances</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For a healthy balance\nof tejas one should:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Enforce positive\nthinking.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Meditate<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Chant mantras<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Practice awareness in\nthought, words and action</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana is about vitality\nand energy . People with depleted prana fall sick fast and they die early.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/cellular-memory-complete-healing-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/cellular-memory-complete-healing-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana is the vital life\nforce. When prana is depleted, your heart chakra slows down and you die.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today modern doctors\ncan watch ECG graphs on computer screens . Ancient Maharishis could watch the\nheart chakra . Lesser sages just dowse with a crystal. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/heart-matters-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/heart-matters-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana is responsible\nfor vitality and energy and the processes of respiration, circulation,\ndigestion, excretion etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana lives in the\nheart along with past desires and egoism. The different modifications of this\nprana, results in ten principle types of pranas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We imbibe prana when we\nbreathe.&nbsp; Hence, the reserves of prana\ncan be increased by performing pranayama which leads to good health of mind and\nbody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the Hatha\nYoga Pradipika The body of a person whose energy channels or nadis are pure\nwill be lean and glowing. Purification of nadis leads to good health.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhramari helps\nstrengthen prana and is good for thyroid, thymus and the parathyroid glands.\nBhramari means bee, so one makes the sound of a humming bee when performing\nthis pranayama. One should close their ears with their thumbs, inhale and upon\nexhalation, simultaneously sound MMMMM&nbsp;\nwith the mouth closed to generate Nitric oxide magic molecule..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ojas ,tejas and prana\nare interrelated.&nbsp;&nbsp; Ojas has the capacity\nto turn into tejas , which has the capacity to turn into prana ( scalar\nenergy).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; Unitarian Church dictated terms to Brahmo Samaj.<br />\n<br />\nThe son of Pir Ali Muslim Dwarknath Tagore introduced Rothschild\u2019s Western esotericism, into Brahmo Samaj . The theology of the Brahmo Samaj was called \"neo-Vedanta\" by Christian commentators.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s agent Keshub Chandra Sen, a Christian convert controlled his nephew Vivekananda and had him enrolled in his Nava Vidhan ( Nobobidhan ).<br />\n<br />\nKeshab Chandra Sen and Vivekananda incorporated Christian theology within the framework of Hindu thought.<br />\n<br />\nKeshab Chandra Sen was Secretary to the Goodwill Fraternity, Masonic lodge associated with the Unitarian Rev.Charles Dall and a Christian missionary Rev. James Long .<br />\n<br />\nWith them Sen establish a TRAITOR \"British Indian Association\" filled with Bhadaraloks , Pir Ali \u201cbrahmins\u201d , white people and anglo Indians..<br />\n<br />\nIn 1866 Sen delivered an address on Jesus Christ, Europe and Asia, in which he proclaimed that \"India would be for Christ alone who already stalks the land\"<br />\n<br />\nOn 24th January 1868, Keshub Chanda Sen laid the foundation stone of his new church, the Brahmo Samaj of India Tabernacle of New Dispensation and the newly constructed chapel was consecrated on 22nd August 1869.<br />\n<br />\nSen declared, \"we believe in the Church Universal, which is the respiratory of all ancient wisdom and the receptacle of all modern science, which recognise in all prophets and saints a harmony, in all scriptures a unity and though all dispensations a continuity, which abjures all that separates and divides and always magnifies unity and peace, which harmonises reason, faith and Bhakti, asceticism and social duty in their highest forms and which shall make of all nations and sects one kingdom and one family in the fullness of time.\"<br />\n<br />\nAIYYOOOOOOO!<br />\n<br />\nVivekananda was a member of a Freemasonry lodge in 1883.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild published ( 1896 ) and propagated Vivekananda\u2019s book Raja Yoga.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild send Swami Vivekananda on his ship to represent Hinduism at the Parliament of Religions at Chicago on September 11th, 1893.<br />\n<br />\nFor the next three years Vivekananda would be shown to several western doctors in USA , England and Europe to treat his terrible diseases\u2014and all the while he lectured too.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild gave Narendra his new name Swami Vivekananda just before he boarded his ship in May 1893.<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">To understand Brahman, Swami Vivekananda gave this BULL &nbsp;\"<i>We have to go through the negation, and\nthen the positive side will begin. We have to give up ignorance and all that is\nfalse, and then truth will begin to reveal itself to us. When we have grasped\nthe truth, things which we give up at first will take new shape and form, will\nappear to us in a new light, and become deified.&nbsp; They will have become sublimated, and then we\nshall understand them in their true light. But to understand them we have first\nto get a glimpse of truth; we must give them up at frrst, and then we get them\nback again, deified\"</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">(CW2,\n1983 : 166-167)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">THIS\nBLOGSITE ASKS VIVEKANANDA \u2013 IF YOU WITH HOLDING SEMEN NOT PART OF YOUR\nNEO-VEDANTA ? OR DID IT GET SOME DIVINE EXEMPTION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Vivekananda\ngives further BULL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">\"<i>Maya\nis real, yet it is not real\". It is real in that the Real is behind it and\ngives it its appearance of reality. That which is real in Maya is the Reality\nin and through Maya. Yet the Reality is never seen; and hence that which is\nseen is unreal, and it has no real independent existence of itself, but is\ndependent upon the Real for its existence. Maya then is a paradox -&nbsp;</i></span><i style=\"font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">real,\nyet not real; an illusion, yet not an illusion. He who knows the Real sees in\nMaya not illusion, but reality. He who knows not the Real sees in Maya the illusion\nand thinks it real</i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"> (CW6, 1985 : 92).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; line-height: 250%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">VIVEKANANDA\nWAS PART OF BRAHMO SAMAJ WHICH REJECTED &nbsp;BRAHMA / VISHNU/ SHIVA.&nbsp; THE TRINITY DRIVES DVAITA VEDANTA .&nbsp; &nbsp;THE DVAITA VEDANTA OF VIVEKANDANDA IS\nNONSENSE</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">BRAHMO\nSAMAJ REJECTED VISHNU AVATARS \u2013AND HENCE KRISHNA AND BHAGAWAD GITA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">SO\nWHAT SANATANA DHARMA IS THIS ROTHSCHILD AGENT AND FREEMASON, (WHO WITHHELD HIS\nSEMEN FOR 12 YEARS WHILE HAVING &nbsp;33\nDISEASES) TALKING ABOUT ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Listen\non to Vivekananda\u2019s BULL \"<i>The Vedantists give no other attribute to God\nexcept these three - that He is Infinite Existence, Infinite Knowledge and\nInfinite Bliss\", and he regards these three as One. Existence without\nknowledge and love cannot be; knowledge without love and love without knowledge\ncannot be. What we want is the harmony of Existence, Knowledge and Bliss\nInfinite. For that is our goal. We want harmony, not one-sided development. And\nit is possible to have the intellect of a Sankara with the heart of a Buddha</i>\n(Vivekananda, 1980: 128).\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">\"<i>The\nonly God to worship is the human soul in the human body. Of course all animals\nare&nbsp;</i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><i>temples\ntoo, but man is the highest, the Taj Mahal of temples</i>\" (CW2, 1983 :321).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><i>\"We\nHindus do not merely tolerate, we unite ourselves with every religion, praying\nin the mosque of the Muslim, worshipping before the fire of the Zoroastrian,\nand kneeling to the&nbsp;</i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><i>cross\nof the Christian. We know that all religions alike, from the lowest fetishism\nto the highest absolutism, are but so many attempts of the human soul to grasp\nand realise the Infinite. So we gather all these flowers, and, binding them\ntogether with the cord of love, make them into a wonderful bouquet of\nworship</i>\" (CW1, 1984 : X)</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; Moral relativism is a\nmeta-ethical position where there are no objectively true moral principles,\nonly relatively true principles, indexed to the beliefs of particular cultural\ngroups. &nbsp;&nbsp;That it is morally wrong to\njudge or interfere with the moral practices of other cultural groups.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS KOSHER BELIEF LED\nGANDHI TO BELIEVE HE CAN TAKE BRAHMACHARI NONSENSE TO SLEEPING WITH UNDERAGED\nGIRLS UNDER THE SAME BLANKET. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi wrote : \u201c I have\nno objection in being&nbsp; called an\nAnek\u0101ntavadi .&nbsp; . It is this doctrine\nthat has taught me to judge a Musulman from his standpoint and a Christian from\nhis. Formerly I used to resent the ignorance of my opponents. Today I can love\nthem because I am gifted with the eye to see myself as others see me and vice\nversa. I want to take the whole world in the embrace of my love. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GANDHI WAS FROM A KATHIAWARI\nCRYPTO JEW SECT. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HE WAS INFLUENCED BY\nLESBIAN JEWESS MARGARET MEAD , WHO PROPAGATED THE MORAL RELATIVISM THEORY OF JEW\nROTHSCHILD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MORAL RELATIVISM\nALLOWED YOU TO BE AN IMMORAL SON OF A BITCH WHERE YOU CAN CONVENIENTLY IGNORE\nTHE TRUTH.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARAM DOES\nNOT ALLOW THIS.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THE\nJUSTIFICATION OF A SLAVE DRIVER , WHATEVER IT MAY BE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rrlJv2kxTPI/V0lPCi_S2dI/AAAAAAABJLk/w_XOccX-GVcLZtHOXUU0kzVfZ47U4mAAQCLcB/s1600/quote-my-anekantavada-is-the-resulSt-of-the-twin-doctrines-of-satya-and-ahimsa-mahatma-gandhi-128-86-25.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rrlJv2kxTPI/V0lPCi_S2dI/AAAAAAABJLk/w_XOccX-GVcLZtHOXUU0kzVfZ47U4mAAQCLcB/s640/quote-my-anekantavada-is-the-resulSt-of-the-twin-doctrines-of-satya-and-ahimsa-mahatma-gandhi-128-86-25.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BR Ambedkar was\nbrainwashed by Jew Rothschild with Friedrich Nietzsche\u2019s moral relativism\ntheory.&nbsp; Nietzsche believed that we have\nto assess the value of our values since values are relative to one's goals and\none's self.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vivekananda\u2019s first\npublished work was a Bengali translation of 6 chapters of The Imitation of\nChrist, a work attributed to the medieval Christian monk, Thomas Kempis. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YEH BOOK LEKHE GHOOM\nRAHA THA- AKKA DIN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He never lost time to\nfore as many Hindus as possible to read this book arguing that religious wisdom\nis not the privilege of Hindus alone.&nbsp;\nAll this made the white invader be very fond of him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Imitation of Christ\nby Thomas \u00e0 Kempis ( died 1471 AD )is a widely read Christian devotional book. Apart\nfrom the Bible, no book has been translated into more languages than the\nImitation of Christ.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"At the Day of\nJudgement we shall not be asked what we have read, but what we have done.\"\n\u2014 The Imitation of Christ, Book I, ch. 3<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swami Vivekananda went\naround telling all and sundry that the teachings of the Imitation and the\nBhagavad Gita are almost the same ( which is MINDLESS BULL ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the night when a\ngroup of Sri Ramakrishna\u2019s young disciples resolved to become monks,\nVivekananda spoke to them of Jesus and his example.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a biography\npublished in 1912, ten years after his passing, his disciples described this\nmoment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The meditation lasted a\nlong time. When a break was made, Naren began to tell the story of Lord Jesus,\nbeginning with the wondrous mystery of his birth through his death on to the\nresurrection. Through the eloquence of Narendra, the boys were admitted into\nthe apostolic world wherein Paul had preached the gospel of the Asian Christ\nand spread Christianity far and wide. Naren made his plea to them to become\nChrists themselves, to aid in the redemption of the world; to realize God and\nto deny themselves as the Lord Jesus had done. xviii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VIVEKANANDA DID NOT\nKNOW THAT THERE IS NO HEAVEN OR HELL CONCEPT &nbsp;IN HINDUISM\u2014 SO MUCH FOR BEING AN EXPERT ON\nSANATANA DHARMA..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE DOES NOT KNOW THAT\nTHE NAME &nbsp;JESUS CHRIST WAS COOKED UP AT\nTHE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA IN 325 AD BY &nbsp;ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT ( TO\nDELETE APOLLONIUS ).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_140M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/18265601721675424400\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Buddha Zorba</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_25.html?showComment=1464453434751#c199414409181888838\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">May 28, 2016 at 10:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_140MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nAs per Wiki ...... TEEEEE HEEEEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nDeath<br />\nOn 4 July 1902 (the day of his death)[148] Vivekananda awoke early, went to the chapel at Belur Math and meditated for three hours. He taught Shukla-Yajur-Veda, Sanskrit grammar and the philosophy of yoga to pupils,[149][150] later discussing with colleagues a planned Vedic college in the Ramakrishna Math. At 7:00 p.m. Vivekananda went to his room, asking not to be disturbed;[149] he died at 9:10 p.m. while meditating.[151] According to his disciples, Vivekananda attained mahasam\u0101dhi;[152] the rupture of a blood vessel in his brain was reported as a possible cause of death.[153] His disciples believed that the rupture was due to his brahmarandhra (an opening in the crown of his head) being pierced when he attained mahasam\u0101dhi. Vivekananda fulfilled his prophecy that he would not live forty years.[154] He was cremated on a sandalwood funeral pyre on the bank of the Ganga in Belur, opposite where Ramakrishna was cremated sixteen years earlier.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_140BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
