font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PRIOR KNOWLEDGE OF\nGREEKS AND ARABS ARE ALL STOLEN FROM INDIA AND PATENTED IN OWN NAMES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ri4IOogn_J0/V0K8KXEiIOI/AAAAAAABJA0/HyRTimLUC6clj6IeDpT0-ZyiBrkMsj07gCLcB/s1600/imaBBNges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ri4IOogn_J0/V0K8KXEiIOI/AAAAAAABJA0/HyRTimLUC6clj6IeDpT0-ZyiBrkMsj07gCLcB/s320/imaBBNges.jpg\" width=\"227\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Theory of Karma shows\nthat Indians have never taken religion or worship of deities &nbsp;to an extreme.</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>We never found the need to have LOW FLYING MESSIAHS singing the praises of Rothschild's FAKE gods </b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hXKecC-vCQU/V0K57aKxyyI/AAAAAAABJAM/CeWItBsNUZUn4Wch7PbDV05_69NKmdfgQCLcB/s1600/wannabe-HHHords.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hXKecC-vCQU/V0K57aKxyyI/AAAAAAABJAM/CeWItBsNUZUn4Wch7PbDV05_69NKmdfgQCLcB/s640/wannabe-HHHords.jpg\" width=\"604\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>All these Bhakti movement messiahs are FAKE\nand backdated creations of the white invader &nbsp;.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Sahankaracharya was never part of the FAKE Bhakti movement as he was born 3500 years earlier.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1224660877277476892\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_86M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/11341755005570257059\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Prithvi</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_22.html?showComment=1463994461652#c1224660877277476892\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">May 23, 2016 at 2:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_86MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nRespected Captain,<br />\n<br />\nI wish to ask you something and I am sure that you are the fittest person on this planet to help me in this. Sir I try a lot to walk on the path of Dharma but i repeatedly falter. Tell me how to follow dharma with determination. Every morning I worship Shiva and Shakti, it brings gratitude in me ...all these rituals. But then today I got swayed by basic instincts and till afternoon I did not even take bath. I also had my food without worshipping which generally is not the case. I first take bath then do worship and then eat anything. Then I took bath in the afternoon and I felt so ashamed to go in front of my temple. I was filled with guilt. I wasn't able to muster enough courage to worship. I felt like I am a fake person. I felt like I am pretentious. I seeked forgiveness from Shiva but while seeking forgiveness i was internally feeling as if I am not worth the forgiveness. Captain this happens in a month or so. I don't know why I don't have this courage of never to falter from my path and discipline. But I do. I don't know whether i have been able to convey my problem to you or not. I just hope that you must have understood it and will guide me towards a good path with some workable solution. One more thing Captain ji..... If i falter from my self imposed discipline then does it affect my Karma? Or as a human I am allowed few errors? Eagerly waiting for your reply.<br />\n<br />\nCharan Sparsh<br />\n<br />\nWarmest Regards<br />\nPrithvi</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_86BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_86b+seedqfMD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_85T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; text-decoration: none;\">May 23, 2016 at 2:51 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_85MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nREAD PART 32&nbsp;</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_86b+seedqfMD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_86b+seedqfMD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-w10A2AWFWAY/V0K5WyK1I7I/AAAAAAABJAE/QawNotlyYuA5xqxiPiM6005_IU-xFSRDACLcB/s1600/kaNNBrma.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-w10A2AWFWAY/V0K5WyK1I7I/AAAAAAABJAE/QawNotlyYuA5xqxiPiM6005_IU-xFSRDACLcB/s400/kaNNBrma.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Tasmad asakta satatam <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Karyam karma samacara<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Asakto hy acaran karma<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Param apnoti purusah<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Lokasampraham eva\u2019pi<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sampasyan kartum arhasi</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, without\nattachment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Perform always the work\nthat has to be done<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For man attains to the\nhighest<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By doing work without\nattachment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Likewise you should\nperform with a view to guide others<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And for the sake of\nbenefiting the welfare of the world <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhagavad\nGita, III.19 and III.20 &nbsp;- 4000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was NO caste\nsystem in India till the white invader came to India. We had only varnas of 4\nclasses&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">--a metaphysical framework\nof intellectuals, fighters , skilled workers and unskilled workers. Jati refers\nto the such broad social units with which people actually identified.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By accepting the divinity\nin all beings and all of nature, Hinduism views the universe as a family or, in\nSanskrit, vasudhaiva kutumbakam. All beings, from the smallest organism to man,\nare considered manifestations of God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>SLAVERY HAS NEVER EVER\nEXISTED IN INDIA </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Zamc81brHfY/V0K5AeOqp0I/AAAAAAABI_8/W5p3eFvd6sg4ajhh9PyKGOa2fpkmVx82QCLcB/s1600/92f3413a517dd986099c5b0439a2353dde.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Zamc81brHfY/V0K5AeOqp0I/AAAAAAABI_8/W5p3eFvd6sg4ajhh9PyKGOa2fpkmVx82QCLcB/s640/92f3413a517dd986099c5b0439a2353dde.jpg\" width=\"536\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a verse from\nvedanta written 7000 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ajyesthaso akanishthaso\nete sambhrataro vahaduhu saubhagaya</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No one is superior,\nnone inferior. All are brothers marching forward to prosperity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India, more than 35%\nof all Hindus are vegetarian because of the fundamental belief in non-violence.\nMeat eating started with the Islamic invasion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas propound that all\nbeings, from the smallest organism to man, are considered manifestations of God\nand members of a universal family.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ph9iqTOmEH4/V0K4s6eg0vI/AAAAAAABI_4/xinCcmWEtgYLNTnlgQl1qtSVpe6apkQNQCLcB/s1600/ima8JSges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ph9iqTOmEH4/V0K4s6eg0vI/AAAAAAABI_4/xinCcmWEtgYLNTnlgQl1qtSVpe6apkQNQCLcB/s320/ima8JSges.jpg\" width=\"306\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With this worldview, violence in thought,\nword or deed against a living being is contrary to the natural balance of the\nuniverse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Killing animals even\nfor food is bad karma. Karma is about the wheels or gears of time and\nsynchronicity bringing everything into balance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The results or\n\"fruits\" of actions are called karma-phala. Karma is not about\nretribution, vengeance, punishment or reward; karma simply deals with what is.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The effects of all deeds actively create past, present and future experiences,\nthus making one responsible for one's own life, and the pain and joy it brings\nto others. It is cumulative.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qISb7YooRog/V0K4cSlIFnI/AAAAAAABI_w/dLNadldeUyYSjSPEe63ECgNSYhzMlMiUwCLcB/s1600/ima7NNges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qISb7YooRog/V0K4cSlIFnI/AAAAAAABI_w/dLNadldeUyYSjSPEe63ECgNSYhzMlMiUwCLcB/s400/ima7NNges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>There are FAKE gurus\ncalling themselves SADGURUS who claim that they are &nbsp;acting on God's behalf, and can mitigate or\nwork out some of the karma of the disciple.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorry, Sanatana Dharma does NOT support this bullshit. &nbsp; All living\ncreatures are responsible for their karma, their actions and the effects of\ntheir actions, and for their release from samsara.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>There is NO scope for a\nBROKER or a MIDDLEMAN sadguru , like the Pope.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>SINGLE HOLY BOOK ,\nSINGLE MESSIAH RELIGIONS ARE NOW IN TROUBLE..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE ERUDITE MIND CANNOT\nACCEPT ETERNAL DAMNATION AT THE HOUR OF JUDGEMENT OR SALVATION BY SOME MERCIFUL\nGOD.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;HE WOULD RATHER BELIEVE IN KARMA AS IT MAKES\nSENSE.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">HE KNOWS THERE IS A\nSOUL WITHIN AND ONLY HINDUSIM ADDRESSES THE PASSAGE OF A SOUL .</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LLXGfaykdrA/V0K37oFUxSI/AAAAAAABI_o/Tv-fHGWqsrsUryOvu8f-MJ0TLy-iRsYcQCLcB/s1600/reap-whVVat-you-sow.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LLXGfaykdrA/V0K37oFUxSI/AAAAAAABI_o/Tv-fHGWqsrsUryOvu8f-MJ0TLy-iRsYcQCLcB/s400/reap-whVVat-you-sow.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">HE KNOWS ONLY HINDUISM\nCAN EXPLAIN WHY A BLIND BABY IS BORN IN IMPOVERISHED SOMALIA AS AN ORPHAN , AND\nANOTHER IS HANDSOME BABY IS BORN IN A COMFORTABLE WEALTHY LAND TO A GOOD CARING\nHOME</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fMOLANZPt1w/V0LIVKm1fpI/AAAAAAABJBk/R-ooYe9XHxwoBJ1DLZlkShc45yqek-JkgCLcB/s1600/its-all-about-fresssquency.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fMOLANZPt1w/V0LIVKm1fpI/AAAAAAABJBk/R-ooYe9XHxwoBJ1DLZlkShc45yqek-JkgCLcB/s400/its-all-about-fresssquency.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">ROTHSCHILD GOT BR AMBEDKAR AND EVR PEIYAR TO APPLY THE ABOVE LOGIC TO BRAHMINS AND SHUDRAS. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;IT IS NONSENSE TO SAY THAT A BLIND IMPOTENT BRAHMIN IS BETTER THAN A HAPPY HUNTING SHUDRA &nbsp;. .</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-nHmTna44uEo/V0K3eG533eI/AAAAAAABI_g/3C6c3jAOY08tHWxhN7g9wHFVYMV2f7MvwCLcB/s1600/imagCFes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A man with commonsense\ncan figure out that karma as an inherent principle of the universe without the\nintervention of any supernatural Being. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fA8dWEz6x04/V0K3pQT5IuI/AAAAAAABI_k/txxzqKG0LCQ4DBxppcI36j7FHsAUMFUCwCLcB/s1600/imagCes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism, God does play a role in deciding\nFATE while destiny is in man\u2019s own hands.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nBeing involved with karma is an unavoidable part of daily living.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma deals in energy. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is\nNOT actions alone which increases you karmic baggage but bad thoughts too.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vmeWgM988nI/V0KxfNK7lsI/AAAAAAABI-8/GBEpjRiko5My3aZJR5VBpr-y3yekYlHYgCLcB/s1600/imDDDDages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Hinduism\nbelieves that we carry forward the actions and deeds of our past life to our\npresent life.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b>And if one lifetime is not enough to pay for the negative karma,\nthen we will have to take re-birth to neutralize that in the next birth/\nbirths.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THERE ARE FAKE GURUS\nWHO CLAIM THEY ARE RE-INCARNATIONS OF SOME GURU WHO GOT MOKSHA BEFORE.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">THESE PATHETIC IDIOTS\nMUST KNOW THAT ONCE A SOULD GETS MOKSHA , IT WONT BE RE-INDUCTED BACK ON EARTH.</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">There\nare 7 astral layers\u2014each accommodating souls of lower to higher frequency<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma does\nNOT require a Hindu to FEAR god.&nbsp;&nbsp; Karma\ndoes not affect one\u2019s relationship with Brahman, which is the essence of\nexistence within all things.&nbsp; Whether\none\u2019s karma is good or bad makes no difference to the fact that we are\nunconditionally extended from the oneness of Brahman. &nbsp;God accept you the way you are\u2014 he gives you\nanother chance even in another life &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the contrary check\nout the Christian concept of Sin: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sin\ndoes affect our relationship with God in that we become alienated from\nHim.&nbsp; &nbsp;One of the attributes of God is absolute moral\nholiness, and our sin reveals an attitude of rebellion against His authority.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">In Sanatana Dharma there is NO scope for\nbegging to god for forgiveness- &nbsp;like in single holy book religions &nbsp;. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">The law of karma, which\nmakes morality like a law of nature, does not allow for the possibility of\nforgiveness.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Its consequences are\ninevitable and inescapable.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">In Hinduism even throwing pebbles with hatred\nat the 3 pillars of shaitan during HAJJ at &nbsp;Mina, Mecca , is bad karma for you entertain\nthoughts of hatred and feelings of anger .</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A holy dip in the Ganges\nor a pilgrimage to Sabarimala is a VRAT , a pledge to turn over a new leaf. People\nwhen they want to even TURN OVER A NEW LEAF , do a vrat as a ritual. It is a\nthousand times more stronger than a bullshit new year resolution.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non-violence, love, truth ,\nunselfishness, sacrifice, grace, honesty form the warp and weft of this vrat\nfabric.&nbsp; Optimism , courage ,\nperseverance , contemplation and fortitude form the fibre.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hNO0pDXiEaw/V0LSRT9TbSI/AAAAAAABJCE/gVzDoU6VaZsOBN7SKM17aJBygMO-tCRbwCLcB/s1600/imageffs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word Hindus use for\nthis process of going from one rebirth to another is&nbsp; \u2018samsara\u2019.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Samsara means \u2018to cycle or go\nround, &nbsp;as a closed loop \u2019. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soul's journey from earth to a suitable astral layer\nof same soul frequency, then again &nbsp;back\non earth , till the soul frequency rises to be the same as the seventh layer ,\nfor final merge with brahmAn ( moksha \u2013final stop)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma ,\nthe future is based on the past.&nbsp; &nbsp;There is no favoritism in the determination of\nthe law of karma, for everyone is treated equally, and equal opportunity for\ngrowth is given to everyone as well. We have to experience our karma of the\npast. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Begging for forgiveness\nor doing faalthu pujas and prayers does NOT work. We Hindus do Puja and prayer\nto fill us with a sense of gratitude , resolve and hope. During Puja a Hindus\nfocuses his mind\u2014 and in the stillness of mind , the small space between two\nthoughts he finds pure awareness&nbsp; .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Elaborate and time consuming ridiculous Pujas\n( like Agama stuff ) &nbsp;empowering the\npujari &nbsp;are NOT part of Sanatana Dharma .\n&nbsp;.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God is happy if you offer a tulsi leaf\nor a flower with devotion. God does NOT allow a Hindu to waste excessive money\nor time doing pujas.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Patram Pushpam Phalam\nToyam<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yo Mey Bhaktya\nPrayacchati<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Tad Aham\nBhakty-upahritam<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Asnaami\nPrayatatmanah\"</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"I accept a leaf,\nflower, fruit or water<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or whatever is offered\nwith devotion\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord\nKrishna in Bhagad Gita&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0_EMpgC4gCs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0_EMpgC4gCs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Festivals are of course a time to release stress by having\na rip-roaring and joyful time by social bonding.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Putting\nlot of money or gold into a temple bhandar does NOT work. &nbsp;&nbsp;These are all FAKE practices started by the\nFAKE mutts of Jew Rothschild. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Charity to the deserving is good Karma.But if\nyou do it as a self propaganda it is very harmful with exponential bad Karma\naccumulating . Sabarimala and Thrissur Pooram are example of mass consciousness\n. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>In Sanatana Dharma only ghee is\nsacrificed \u2013</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>NO blood is ever spilt.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the propaganda by\nFAKE mutts of Rothschild that Hindu &nbsp;priests are to be treated as representations\nof the divine and are given offerings and gifts at the end of the ritual. Yes,\nsince he does NOT get a salary, he needs to survive .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He needs to buy essentials for prasadam .My\nwife always gives ghee and sesame oil to temples she visits. &nbsp;&nbsp;She hates to visit temples which are too poor\nto put oil to light lamps.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire aim of\nperforming the puja is to have a sense of gratitude which centres your body,\nmind and spirit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The post of broker or\nmiddleman Pope is eliminated. &nbsp;&nbsp;Power is with\nthe masses NOT a spiritual leader . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">800\nyears of slavery could NOT kill Hinduism , because there was NO head to\ndecapitate, &nbsp;and the body was too big and strong.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GI_L0mL-8ss/V0LcW3Wq5VI/AAAAAAABJCU/a8_jE157CLkx7R5PrkCiH1J0jg2QeBe4wCLcB/s1600/531b039f620d2e75a65cvvfbc85d6d5487.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;BrahmAn decides your FATE.&nbsp; However Sanatana Dharma does NOT allow a\nHindu to&nbsp; resign&nbsp; to destiny , because it is up to you to forge\nthe hinges of destiny on your own terms and free will. Conscience must never\never take a back seat.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu has to follow the laws of the universe.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism does not teach\nfatalism or determinism. Intense action while being IN THE MOMENT is at the\nheart of the basic teachings of Bhagwad Gita.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our free will is\nsubject to the influence of our samskaras, which are the soul impressions\ncaused by our past karmas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7674244518804879498\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_10M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. It is NOT self-flagellation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The four purusharthas or goals of human life\nare 1. Dharma (righteousness, duty and moral order) 2. Artha (wealth and\nprosperity) 3. Kama (desirable action ) 4. Moksha (liberation)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">KAMA PURUSHARTHA IS NOT LUST BUT DESIRABLE\nACTION. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">KAMA HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH LUST OR SEX AS IS\nWRITTEN BY THE WHITE INVADER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Purushartha means those actions which are\nproper and correct<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Kama is a broad subject which encompasses\narts, emotions, poetry . relationships and other sciences <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The aim of life of an individual is\ndetermined by the doctrine of Purushartha. It also decides the course of life\nof man and lays down norms and values for the behaviour patterns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Purushartha means \u201cPurusharthate\nPurushartha\u201d, which are the efforts made by the individual to achieve the aims,\ngoals and ultimate values of life. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The ultimate end of Hindu culture is to\nattain \u2018Moksha\u2019 or salvation and hence, man should behave in such a manner that\nthis aim may be achieved- and this does NOT mean wanton , debauched sex.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By Purushartha we mean the pursuance of those\nactions which lead to the fulfillment of socially approved values and goal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Kama refers to all the desires in man for the\nenjoyment and satisfaction and sensual gratification of the five human senses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">KAMA &nbsp;could be music or being creative or team spirit in sport or travelling to\nplaces of natural beauty or sitting with family at the beach or riding a fast\nhorse or participating in a arrow shooting contest &nbsp;- anything which brings delight to human life\nand spirit . </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>It has absolutely nothing to do with LUST and\nsexual orgasm. &nbsp;&nbsp;Kama would refer to the\ntotality of the innate desires and drives of man- &nbsp;motivations of man.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Kama refers to the\ninstinctive and emotional life of man, and provides for the satisfaction of his\naesthetic urges. </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sanatana Dharma wants man and woman to be\nhappy as this is the chief purpose of life and of course the final goal of\nMoksha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/64-kalas-of-ancient-india-for-girl.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/64-kalas-of-ancient-india-for-girl.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; THERE IS NO PUNISHMENT OR DEVIL HERE &nbsp;.<br />\n<br />\nHUMANS WILL TAKE REBIRTH AS A HUMAN AGAIN AND AGAIN TILL HE RAISES HIS SOUL VIBRATIONS TO MATCH THE SEVENTH LAYER ( VAIKUNTA )<br />\n<br />\nBURIAL RELIGION SOULS , WILL REMAIN ON EARTH --LOST , AND MISERABLE ETERNALLY.<br />\n<br />\nMUSLIMS ARE EVEN READY FOR THIS --THEY HAVE THIS CONCEPT OF DARGAH , WHERE THE LOST SOUL HANGS AROUND THE GRAVE.<br />\n<br />\nIN TEN YEARS ALMOST ALL CHRISTIANS ON THE PLANET WILL CREMATE THEMSELVES.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_24b+seedCVZyD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_24b+seedCVZyD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shruti ( what was heard\nby a medium in a divine trance ) is a revelation and unquestionable truth, and\nis eternal.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not many people know\nthat when Edison invented the gramophone, the first recording ( with Max Muller\nchanting ) was the opening mantra of Rig Veda written down 7000 years ago . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Edison was asked to\ntake a ship to England .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To an awe struck\naudience Max Muller on stage asked \u201c\"You heard my original voice in the\nmorning. Then you heard the same voice coming out from this instrument in the\nafternoon. Do you understand what I said in the morning or what you heard in\nthe afternoon?\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some shouted Greek\u2014some\nshouted Latin. Some linguists shouted \u201cwe have never heard such a delightful language\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Max Muller then\nexplained &nbsp;that the language he spoke was\nSanskrit and it was the first sloka of Rig Veda, which says \"Agni Meele\nPurohitam\". This was the first recording on the gramophone plate!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Max Muller said \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :\"Vedas are\nthe oldest text of the human race. And Agni Meele Purohitam is the first verse\nof Rig Veda. In the most primordial time, when the people did not know how even\nto cover their bodies and lived by hunting and housed in caves, Indians had attained\nhigh civilization and they gave the world universal philosophies in the form of\nthe Vedas\"UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then the Rig Veda verse\n( I surrender to the fire of transformation ) was played again-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire audience\nstood up in silence as a mark of respect for the ancient Indian Sages-none of them were stupid &nbsp;they were the best brains in Europe .- this\nverse means:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Oh Agni ,You who\ngleam in the darkness, to You we come day by day, with devotion and bearing\nhomage\"</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; It is the sublime knowledge revealed to them in their meditation by\nthe Supreme Divinity. &nbsp;The ancient sages,\nwhile doing their tapasya and sadhana, \u2018heard\u2019 the divine truths.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever was\n\u2018heard\u2019 by or \u2018revealed\u2019 to the great sages was presented in the Vedas and the\nUpanishads.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas are eternal.\nThey are timeless. They are without a beginning. They were not composed at a\ncertain time. &nbsp;Around 30 milliniums ago\nthey acquired the verbal form .&nbsp; This was\ntransmitted by oral route and finally penned down 7000 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedas are the eternal\ntruths beyond the influence of time. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Time or place can not\naffect the significance of the knowledge \u2018contained\u2019 in the Vedas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas are the\nboundless repository of \u201cknowledge par excellence\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BR AMBEDKAR AND EVR\nPERIYAR , AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD,&nbsp; DECLARED\nTHAT THE VEDAS ARE A WORTHLESS SET OF BOOKS . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS\nWHEN THE BEST MINDS OF THE WEST ,&nbsp; WROTE\nTHAT VEDANTA IS PRICELESS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whenever a difference\narises between the Shruti and the Smriti, the Shruti statement is accepted as\nthe final word. &nbsp;&nbsp;This means Smriti is to\nbe interpreted in consonance with the Shruti.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Smriti might undergo\nmodifications, but the Shruti can not be altered at all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedic Maharishi is\nreferred to as a drashta or a seer. &nbsp;&nbsp;BENAMI\nmedia calls any idiot who wears white or saffron robes as a seer.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas present the\nsublime form of timeless eternal wisdom. This knowledge is impersonal and\nabsolute, veritable and inviolable .&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Vedas are &nbsp;Swatah Pramana or self-evident. That means\ntheir truths do not need any proof, support or elaboration.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedas are NOT mere\nexpressions or FARTS as told by Sheldon Pollock , employed by a rags to riches cockeyed moneybag .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas encompass the\nhuman life. &nbsp;They do not belong to a\nparticular religion or a race or a country. Sruti literally means what is\nheard, and Smriti means what is remembered. Sruti is revelation and Smriti is\ntradition. Upanishad is a Sruti. Bhagavad-Gita is a Smriti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sruti is revelation\nfrom primary authority. &nbsp;Smriti is a\nrecollection of that experience by mortals. Hence, it is secondary authority.\nThe Smritis or Dharma Sastras also are books written by sages, but they are not\nthe final authority. If there is anything in a Smriti which contradicts the\nSruti, the Smriti is to be rejected. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Srutis are the four\nVedas, Rig, Sama, Yajur and Atharva Vedas , 108 Upanishads and Vedanta sutra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sruti commands nothing.\nIt gives direction only.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AGAMAS in vernacular are not sruti.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Smrtis</span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"> are </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">human thoughts ( recollections ) of Maharishis </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">inspired by srutis.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The smritis aim at outlining and giving a\npicture of how to live life in a way to fulfill the purpose of life, thus make\nlife meaningful. They also aim at reflecting Vedic worldview in daily life.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smriti keeps in mind\nthat real life is not however ideal, and recommends what is best. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smriti indicates what\nis NOT to be done for people who follow Dharma.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>It will NOT tell you\nNOT to eat shit or NOT to have anal intercourse or NOT to drink a woman\u2019s\nmenses blood or NOT to screw a crocodile &nbsp;.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;
