, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It also clarifies the\ndilemmas and confusions man faces in various life situations and explains what\nits stand is and why.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Based on the nature of\nknowledge, the smriti literature is of two types: one that expounds sastra and\none that outlines codes of conduct. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus smriti is a\ncomprehensive guide to life that defines goals of life, gives methods to\nachieve them, clarifies where there are confusions, and explains how to stick\nto those goals and how to correct oneself if one is going wrong in the\npath.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It also outlines social design\nsuch as various stages of life, functions of man and woman, various\nclasses/sections of the society, polity, administration, judiciary and polity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu, Parasara,\nYajnavalkya, Gautama, Harita, Yama, Visnu, Sankha, Likhita, Brhaspati, Daksa,\nAngiras, Pracetas, Samvarta, Acanas, Atri, Apastamba and Satatapa are the\neighteen sages who mastered the Vedas with their superhuman power and derived\nthe Smrtis from them.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smriti is authoritative\nonly to the extent that it conforms to the bedrock of shruti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smriti literature\nelaborates, interprets, and codifies Vedic thought but, being derivative, is\nconsidered less authoritative than the Vedic Shruti. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most modern Hindus,\nhowever, have a greater familiarity with Smriti scriptures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smritis are derived\nfrom insights and experience of supermen Maharishis and even avatars of Vishnu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smriti speaks of\nsecular matters - science, law, history, agriculture, etc. - as well as\nspiritual lore, ranging from day-to-day rules and regulations to superconscious\noutpourings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Texts like Paniniya\nAstadhyayi (Vyakarana), Gautama Sutras (Nyaya), Tarka Samgraha (tarka) expound\nspecific sastras.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are the ancient\nsacred law-codes of the Hindus dealing with the Sanatana-Varnasrama-Dharma.\nThey supplement and explain the ritualistic injunctions called Vidhis in the\nVedas. The Smritis are based on the teachings of the Vedas.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Smriti stands\nnext in authority to the Sruti. It explains and develops Dharma. It lays down\nthe laws which regulate Hindu national, social, family and individual\nobligations.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu learns how he\nhas to spend his whole life from these Smritis. The duties of Varnasrama and\nall ceremonies are clearly given in these books. The Smritis prescribe certain\nacts and prohibit some others for a Hindu, according to his birth and stage of\nlife.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The object of the Smritis is to purify the heart of man and take him\ngradually to the supreme abode of immortality and make him perfect and free.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Patanjali\nMaharshi, the exponent of Raja Yoga philosophy, recommends that ten virtues\nshould be practised by all men. The first five are: Ahimsa (non-violence),\nSatya (truthfulness), <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Brahmacharya (celibacy in thought, word and deed)</span>, Asteya\n(non-stealing) and Aparigraha (non-covetousness). These constitute Yama or\nself-restraint. The other five virtues are: Saucha (internal and external\npurity), Santosha (contentment), Tapas (austerity), Svadhyaya (study of\nscriptures or recitation of Mantra) and Isvarpranidhana (consecration of the\nfruits of all works to the Lord). These constitute Niyama or religious\nobservance.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UBGcpYqDp8I/V0RLy8XPk4I/AAAAAAABJE8/yaatbAEQUHctyrY4JJ77UoPVcsInh0DQACLcB/s1600/imSSSages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UBGcpYqDp8I/V0RLy8XPk4I/AAAAAAABJE8/yaatbAEQUHctyrY4JJ77UoPVcsInh0DQACLcB/s320/imSSSages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Swami Vivekananda gave Rothschild\u2019s\n&nbsp;bullshit \u2014 that power comes to him who\nobserves unbroken Brahmacharya for a period of twelve years.&nbsp; Complete sexual continence gives great\nintellectual and spiritual power. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The religious history\nof the world tells us that from time immemorial, India has been the home of\ngreat sages, seers and Rishis.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the great religious ideals that have moulded\nthe character of men, the loftiest tenets of ethics and morality that have\nraised human beings to magnanimous heights of divine splendour and all the\nsublime truths of spirituality that have made men divine and have moulded the\nspiritual ideals of nations and saviours of mankind, first arose in India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus have had a\nculture, civilisation and religion millennia older than those of any other\ncountry or people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even today the west wonders why 800 years of slavery could NOT\nsnuff out Hinduism. This is because of the inherent goodness within. Culture\nand civilization originate as a seed from Sanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu culture is a\nculture of love, respect, honoring others and humbling one's own ego so that\nthe inner nature, which is naturally pure and modest, will shine forth. Here we\nhave described some of the important faith and behaviors of Hindu community.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just because a Hindu is\npeace loving Islamic terrorists think we are cowards. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Think again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once when me and my\nwife were walking past a English village , an old lady who was tending to her\nrose garden came running. She told my wife , India is the only nation on the\nplanet where elders are respected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Respect for elders is a\nkeystone of Hindu culture. This genuine acknowledgment of seniority is\ndemonstrated through endearing customs, such as sitting to the left of elders,\nbringing gifts on special occasions, not sitting while they are standing, not\nspeaking excessively, not yawning or stretching, not putting one's opinions\nforward strongly, not contradicting or arguing, seeking their advice and\nblessings, giving them first choice in all matters, even serving their food\nfirst.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have TU and AAP\nterms . In Kerala even if the servant is one year older we have to address as elder\nbrother . An old woman even if a cook will be addressed as grandmother. If we don\u2019t\ndo that , people will say that we don\u2019t have culture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The practice of\ntouching feet exists only in India. We touch the feet or parents and\ngrandparents.. A dancer or a musician touches the feet of his or her teacher\nbefore and after each lesson. Children prostrate and touch the feet of their\nmother and father at festivals and at special times, such as birthdays and\nbefore departing on a long journey.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We do NOT give fees to\ngurus , this is called \u201cdakshina\u201d with respect inherent, and we get a return\nblessing . We give wages with the right hand, because we used the left hand\nonly for unclean purposes.&nbsp; We do NOT\nwear shoes inside the homes or in temples.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Married Hindu couples do NOT kiss in\npublic or display excessive affection . Any foreigner who first comes to India\nstares at Indian women &nbsp;in public places \u2013\namazed by their modesty , humility and their wholeheartedness is serving husband\nand children..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian women do NOT smoke or drink alcohol ( wannabe gora gaands\nexempted ).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No guest ever leaves an Indian home without being served\nrefreshments . If the lady of the house is in home alone and a male visitor\ncomes to see her husband, it is not proper for her to invite him in, nor for\nhim to expect to enter. Rather, he will leave a message and depart.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus\nstrive to keep a pleasant expression on their face, a gentle smile and a kind\nword for everyone they meet through the day. Youth are taught\nto be sensitive to the thoughts and feelings of others in their body language.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An Indian smiles with his eyes. &nbsp;He give\nNO empty thank yous. &nbsp;&nbsp;India is a huge\ncountry despite the white invader amputating Pakistan and Bangladesh. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Uzbekistan&nbsp;\n/&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 8&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Venezuela/&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 27 &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Vietnam/&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Western marriages fail because\ntheir do NOT have spirituality in their culture. Indian marriages are made in\nheaven ( wannabe gora gaands exempted )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is too much of\nDRIP DRIP nagging at home..&nbsp; Nagging\nfocuses on what a person is not doing,&nbsp;\nand hence has a negative focus . &nbsp;&nbsp;Most of the nagging takes place in a western\nhome , as they have love marriages where the equation is 50:50.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before they get married\nthey show the best profile to each other. The man will pull a chair, open the\ndoor, wish good morning darling , cook for her etc&nbsp;&nbsp; After two months of marriage , the sexual\nattraction weakens and slowly they start noticing each other\u2019s warts,&nbsp; which were camouflaged before .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Previously he used to wake her up with\nbreakfast including FRY EGG in bed and kisses galore.&nbsp;&nbsp; Now\nhe expects bed tea from her, with NO kiss in sight..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an arranged marriage\nthe equation is never 50:50,&nbsp; for there\ncan never be two captains on one single ship.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nRather it is 49:51.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Love marriages end in nagging,\nwith a few months \u2014the vicious verbal abuses,&nbsp;\nthe demeaning talk,&nbsp; the blame\ngame, the one upmanship,&nbsp; the personal\nattacks,&nbsp; the immoral manipulations (\neven to get a dish washed ),&nbsp; the need to\nmake the husband feel stupid , the heartache rising out of vulgar ultimatums,\nthe endless pestering\u2014nay- hectoring , does not put a man into a giving mood\u2014\nand thus a vicious cycle is born.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nagging&nbsp; promotes negative and destructive emotions\nsuch as vitriolic censure, anger, condemnation and deep emotional agitation cum\nresentment in both partners.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a happy home, there is\nnever be a call to surrender your dignity.&nbsp;\nSupport is invited not commandeered. ( Pickle Johns and Chutney Marys\nexempted )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In arranged marriages\nwe avoid, all these petty quarrels, as both husband and wife come from the same\nculture, and they know what their parents did and how they managed their daily\nmundane chores.&nbsp; This division of household\nchores has come down generations, since antiquity. Therein lies the magic<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this is NOT\nengraved in stone.&nbsp; There is give and\ntake in a pleasant graceful atmosphere.&nbsp;\nIn Hindu homes we do NOT have raised voices.&nbsp; It does NOT means there can be no\ndisagreements at home.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Truth and tact\nco-exists with grace in a Hindu home.&nbsp; Even if there is a\nminor argument, the aim is progress for the family and household , never\npersonal victory and one upmanship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A nagging western woman\nsweats the small stuff for no reason at all and loses grace under this self\nimposed pressure. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is what happens when\nyou have too much of sex and too mnay sexual partners before marriage. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">How many times she lost a panties outside\nhome.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; She has lost her&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">femininity. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed a blush is the most\npowerful charm of a woman.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">######## THE NEXT THING\nI WROTE WAS THAT HE WOULD DO PROPAGANDA FOR HIS OWN GODDESS BHAIRAVI \u2013HE CALLS\nIT LINGA BHAIRAVI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BEFORE THE WHITE\nINVADER CAME TO INDIA WE NEVER HEARD OF BHAIRAVA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Check out the nonsense\nin Wikipedia<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: He is naked\nexcept for garlands of skulls and a coiled snake around his neck. In his four\nhands, he carries a noose, trident, drum, and skull. He is often shown\naccompanied by a dog. The origin of Bhairava can be traced to a conversation\nbetween Brahma and Vishnu which is recounted in the Shiv Mahapuran. In it,\nVishnu inquired of Brahma, \"Who is the supreme creator of the\nUniverse?\" Arrogantly, Brahma told Vishnu to worship him as Supreme\nCreator. One day, Brahma thought \"I have five heads. Shiva also has five\nheads. I can do everything that Shiva does and therefore I am Shiva.\"\nBrahma became a little egotistical as a result of this. Additionally, he began\nto forge the work of Shiva and also started interfering in what Shiva was\nsupposed to be doing. Consequently, Mahadeva (Shiva) threw a small nail from\nhis finger which assumed the form of Kala Bhairava and casually went to cut off\none of Brahma's heads. The skull of Brahma is held in the hands of Kala\nBhairava; Brahma Kapala in the hands of Kala Bhairava and Brahma\u2019s ego was\ndestroyed and he became enlightened. From then on, he became useful to himself,\nto the world and deeply grateful to Shiva. In the form of the Kala Bhairava.&nbsp;&nbsp; The Hindu reformer, Adi Sankara, has written\na hymn on Kala Bhairava of Kashi which is called Kala Bhairav Ashtakam.[9] : UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bhairava<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ABOVE BULLSHIT STORY IS\nNOT THERE IN OUR PURANAS- &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMA / VISHNU/ SHIVA\nARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SADGURU HAS MANAGED TO\nPUT HIS FAKE LINGA BHAIRAVI GODDESS HE CREATED IN WIKIPEDIA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>SANATANA DHARMA DOES\nNOT ALLOW SELF DECLARED &nbsp;GURUS TO STAY IN 5 STAR HOTELS IN LUXURY, FLEECING THEIR DISCIPLES.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">since this girl was VERY vain, i decided to fool her and said --it balances my left and right brain lobes.</span><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">and then i made her stand on one leg-- destabilised her with my pinky finger.</span><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">then i made her wear my bracelet.</span><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">by now the entire gym of 20 people were watching us in a circle.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">then i pretended to try and push her off with both my hands -- there is trickery in this .</span><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">i could not ( TEE HEEEEE !)-- she was sort of WOW !</span><br style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif;
