They are NOT\nshy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA means \"\nthat which holds eternal Vedic knowledge\"-- encompassing everything from\nmicrocosm to macrocosm. DHARMA means \" righteousness\".&nbsp; Dharma leads to eternal bliss, both in this\nworld and the next. It is your sole and soul companion after death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-42LdmK170Gk/V0FS6AiUeEI/AAAAAAABI6Y/IevIxzcYrmselVHA_QANE17wSDU62tFuQCLcB/s1600/nsddddw.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-42LdmK170Gk/V0FS6AiUeEI/AAAAAAABI6Y/IevIxzcYrmselVHA_QANE17wSDU62tFuQCLcB/s400/nsddddw.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fundamentals of\nDharma as per the Bhagwat Gita are-- respect, truth, grace, restraint, love,\nnon-violence, restraint, lack of jealousy and greed, knowledge of self and\nausterity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma\nrespects the planet along with its flora and fauna. It is the only religion\nwhich advocates vegetarianism. Manu , the ancient law giver was a committed\nenvironmentalist. Manu wrote that polluting the environment was a punishable\noffence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu was a noble\nMaharishi. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;His image has been\ntarnished by the white invader so that he could WEDGE AWAY the unskilled varna, using FAKE mutts and agents like BR Ambedkar and EVR Periyar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_24.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_24.html</a><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu\u2019s laws in Manava\nDharma Shastra , are in 100000 verses in 24 books and was propagated from Palestine\nto Urals to Vietnam in 7000 BC by the great Indian Emperor Vikramaditya who\nruled these lands.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These laws were given 5300 years before Hammurabi who lifted\nwholesale from these laws, leaving aside kindness to the environment and social\ngrace.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Manu\u2019s laws a person could be ex-communicated from society for\nmindless felling of tress or killing of animals, the way the English speaking\nwhite man shot the buffalo and exterminated the Indian American , or how the\nAustralian Aborigine race was exterminated..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Manu\u2019s laws destruction of\nnature was the destruction of the state. Yet we Indians get lectured by the\nWest daily, nowadays , on antipollution and the need to be environment\nfriendly. The whole idea of Vaastu was to construct something without\ndisturbing the flow of nature and interrupting natural flow of energy. It is\nabout peaceful co-existence and comfort.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-MOtd1u9WNwI/V0FXlMtcSCI/AAAAAAABI6k/q3w-b4A8I4cEFVLwNLNp9s36I3GmF7JDQCLcB/s1600/1655890_10203273dd228658097_308366693_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-MOtd1u9WNwI/V0FXlMtcSCI/AAAAAAABI6k/q3w-b4A8I4cEFVLwNLNp9s36I3GmF7JDQCLcB/s640/1655890_10203273dd228658097_308366693_n.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu Vedas and mantras\nrevere,&nbsp; nay , worship nature , and its\nflora and fauna. Many animals and birds were vehicles of god. The deities of\nHinduism permeate the world of nature.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus are blamed by\nthe white man for illtreating women . &nbsp;&nbsp;If\nso why do we pray to goddesses ? No god is complete without his wife<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earth is personified as\nGodess Bhudevi , the consort of Lord Vishnu- the preserver, the middle prong of\nShiva\u2019s&nbsp; Tamas Rajas (yin-yang)&nbsp; trishul . Mata Bumih Putroaham\nprithviahah.&nbsp; Earth is my mother and I am\nher son.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You cannot be a Hindu heretic , because there is no standard set of\ndogmas in Hindu faith , written or unwritten, from which deviation could make\nyou a heretic. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sTkilQrdeqQ/V0FYgBVmudI/AAAAAAABI6s/gPP1sNhd8EMiF77Os4qG7e6xG_RdJthaACLcB/s1600/ima7jnges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sTkilQrdeqQ/V0FYgBVmudI/AAAAAAABI6s/gPP1sNhd8EMiF77Os4qG7e6xG_RdJthaACLcB/s640/ima7jnges.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Openness is the essence\nof Hinduism.&nbsp; Gratitude is inherent,\nwhich makes this religion noble . Example: A Hindu will never ever neglect his\naged and vulnerable parents.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Divorce rate within\nHindus is the lowest in the world--it is a mindset . Marriage is NOT based on\nlust, but by sacred commitment of 7 pheras around a holy fire. No Hindu woman\nwill go for silicon implants to save her marriage. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A true Hindu will not\nexploit vulnerability. Hinduism does not allow you to breach a trust. When a\nHindu says \"thank you\", he really means it. When a Hindu greets you\nwith a Namaste, he bows to the greatness in you\u2014the divine soul which gives you\nlife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is great\ntolerance to other cultures and spiritual paths. The heart of Hinduism is\noneness and inclusivity..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Remember , the soul has past samskaras . Dont ridicule a man who is afraid of heights</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UxgI36ys6qc/V0FY8zTtI-I/AAAAAAABI60/g9EKiBPhkHkKsBG1yFcVBkcCYW1Ys4hzgCLcB/s1600/imdddages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UxgI36ys6qc/V0FY8zTtI-I/AAAAAAABI60/g9EKiBPhkHkKsBG1yFcVBkcCYW1Ys4hzgCLcB/s400/imdddages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedic rishis had\nstressed, there are many paths to the final goal.&nbsp; Sanatana Dharma is a movement based on\nprinciples or evolved over time code of Dharma.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a relentless pursuit of\ntruth, flexible to suit all situations. Sanatana as \u201ceternal moral order\u201d\nencourages Hindus to seeks and moral truth wherever it might be found, each\nindividual must realize this truth through his or her own systematic effort.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism does NOT care\nfor individual leadership or hierarchy. Beware of the FAKE gurus who live in\nluxury by milking money out of you. These rogues live in 7 star comfort and\neven patent Yoga. They get restless if they are NOT in the limelight.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below: The frequency is OM- 7.83 hertz .&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WxIQi6EMpMA/V0FZhSK8OuI/AAAAAAABI68/YZwusaDa-oUW3WwS5KDffC_E-pVNzvmoQCLcB/s1600/imafrges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WxIQi6EMpMA/V0FZhSK8OuI/AAAAAAABI68/YZwusaDa-oUW3WwS5KDffC_E-pVNzvmoQCLcB/s400/imafrges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a religion\nwithout fundamentals or lack of compulsions. You cannot get ex-communicated for\nNOT toeing the line. It is a faith so unique, that it gives space for every\nother religion. Hinduism has never claimed to be the only true religion.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism has never converted , by guile (\nChristian missionaries ) or force ( Muslim ) -- nor has a army of missionaries\n, ramming it down unwilling throats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I feel happy as a Hindu\nto meet people of other faiths, and converse with them, without being burdened\nby the conviction , that my religion is the best, and I have embarked on the\nright path, that every one else has missed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though we use the\nBhagawat Gita to swear an oath, as set down by our British rulers in court-- we\ndo NOT have a single holy book, like the Bible or Koran.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the heart of\nHinduism remains mans' essential quest for union with the Absolute supreme.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism is based on\nreason and NOT faith--unless the faith is an extension of reason. It has its\nown beliefs, timeless traditions, ethics, rituals, philosophy and\ntheology.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism\u2019s universal\nworld-view and its willingness to accept and celebrate diverse philosophies,\ndeities, symbols, and practices, makes it a religion that emphasizes\nsimilarities and shared characteristics rather than differences.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu tradition ,\nunlike other religions --has always concerned itself with the human situation\nrather than the Hindu situation. Instead of basing its identity on separating\nHindu from non-Hindu or believer from non-believer, Hinduism has sought to\nrecognize principles and practices that would lead any individual to become a\nbetter human being and understand and live in harmony with dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Under the doctrine of\nkarma, the ability to make choices remains with the individual.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jews have never been persecuted\nin Kerala over the millenniums. Hebrew religion and Hinduism co-existed, only\nbecause Hindus are tolerant . They absorbed the&nbsp;\ninherent greed and clannishness of a quintessential Jew , without\nretaliation or retribution. While the rest of the world targeted the Jews for\ntheir inherent meanness throughout the ages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is the physical\nmanifestation of the law of balance and harmony, as it applies to the results\nof decisions reached and attitudes held by beings capable of free will and\nchoice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is beyond modern\nscience.&nbsp; Karma is the physical, mental\nand supramental system of neutral rebound, \"cause and effect,\" that\nis inherent in existence within the bounds of time, space, and causation. The\nsoul with past samskaras within us is governed by an immutable preservation of\nenergy, vibration, and action. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BrahmAn, the\nmorphogenetic consciousness field ,&nbsp; is\nan energy field both at the macro and micro level..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Om Isha vasyam idam\nsarvam, yat kincha jagatyam jagat'</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"All this- whatever\nexists in this changing universe, is pervaded by consciousness\"--<b>Isa\nUpanishad</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankara describes the\nnature of Brahman as such: \u201cThat which permeates all, which nothing transcends\nand which, like the universal space around us, fills everything completely from\nwithin and without, that Supreme nondual Brahman - that thou art.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As gravity governs the\nmotions of heavenly bodies and objects on the surface of the earth, karma\ngoverns the motions and happenings of life, both inanimate and animate, unconscious\nand conscious, in the cosmic realm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"<i>Without and\nwithin all beings the unmoving and also the moving; because of Its subtlety,\nunknowable; and near and far away is That( brahmAn )</i>\". --- <b>Bhagavad Gita, 4000 BC Ch.13,Verses 15<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just like\nelectromagnetic and gravitational fields.&nbsp;\nAll life forms are connected by \"morphic fields\" or strong\nintertwined energetic connections. Our separation from each other is an optical\nillusion of consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness is the\ncreative force of the entire universe. The entire universe is in fact a single\nliving conscious organism with complete awareness of itself.&nbsp; Not only is consciousness responsible for the\nphysical universe and its elements-- it is the universe.&nbsp; The field of consciousness contains\ninformation about everything that has happened since the dawn of time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMAN EDUCATES AND\nUPDATES HIMSELF BY A CONTINIOUS CLOSED LOOP OF EXPERIENCE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\"Om purnamadah\npurnamidam purnaat purnamudachyate,purnasya purnamadaya\npurnamevaavashishyate\"</span></i><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"That&nbsp; (consciousness) is full (perfect) ; this (the\nmanifest universe of matter; of names and forms being maya) is full. This\nfullness has been projected from that fullness. When this fullness merges in\nthat fullness,&nbsp; all that remains is\nfullness.\"--- <b>Isa Upanishad 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0Pn5oo24THM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0Pn5oo24THM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fabric of the\nuniverse, the primal Field, was created by consciousness and is held in\nexistence by consciousness. The entire universe is the consciousness of the\nCreator. Consciousness creates energy, it creates matter, and it creates the perspectives\nof space and time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a\nconsciousness in every molecule of matter. All atoms in the entire universe are\ncapable of mind reading and communicating with other atoms. The expanded\nabilities of self awareness is abstract reasoning, free will, creativity,\nforesight etc. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\"Prajn\u0101nam\nbrahma\u201d-- &nbsp;&nbsp;<i>Brahman knows everything.</i></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morphic fields underlie\nthe intelligent organization of proteins, cells, crystals, plants, animals,\nbrains, and minds. They help to explain habits, memories, instincts, telepathy,\nand the sense of direction. The structure of morphic fields depends on what has\nhappened before.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have an inherent memory and imply that many of the\nso-called laws of nature are more like habits..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morphogenetic fields\nare not material, but are more like biological blueprints giving birth to\nvarious forms. They carry encoded organizational information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upanishads, which form\nthe principal source material for Advaita Vedanta.enables us to realize the nature\nof ourselves and reality-- to recognize that we are perfect and complete.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahman is at best\ndescribed as that infinite, omnipresent, omnipotent, incorporeal, impersonal,\ntranscendent reality that is the divine ground of all Being. Brahman is also beyond\nthe senses. It is the basis of the material world, which in turn is its\nillusionary transformation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Adi\nShankara, Maya is the complex illusionary power of Brahman which causes the\nBrahman to be seen as the material world of separate forms.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahman is actually\nindescribable but Brahman itself is untouched by the illusion of Maya, just\nlike a magician is not tricked by his own magic. . When Maya is removed, there\nexists ultimately no difference between the Jiva-Atman and the Brahman. Such a\nstate of bliss when achieved while living is called Jivan mukti\u2014he liberated\nsoul.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most people seek\nexternal happiness from external objects, while the truth is that eternal bliss\nis within oneself and the search must be made within to attain this supreme\nbliss.&nbsp; All the pleasures that are\nderived from the external objects are trifles compared to that eternal bliss\nwhich is the Supreme.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">na jayathe mriyathe va\nkathachith nayam bhuthua bhavitha va na bhuya:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ajo nithya:\nshashwathohayam purano na hanyathe hanyamane shareere&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That Supreme Soul or\nParamathma or Iswara was never ever born, nor does It die. And since It is now,\nit does not mean that It will not be. That Soul is unborn, is always, forever,\nand ancient also. As the (human) body is killed, It is not killed. <b>Bhagawat\nGita&nbsp; [Chapter 2, verse 20]</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"As it is\nanywhere, so it is everywhere.\"&nbsp; You\nare the embodiment of all the Laws of Nature. You are the constitution of the\nUniverse.--<b>7000 year old Rig Veda<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Yatha pinde tatha\nbrahmande, yatha brahmande tatha pinde\"--\"As is the individual, so is\nthe universe, as is the universe, so is the individual.\"&nbsp; --<b>Yajur Veda 5000 BC.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Science, in its most\nadvanced stage, is closer to Vedanta than ever before. The intuition of Indian\nmystics led them to understand the multidimensional reality and of space-time\ncontinuum which is the basis of the modern theory of relativity.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Akasha \u2013the morphogenetic consciousness field\n, as per Vedanta is the source of everything that exists, and in which the\nmemory of the cosmos is encoded.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything we know,\nperceive, and imagine, every color, sound, sensation, every thought and every\nfeeling, is a form appearing in the mind.&nbsp;\nIt is all an in-forming of consciousness\u2014mind stuff- or Chitta.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brahmAn (morphogenetic field) is the\nreason why a partially formed biological structure (the 'morphogentic\ngerm\") gets attached to the morphogentic field of a species, which then\nguides the growth of the rest of the form.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness becomes\nenergy and then transforms to matter.&nbsp;\nForces of attraction cause the particles to come together to form nuclei\nwith electrons orbiting around them giving the illusion of matter.&nbsp; These atoms are attracted together to form\nmolecules. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Molecules are brought\ntogether by organizing forces inherent in the particular morphogenetic field of\nthat being or material, causing the creation of DNA, cells, tissue, organs,\nsystems, organisms, societies and on a larger scale, planets, solar systems,\ngalaxies and universes.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God resides in your\nDNA.&nbsp; DNA is a blueprint. It is a\ntransceiver for information at 98.7 deg F.. DNA has powerful Mobius coil which\ncan generate scalar energy, which cannot be blocked by Faraday\u2019s cage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is DNA everywhere\naround you. It remains unchanged for the past 4 billion years. In your body you\nhave 125 billion miles of DNA, which is 500 billion trips around the earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The DNA double helix\nlooks like 2 snakes making love, or rather a twisted rope ladder.&nbsp; DNA is conscious.&nbsp; It knows where to go and what to do and how\nand when to divide.&nbsp; It is a\nsupercomputer which can hold enormous information.&nbsp; Yet, it is so small that you cannot see it\nwithout a electron microscope.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva lingams, black\nmeteorite stones , rained on earth and gave the seed DNA to form first life on\nplanet earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An atom can be a wave\nor a particle depending on the observer\u2019s perspective.&nbsp; An atom is pure energy held together by a\nintelligent force.&nbsp; The conscious\nintelligent field lies in the empty space in between the electrons. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">99.9999% of every atom\nis empty space.&nbsp; What we perceive as\nphysical dense matter is actually 99.9999 % &nbsp;empty space - large electron fields with very\nlittle matter in the center.&nbsp; We live in\na universe created of \"objects\" that are actually 99.9999%\nspace.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE HINDUS CALL THIS\nEMPTY SPACE WITHIN THE ATOM\u2014BRAHMAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONE ELECTRON DROPS\nORBIT, OR FLIES OFF -- THE ELEMENT CHANGES .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This intelligent field of\nBRAHMAN decides why a electron should remain in a particular orbit. : Electrons\ncan change position instantly without taking time. They suddenly appear in\nanother orbit of higher or lower energy or distance from the nucleus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The universe is in\nperfect harmony and balance. The cosmos is a unified system. A little\ndisharmony and the entire matter of the universe will go back into the black hole.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kali is NOT what Teesta\nSetalvad understood. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lyVMfYV8iVw/V0FfmL4nI1I/AAAAAAABI7U/EXfQdFwSnWgtkg3m509NW2oE-nNPRq3IgCLcB/s1600/iD85magers.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lyVMfYV8iVw/V0FfmL4nI1I/AAAAAAABI7U/EXfQdFwSnWgtkg3m509NW2oE-nNPRq3IgCLcB/s640/iD85magers.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kali is a cosmic force-wife of Shiva in her destructor form<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-POmtxpivkXE/V0FfPJaPygI/AAAAAAABI7Q/vUQ0wzK1DLEnEJGQ5VM11ejtIzwfLMSCwCLcB/s1600/downlwwwoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"555\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-POmtxpivkXE/V0FfPJaPygI/AAAAAAABI7Q/vUQ0wzK1DLEnEJGQ5VM11ejtIzwfLMSCwCLcB/s640/downlwwwoad.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NFSIXTnQreg/V0F6kStnfbI/AAAAAAABI7o/7Wch_do8KyM9h8W0qArQDt9a0ZDQtZ_1gCLcB/s1600/trieeeemurti.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NFSIXTnQreg/V0F6kStnfbI/AAAAAAABI7o/7Wch_do8KyM9h8W0qArQDt9a0ZDQtZ_1gCLcB/s640/trieeeemurti.jpg\" width=\"440\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many people have asked\nme what is so special about the BANYAN TREE in Hinduism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well nobody has been\nable to explain this, so far .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now I repeat what I\nwrote in part 30 again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thousands of\ncommentaries have been written\u2014all way off the mark.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana\nDharma cannot be interpreted by Sanskrit language pundits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-URHz7shplr0/V0F6qSW7aMI/AAAAAAABI7s/sRaGgZNnIdgI-kUbLEqoANmTkMhAPPtGQCLcB/s1600/banyan-tree-water-refleeeeection.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-URHz7shplr0/V0F6qSW7aMI/AAAAAAABI7s/sRaGgZNnIdgI-kUbLEqoANmTkMhAPPtGQCLcB/s640/banyan-tree-water-refleeeeection.jpg\" width=\"370\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">######################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>OUR PLANET EARTH IS A\nSCHOOL FOR BRAHMAN ( GOD ) .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE MORPHOGENETIC\nCONSCIOUSNESS FIELD , RIPS OFF TINY BALLS OF ENERGY ( SOUL ) FROM ITSELF , WITH\nREDUCED FREQUENCY,&nbsp; FOR \"MISSION\nEARTH\".&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>EVOLVED SOULS&nbsp; ON COMPLETION OF \"MISSION\nEARTH\",&nbsp; ACHIEVE ENOUGH HIGHER\nFREQUENCY TO REJOIN THE MOTHER FIELD ON THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THEY GIVE BACK THE\nWEALTH OF EXPERIENCE FROM A BLADE OF GRASS TO AN ELEPHANT TO HUMAN JIVAN MUKTS\n.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS IS AN ENDLESS\nPROCESS , A CLOSED MOBIUS LOOP.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>VERILY, BRAHMAN KNOWS\nEVERYTHING BY SELF EDUCATION,&nbsp; DERIVED\nFROM SHEER&nbsp; EXPERIENCE&nbsp; . . .&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>LIFE IS THE MEANS BY\nWHICH BRAHMAN UNDERSTANDS HIMSELF.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">&nbsp;\u2013&nbsp; Capt\nAjit Vadakayil</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TDmR6EYiNSM/V0F8jqmFxjI/AAAAAAABI8E/EZ0xEDR7bRkrpzNZG-AA0vGaBUgvTT7owCLcB/s1600/verse-15-01-1d.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"163\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TDmR6EYiNSM/V0F8jqmFxjI/AAAAAAABI8E/EZ0xEDR7bRkrpzNZG-AA0vGaBUgvTT7owCLcB/s640/verse-15-01-1d.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\u015br\u012b-bhagav\u0101n uv\u0101ca<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\u016brdhva-m\u016blam adha\u1e25-\u015b\u0101kham<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">a\u015bvattha\u1e41 pr\u0101hur\navyayam<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">chand\u0101\u1e41si yasya par\u1e47\u0101ni<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">yas ta\u1e41 veda sa\nveda-vit</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Bhagawat Gita 15.1- &nbsp;4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The Supreme Personality\nof Godhead said: It is said that there is an imperishable banyan tree that has\nits roots upward and its branches down and whose leaves are the Vedic hymns.\nOne who knows this tree is the knower of the Vedas.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma (\nHinduism ) is allegorized as a giant banyan tree.&nbsp;&nbsp; This tree of eternity has its roots in the\nsky, and its branches reach down to earth.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Bhagawat Gita Vishnu\navatar &nbsp;Krishna tells Prince Arjuna\nbefore the great war 6000 years ago &nbsp;\" I am the Banyan tree \".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rightly after\nIndependence the Indian Govt has chosen Banyan tree as our national tree, for\nhere is a tree that regenerates unlike other trees, and is immortal .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In every traditional\nHindu temple there is a Banyan tree ( female version &nbsp;Peepal tree ) on the East side.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every single village in\nIndia has a Banyan tree who stood as a mute spiritual witness to deeds\nconducted under it. &nbsp;&nbsp;Every village held\ncourt, without written records under it, the tree being the sole witness. &nbsp;&nbsp;Under this tree people do NOT tell lies, lest\nthe spirits in the tree get offended. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Provoking the spirits\nwithin the tree brings misfortune and ill health. &nbsp;&nbsp;Instant KHAP justice was provided under the\ncanopy of this majestic sacred tree of wisdom. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People behaved\nthemselves under a Banyan tree, where the village deity is installed. &nbsp;&nbsp;It was rather an outdoor temple, with the\nmain truck having a platform built around it. .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jW7ld3hhiS0/V0F-Dj0Y7eI/AAAAAAABI8U/oZJHNYQw6Q0bWhQbpSTLeVNm4Wh0_w4RgCLcB/s1600/dacc7f26dcae200ead03d570DSSe6ceed42.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jW7ld3hhiS0/V0F-Dj0Y7eI/AAAAAAABI8U/oZJHNYQw6Q0bWhQbpSTLeVNm4Wh0_w4RgCLcB/s640/dacc7f26dcae200ead03d570DSSe6ceed42.jpg\" width=\"426\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is written in the\nRig Veda written in Sanskrit in 5000 BC, that the Vat Vriksha ( belittled by\nVatican as the banyan tree , under which greedy Banias held their shopkeeping\nbusiness ) has a spiritual role in human life and must be revered. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was always a wonder\nas to how ageless a banyan tree can be. The tree which Alexander the great\nwrote in his records , as providing shelter to 8000 of his soldiers is still\nliving.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also known as the Kalpavriksha in Atharva Veda ,\nthe banyan tree symbolizes Trimurti - Lord Vishnu as the truck, Lord Brahma the\nroots, and Lord Shiva the branches.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below: India's highest award is a banyan tree leaf -- the Ashoka emblem belongs to the fake and back dated creation of Jew Rothschild.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; text-decoration: none;\">May 22, 2016 at 3:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_14MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHi Capt,<br />\n<br />\nhttp://mathura-vrindavan.com/mathura/plinmat.htm<br />\n<br />\n[] At Kaliya-hrada Lord Krishna jumped from a big Kadamba Tree into the Yamuna river, in order to chastise the Kaliya serpent who was poisoning the waters of the river. The Kadamba tree that is here is said to be the exact same tree that Krishna jumped from, 5,000 years ago even though the Yamuna does not flow here anymore, except during the rainy season when the river floods. []<br />\n<br />\nIt's been more than a decade when I saw this tree, but there were new leaves sprouting from the branches.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_14BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE\nBHAKTI MOVEMENT WAS CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD, TO STRIKE AT THE\nROOTS OF KARMA PHILOSOPHY OF SANATANA DHARMA, USING HIS FAKE AND BACKDATED\nDASAs.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
