font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">Let me\nquote Wikipedia<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">QUOTE:\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Bhakti movement originated in\nSouth India during the seventh century CE, spread northwards from Tamil Nadu\nthrough Karnataka and Maharashtra, and gained wide acceptance in\nfifteenth-century Bengal and northern India.[1]<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The\nmovement started with the Saiva Nayanars[41] and the Vaisnava Alvars. Their\nefforts ultimately help spread bhakti poetry and ideas throughout India by the\n12th\u201318th century CE.[41][42] <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">According\nto Wendy Doniger, the nature of Bhakti movement may have been affected by the\n\"surrender to god\" daily practices of Islam when it arrived in India.[48]\nIn turn it influenced devotional practices in Islam such as Sufism,[53] and\nother religions in India from 15th century onwards, such as Sikhism,\nChristianity,[54] and Jainism.[55] :&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The\nBhakti movement witnessed a surge in Hindu literature in regional languages,\nparticularly in the form of devotional poems and music.[12][57][58] This\nliterature includes the writings of the Alvars and Nayanars, poems of\nAndal,[59] Basava,[60] Bhagat Pipa,[61] Allama Prabhu, Akka Mahadevi, Kabir,\nNanak (founder of Sikhism),[60] Tulsidas, Gusainji, Ghananand,[59] Ramananda\n(founder of Ramanandi Sampradaya),[62] Raskhan,[63] Ravidas,[60] Jayadeva,[59]\nNamdev,[60] Tukaram, Mirabai,[40] Ramprasad Sen,[64] Sankardev,[65] Vallabha\nAcharya,[60] Narsinh Mehta,[66] Gangasati[67] and the teachings of saints like\nCaitanya.[68] <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Most\nscholars state that Bhakti movement provided women and members of the Shudra\nand untouchable communities an inclusive path to spiritual salvation.[75]: UNQUOTE\n</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bhakti_movement%23cite_note-73\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bhakti_movement#cite_note-73</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">SORRY\n, KERALA NEVER HAD THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT AND IT IS NONSENSE TO SUGGEST THAT THIS\nFAKE MOVEMENT CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD STARTED FROM KERALA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">ADI SHANKARACHARYA\nEXISTED 4000 YEARS AGO, AND IS NOT PART OF THE FAKE BHAKTI MOVEMENT. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">EVERY\nBHAKTI MOVEMENT HERO WE GOT TO STUDY IN OUR NCERT BOOKS ARE FAKE AND BACKDATED\nCREATIONS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">Bhakti\nwas touted by the FAKE and backdated mutts of the white invader as the easiest and\nfastest way &nbsp;to get Moksha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">We in\nIndia never heard of the Bhakti movement as all the heroes associated with it\ntill the white invader came to India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">Before\nthe white invader came to India, &nbsp;yes we\nhas Bhakti Yoga devoted to Shiva, Vishnu, Brahma, Ganesha , Murugan, Rama,\nKrishna , Lakshmi, &nbsp;Parvati ( and her\nforms Durga/ Kali / Shakti) &nbsp;, &nbsp;Saraswati . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;People prayed in homes and temples.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">BUT\nTHERE IS NO TOTAL SURRENDER TO GOD, &nbsp;DOING NOTHING BUT PRAYING &nbsp;.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">WE\nHAVE OUR VANAPRASTA AND SANYAS STAGES \u2013&nbsp; ONLY\nAFTER GRIHASTA STAGE ( MARRIED LIFE ) IS A SUCCESS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">Bhakti\nYoga was to soften the heart and removes jealousy, hatred, lust, anger, egoism,\npride and arrogance\u2014 and to infuse joy, divine ecstasy, bliss, peace and knowledge.\nThis process indeed made you lighten your karmic baggage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">\u201cOne\ncan understand Me as I am, as the Supreme Personality of Godhead, only by\ndevotional service. And when one is in full consciousness of Me by such\ndevotion, he can enter into the kingdom of God\u201d (<b>Bhagawad Gita 18.55 4000 BC</b>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">In Rig\nVeda Samhita, Brihadaranyaka Upanishad, Chhandyoga Upanishad, Katha and\nKausitaki Upanishad, the word Bhakti has been referred to several times. But this\nrelates to Bhakti Yoga .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 300%;\">The Bhakti Yoga of</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 300%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 300%;\">Bhagavad Gita </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 300%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 300%;\">prescribes Gnana\n(knowledge), Karma (action) and Bhakti (devotion) as the three essential\nfeatures to shatter the bondage of material world and to serve the Almighty\nGod.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">The\nwhite historian wrote that Bhakti movement deals with the Indian response to\nface a new challenge that appeared in the form of Islamic religion &nbsp;and that Bhakti movement was the direct\noutcome of the emergence of Islam in India<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">The\nwhite invader wrote --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>QUOTE\n:&nbsp; The genesis of the Bhakti movement\nlies in the social evils prevalent in the-then Hindu society. During the time\nof Muslim rule in India the Hindu society was full of many social anomalies\nlike rigidity of caste system, irrelevant rituals and religious practices,\nblind faiths and social dogmas. The society also suffered from polytheism,\nsegregation, severe economic disparity due to casteism, untouchability etc. Popular\ndissatisfaction against the existing social religious evils was a major\ncatalyst behind the spread of Bhakti movement all over India. &nbsp;The Bhakti movement aimed at the purification\nof Hindu religion and liberation of the people from the monopoly and injustices\nof the priestly classes. &nbsp;The paths of Gnana\nmarga and Karma marga were difficult for ordinary Hindus to practise in day to\nday life. So the next alternative was Bhakti marga\u2014a simple way of devotion to\nget salvation from worldly life. The founder of this movement was a Keralite\nBrahmin named Shankaracharya who started it in the 9th century A.D. Gradually\nit spread to various parts of the country. The Bhakti exponents raised their\npowerful voice against different types of immoral acts like infanticide and\nsati and encouraged prohibition of wine, tobacco and toddy. Adultery and sodomy\nwere also discouraged. They aimed to set up a good social order upholding high\nmoral values.</b></span>:&nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: purple;\">UNQUOTE </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>This\nis pure kosher BULL.&nbsp; </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">PLAYING\nDHOLAK LIKE AN IDIOT &nbsp;, NOT MARRYING AND PRAYING YOUR LIFE AWAY TO GET MOKSHA &nbsp;?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">SORRY\u2014THIS\nIS NOT SANATANA DHARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">Most\nof these fake stories were cooked up in JNU and authenticated by white\nindophiles and their paid desh drohi Indian agents in literary fests .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">Sorry,\nthere was NO caste system in India till the white invader came\u2014we just had four\nVARNAS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Bhakti\nmovement laid total emphasis on Bhakti or devotion to God as the ONLY means to\nachieve moksha.\u2014 &nbsp;and that Bhakti was\nsuperior to Gnana or knowledge and Karma, or Action. &nbsp;A guru could lead the\ndevotee from the material world to the spiritual world.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>THIS\nKICKED LAWS OF KARMA AND SANATANA DHARMA THE TEETH </b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">LOT OF\nFAKE GURUS CAME OUT OF THE WOODWORK OR FAKE MUTTS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 300%;\">Jew Rothschild\ngot CHITPAVAN JEW M.G. Ranade, to write &nbsp;in his book, The Rise of Maratha Power <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; \u201cThe main results of Bhakti movement were the\ndevelopment of vernacular literature, modification of caste exclusiveness,\nsanctification of family life, elevation of status of women, preaching of\nhumaneness and tolerance, partial reconciliation with Islam, subordination of\nrites and ceremonies, pilgrimages, fasts etc, learning and contemplation to\nworship God with love and faith, the limitation of excess of polytheism and the\nuplift of the nation to a higher level of capacity both of thought and action.\u201dUNQUOTE</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>SANSKRIT\nAND VEDANTA WERE KICKED IN THE TEETH.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">THIS\nGREAT LIE IS BURIED TODAY - IT TOOK A BLOGGER TO DO IT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">DAT:\n22<sup>ND</sup> MAY 2016<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">TIME:\n1705 IST<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">SATYA\nVACHCHAN <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 300%;\">My\nrevelations now jump &nbsp;to </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>20.10%</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><b>THE FAKE GURUS WILL NOW\nCHANGE WHATEVER THEY HAVE WRITTEN AND WILL WITHDRAW THEIR BULLSHIT VIDEOS .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma , karma\nis held to operate as an inherent principle of the Universe without the\nintervention of any supernatural being.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Spirituality and culture go hand\nin hand for Hindus, and Western medicine is beginning to acknowledge the\nimportance of spirituality in healthcare. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus believe that all\nforms of life contain a soul, and all souls have the chance to experience life\nin different forms.&nbsp; &nbsp;Misfortunes in our present life are the result\nof karmic baggage of past lives.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Suicide, according to the law of karma, is not\nan option: karma cannot be escaped or deferred and its effects will only be\nworse if we try to avoid it.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma\nthere is NO concept of devil or shaitan (satan ) like in single holy book\nreligions\u2014an entity which is in eternal opposition to God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anything written to the\ncontrary is cock and bull injected by the white invader<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asuras and Devas are\nopposing forces in Hinduism.&nbsp; In Hindusim\ndevas are good forces while asuras are bad forces.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Zoroastrians Asuras\nare the good forces.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HijGfKD3pvs/V0G5UqDyP2I/AAAAAAABI9E/pCyKx3O23esEVYILnXQjnE1Qu_wPhJnywCLcB/s1600/untwwwitled.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"526\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HijGfKD3pvs/V0G5UqDyP2I/AAAAAAABI9E/pCyKx3O23esEVYILnXQjnE1Qu_wPhJnywCLcB/s640/untwwwitled.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaisheshika is a branch\nof Hindusim, which is nothing but the Advaita theory propounded by Adi\nShankaracharya in 2000 BC. &nbsp;It is about\nthe empty space within the atom at micro level to the vast askasha ( zero point\nfield ) at the macro level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 108 elements are\ninherent in the Sri Yantra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8500 years ago, Kanada\nmuni ( sage Kashyapa ) propounded that \u201cevery object of creation is made of\natoms (parmanu) which in turn connect with each other to form molecules (anu)\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">kavi\u1e3f pur\u0101\u1e47am\nanu\u015b\u0101sit\u0101ram a\u1e47or a\u1e47\u012by\u0101\u1e3fsam anusmared ya\u1e25 sarvasya dh\u0101t\u0101ram acintya-r\u016bpam\n\u0101ditya-var\u1e47a\u1e3f tamasa\u1e25 parast\u0101t</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One meditates on the\nomniscient, primordial, the controller, smaller than the atom, yet the\nmaintainer of everything; whose form is inconceivable, resplendent like the sun\nand totally transcendental to material nature.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<b>Bhagavad Gita 4000 BC (Chapter 8,\nVerse 9):<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 6500 BC on the banks\nof the river Saraswati the great Aryan Indian Sage Kashyapa, propounded the\nplanets first atomic theory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8500 year ago Kanada\nMuni propunded that when time comes for Pralaya and Brahma inhales, what\nhappens is that all vibrations stop which makes matter disappear. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is NO annihilation\nof matter as such.&nbsp; &nbsp;Rather, the collection of anu (atoms) reaches\na quiescent state where they do not undergo any motion and thus become\ninvisible to observation. The anu in itself is not observable, and is thus an\nabstraction. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kanada\u2019s&nbsp; framework defies the usual categories of\nrealist versus idealist, since for him matter in itself is a result of motion.\nIn this framework, time and space arise out of the motion that anu obtains due\nto its interactions. To this extent, the conscious observer is central to\nKanada\u2019s scheme.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern science has\nlifted from basic Vaisheshika concepts, where the division of time as past,\npresent and future as understood by the observer is said to be a consequence of\nthe fact that time is a function of movement. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaisheshika at the micro level is conscious\nobserver centric but it acknowledges that certain entities are necessary within\nthe conceptual framework although there is no direct way of experimental\nverification of these entitites.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For\nexample, anu \u2013 the fundamental particle of matter \u2013 is said to be beyond direct\nperception irrespective of the kind of instrument that is used to view it.\nNevertheless, its presence can be inferred indirectly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dravya are the building\nblocks of 108 elements which is inherent in the Sri Yantra .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kanada in his sutras enumerates real\nentities irrespective of whether they can be perceived through the sense organs\nor not. These are conceivable by the mind of the observer who is central to his\nworld.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are the nine dravyas ( 9 triangles of the Sri yantra ) and these\nalone describe everything existing in the universe. These are the building\nblocks of Kanada\u2019s world described through their gunas/attributes and\nkarma/motion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Space is one among these nine and Kanada recognizes it as an\nindependent positive entity which is neither absence of matter nor an abstract\nconcept. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Among nine dravyas, the first four compose the\nnon-eternal matter, mind is the eternal but invisible dravya and the remaining\nfour are eternal and incapable of motion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spatial separation can\nonly apply to matter since eternal dravyas which are incapable of motion can\nneither be separated nor brought together. Although mind can move, it is invisible.\nTherefore all that remains in Kanada\u2019s classification of dravyas is matter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The separation is an\nidentifier and the identification is with reference to the observing mind. It\nis also significant that the displacement of matter is observed relative to\nanother piece of matter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His sutra says that &nbsp;mind recognizes space when matter is displaced\nrelative to another piece of matter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both space and time are\ncharacterized by their guna/attribute of \u2013 partva-aparatva/ being together \u2013\nseparated. In Kanada\u2019s definition, the dravyas are understood and defined\nthrough their gunas/attributes and each of these dravyas is non-repetitive and\nunique. Therefore time and space can be recognized as two separate entities if\nand only if their difference is established.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Space for Kanada is\ndevoid of motion and therefore it is only the matter in motion when the cosmos\nis mentioned and space is still.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This fits with the idea\nof cosmological model of Vedanta in which time is said to collapse in the rest\nperiod between the cosmic creation and dissolution, and that must be true if\ntime is a function of \u2018state of motion\u2019 of the cosmos which comes to a rest in\nthis period between creations and dissolutions <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7vt7A3PDGJ8/V0HAkBYIoWI/AAAAAAABI9U/X-k3eJlWoD8BWlZCTiFoU-cB23y60d6twCLcB/s1600/graeephic2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"486\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7vt7A3PDGJ8/V0HAkBYIoWI/AAAAAAABI9U/X-k3eJlWoD8BWlZCTiFoU-cB23y60d6twCLcB/s640/graeephic2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idea of tanmatra in\nthe cosmology of Samkhya, which is viewed as a kind of potential out of which\nmateriality emerges, has features similar to that of anu in the Vaisheshika\nsystem. The tanmatras, the subtle matter, vibratory, impingent, radiant,\ninstinct with potential energy and collocations of original mass units with\nunequal distributions of original energy, evolve out of the Bhutadi which is\nonly an intermediate state.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have some mass and the energy and physical\ncharacteristics like penetrability, powers of impact, radiant heat and viscous\nattraction etc., and have effect on the sense after assuming the form of\nparamanus or atoms of the Bhutas (the created ones) which process is\nTattavantraparinama or primary evolution. In evolution the total energy always\nremains the same redistributed between causes and effects, the totality of\neffects exists in the totality of causes in the potential form.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9kiXgg30VFQ/V0HCIyjgj_I/AAAAAAABI9g/R2pBnoePNuYGdkdYXUFm_7dKO8Ci9anTgCLcB/s1600/vaisesika-philosophydd-32-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9kiXgg30VFQ/V0HCIyjgj_I/AAAAAAABI9g/R2pBnoePNuYGdkdYXUFm_7dKO8Ci9anTgCLcB/s400/vaisesika-philosophydd-32-728.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The suksma\nbhutas combine in different proportions with the radical as its material cause\nand other bhutas as the efficient cause to form the Mahabhutas; atoms and\nsuksma bhutas cannot exist in the phenomenal state in an uncombined form. Two\npanus or paramanus (atoms) combine as a result of parispanda (rotary or\nvibratory motion) to form a dvyanuka (molecule), three of these dvyanukas\ncombine to form a tryanuka, and so on till heavier metals are formed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Except\nakasha, all other tanmatras have attributes of the previous ones in the\nsucceeding ones. The tanmatras are quanta of energy. Panchikarana is the Vedantic\ntheory of how matter came into existent originating from the primordial five\nsubtle elements. It is the method and process of the subtle matter (or the\nprior stage of matter) to transform itself into gross matter. Intelligence is\nthe subtle manifestation of consciousness and matter its gross manifestation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wq8UIZm6fXk/V0HCpDP4zsI/AAAAAAABI9k/2dYP2Nt_2agethpKbRZDwPLuZlmVJqIkQCLcB/s1600/law%2Bof%2Bmotion%2Bbfffy%2Bmaharishi%2Bkanada.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"394\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wq8UIZm6fXk/V0HCpDP4zsI/AAAAAAABI9k/2dYP2Nt_2agethpKbRZDwPLuZlmVJqIkQCLcB/s640/law%2Bof%2Bmotion%2Bbfffy%2Bmaharishi%2Bkanada.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>WANNA KNOW MORE ABOUT THIEF ISAAC NEWTON ?</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All famous Arab\nMathematicians ( 100% ) like Nasir al-Din al-Tusi ,&nbsp; Sharaf al-Din al-\u1e6cusi , Kamal al-Din ibn\nYunus etc &nbsp;who earned a name for\nthemselves studied in the Kerala school of Math.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zakir Naik likes to\nrattle off-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">AL HULL KULL &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">invented\nAlgebra</span><span style=\"color: red;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">AL BURR KURR &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">invented\nCalculus</span><span style=\"color: red;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">AL TUNN BULL &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">invented\nTrigonometry</span><span style=\"color: red;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">AL BULL&nbsp; PRRR </span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;invented Geometry</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"> &nbsp; FROM AN\nAWE STRUCK MUSLIM AUDIENCE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE IS GIVING AWAY\nINDIAN KNOWLEDGE ( HIS OWN WATAN ) ON A PLATTER , INDIAN ISLAM TO ISLAMIC FOREIGNERS . . . . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PATRIOTISM AND TRUTH TAKES A BACKSEAT . .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LEH LOH BAIYAA-- &nbsp; &nbsp;HUM BHI MUSSALMAN, &nbsp; &nbsp;TUM BHI MUSSALMAN IS THE STRANGE CONCEPT HERE . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>IMAGINE AN INDIAN CATHOLIC GIVING AWAY OUR\nWATANs ANCIENT KNOWLEDGE TO CATHOLIC ITALY<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>OR<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>IMAGINE AN INDIAN BUDDHIST GIVING AWAY OUR\nWATANs ANCIENT KNOWLEDGE TO BUDDHIST THAILAND<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>IT WILL NEVER HAPPEN .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WHY IS ISLAM SO DIFFERENT ? ( LIKE JEWS )</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorry, Arabs studied\nMath in the Kerala School of Math&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism, as a\nnon-proselytizing religion, never asks practitioners of yoga to profess\nallegiance to the faith or convert.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nYoga is a means of spiritual attainment for any and all seekers. Thus,\nwhile one does not have to profess faith in Hinduism in order to practice Yoga\nor asana,&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga is still an essential part of Hindu philosophy and the two\ncannot be delinked, despite efforts to do so. However yoga is NOT a physical\nexercise and Sanskrit mantras uttered with gratitude does wonders\u2014or else it is\njust 30% effective .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c257154024128215018\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_57M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>TO\nPEOPLE WHO KNOW QUANTUM PHYSICS\u2014&nbsp; VEDANTA\nHAS NIL&nbsp; SUPERSTITION \u2013<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>IF AT\nALL YOU SEE ANYTHING RIDICULOUS IN HINDUSIM &nbsp;, IT WAS INJECTED BY THE WHITE INVADER &nbsp;USING HIS FAKE MUTTS <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>RIDICULOUS\nTAMIL AGAMA STUFF / BHAKTI MOVEMENT NONSENSE&nbsp;\nIS NOT VEDANTA.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>EVERYTHING\nIN VEDANTA IS ADVANCED SCIENCE , MOST OF WHICH WILL TAKE MODERN SCIENTISTS\nANOTHER 200 YEARS TO FIGURE OUT.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8s9zMAcqBNA/V0KFPfmOS8I/AAAAAAABI94/pqobPyiqzuIvUOAyGEWMeE9d5vuvN607QCLcB/s1600/dow7775nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"223\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8s9zMAcqBNA/V0KFPfmOS8I/AAAAAAABI94/pqobPyiqzuIvUOAyGEWMeE9d5vuvN607QCLcB/s400/dow7775nload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Below: Schrodinger is the father of Quantum Physics --he was an exert in Vedanata. He became a Hindu and was cremated. He threw away the Bible and picked up Bhagawad Gita.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kKQa8yzO4gI/V0KGo2w6bOI/AAAAAAABI-E/4F_K6PLI6yYils2dvEUbSZ3qsNCPiG0eQCLcB/s1600/1004DD502.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kKQa8yzO4gI/V0KGo2w6bOI/AAAAAAABI-E/4F_K6PLI6yYils2dvEUbSZ3qsNCPiG0eQCLcB/s640/1004DD502.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IF VEDANTA WAS SUPERSTITION , BRILLIANT WESTERN MINDS WOULD REJECT IT.&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">PSSSST -- BR AMBEDKAR REJECTED IT-- HE MUST BE THE MOST BRILLIANT MAN ON PLANET EARTH.</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LZA92PRMSUI/V0KHMRst2EI/AAAAAAABI-M/I4N5w_kgEjUNS_oLU5xQ9zAyVdayeYzJgCLcB/s1600/imagfges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LZA92PRMSUI/V0KHMRst2EI/AAAAAAABI-M/I4N5w_kgEjUNS_oLU5xQ9zAyVdayeYzJgCLcB/s320/imagfges.jpg\" width=\"316\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per quantum physics micro\nSUBATOMIC &nbsp;matter do not exist in its\nphysical form, unless they are observed by a conscious observer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In every experiment\nwhen an observer expected energy to behave as a micro particle, it did so. When\nhe thought it would probably be wave-like, it was. And when observers believed\nit might start out as one form and end up as another, it did so. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means ,nothing\nactually exists in its physical form until observed by someone, was adopted by\nthe group as one of the concepts.&nbsp; You\ncreated them by your expectations and your thoughts of what should be. In every\nsituation in your life, including the wealth or lack of it you choose to\nattract to you. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thanks to the theory of\nERP Quantum Entanglement, originally asserted by Albert Einstein and two fellow\nscientists , Boris Podolsky and Nathan Rosen, we now have proof that what\nVedanta written down 7000 years ago is true.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are all connected. We are all One, sharing a consciousness with the\nentire universe, perhaps even many universes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum Entanglement\noccurs when two particles are created from a single source and then split in\ntwo in a laboratory setting. Once split, these two photons will be exact\nopposites of each other. They will be perfect mirror images of each other and\nonce created, they will ALWAYS mirror one another. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If these photons are\nallowed to separate and only one is exposed to a magnetic field to increase its\nspin, the spin of the other particle also changes (all be it in the direct\nopposite direction). The other particle INSTANTLY acquires the opposite quantum\nstate of the particle exposed to the magnetic field.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Basically what Quantum\nEntanglement tells us is that particles of energy communicate with one another.\nAnd it doesn't matter if the two particles are ten feet, ten miles or ten\nthousand miles away. They instantly communicate with one another. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This not only indicates\nthat energy is thinking stuff, it tells us each particle also knows what energy\nparticles elsewhere are doing. That means all energy, everywhere, is connected.\nAnd since we are made of energy, as is everything else, that means we are\nconnected, too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not only are we all\nconnected, we now know we are always right.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No matter what we think\nour circumstances are, our assumption is correct because energy is going to\nmake us right by picking up on those thoughts we hold on to for dear life and\nplaying them right back at us as our reality. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you think life is a\nstruggle, then life will be a struggle. If you think you must live a life of\nlimitation, pulling yourself along a track of fate from payslip to payslip,\nthen that track of fate is where you'll stay. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No matter what our past\nthoughts may have created, the moment we begin thinking thoughts of wealth,\nhealth, prosperity and abundance, those little bundles of energy will pick up\non that new signal and scramble to become physical matter mimicking our\nthoughts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don't forget that\nEVERYTHING is made up of these amazing energy bundles that not only think, but\nrespond to our thoughts, as well. It isn't just quantum physics that tells us\nthat, either. Vedic sages have been saying it for 30 milliniums. Now we have\nproof.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every form and process\nyou see in nature is the visible expression of a thought in Original\nSubstance.. We live in a thought world, which is part of a thought universe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are an energy\nsculptor, an artist, a creator. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You literally and specifically\ncreate your world by the power of your thinking. And once you create something\nwith your thoughts, your attention to it keeps it there. Is that not\nincredible? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are the creator\nand, along with God, the co-creator of your world and of everything surrounding\nyou. You are the cause that produces the effect.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The thoughts you think\nrepeatedly, the emotions you feel and hold onto and will not let go of; these\nthoughts and feelings are constantly creating your world, day in and day out,\nminute by minute, second by second.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You do become what you\nthink about. Because your thoughts, feelings and emotions created it, you're\nresponsible for it. Not your parents, or your spouse, or your children, or your\njob, or your economy, or your locale. Not anything at all except you. Just you!\nAnd what you don't like, YOU can change by doing nothing more than changing\nyour mind. It really is that simple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No matter how it might\nlook, no matter how it might feel: It is not solid, it is not real. It is\nenergy, pure cosmic energy, manifested into matter by the continued focus of\nyour thinking--by your consciousness. It is countless little particles of\nenergy conforming to your thoughts because that is what energy does. It becomes\nwhat you think about most. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Schrodinger wrote in\nhis book Meine Weltansicht:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThis life of yours\nwhich you are living is not merely a piece of this entire existence, but in a\ncertain sense the whole; only this whole is not so constituted that it can be\nsurveyed in one single glance. This, as we know, is what the Brahmins express\nin that sacred, mystic formula which is yet really so simple and so clear; tat\ntvam asi, this is you. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or, again, in such\nwords as \u201cI am in the east and the west, I am above and below, I am this entire\nworld.\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">[This is a reference to\nthe Mundaka Upanishad mantra below :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e\u0948\u0935\u0947\u0926\u092e\u092e\u0943\u0924\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u0941\u0930\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0924\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0909\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0930\u0924\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
