, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u0927\u0936\u094d\u091a\u094b\u0930\u094d\u0927\u094d\u0935\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u091a</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0938\u0943\u0924\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e\u0948\u0935\u0947\u0926\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u093f\u0936\u094d\u0935\u092e\u093f\u0926\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0930\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0920\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0965</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n2.2.11 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All\nthis that is in front is but Brahman, the immortal. Brahman is at the back, as\nalso on the right and the left. It is extended above and below, too. This world\nis nothing but Brahman, the highest.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Schrodinger&nbsp; speaking of a universe based on super-imposed\ninseparable waves of probability amplitudes -- \u201cThe unity and continuity of\nVedanta are reflected in the unity and continuity of wave mechanics.&nbsp; This is entirely consistent with the Vedanta\nconcept of All in One.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Schrodinger's\nbiographer Moore,&nbsp; wrote -- \u201cHis system \u2013\nor that of the Upanishads \u2013 is delightful and consistent: the self and the\nworld are one and they are all. He rejected traditional western religious\nbeliefs (Jewish, Christian, and Islamic) not on the basis of any reasoned\nargument, nor even with an expression of emotional antipathy, for he loved to\nuse religious expressions and metaphors, but simply by saying that they are\nna\u00efve--and will NOT understand Quantum theory and consciousness\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"In a famous essay on\ndeterminism and free will, he expressed very clearly the sense that\nconsciousness is a unity, arguing that this&nbsp;&nbsp;\n\u201cinsight is not new\u2026From the early great Upanishads the recognition\nAtman = Brahman (the personal self equals the omnipresent, all-comprehending\neternal self) was in Indian thought considered, far from being blasphemous, to\nrepresent, the quintessence of deepest insight into the happenings of the\nworld. The striving of all the scholars of Vedanta was, after having learnt to\npronounce with their lips, really to assimilate in their minds this grandest of\nall thoughts.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Schrodinger wrote:&nbsp; \u201cVedanta teaches that consciousness is\nsingular, all happenings are played out in one universal consciousness and\nthere is no multiplicity of selves.\u201d\u201cthe stages of human development are to\nstrive for Possession (Artha), Knowledge (Dharma), Ability (Kama), Being\n(Moksha)\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cNirvana is a state of pure blissful knowledge.. It has nothing to do\nwith individual. The ego or its separation is an illusion. The goal of man is\nto preserve his Karma and to develop it further \u2013 when man dies his karma lives\nand creates for itself another carrier.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cIn all world,\u201d writes\nSchroedinger in his book My View of the World (chapter iv), <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cthere is no kind of\nframework within which we can find consciousness in the plural; this is simply\nsomething we construct because of the temporal plurality of individuals, but it\nis a false construction\u2026.The only solution to this conflict in so far as&nbsp; any is available to us at all lies in the\nancient wisdom of the Upanishad.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(source: My View of the\nWorld \u2013 By Erwin Schroedinger chapter iv).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Schroedinger explicitly\naffirmed his conviction that Vedantic jnana represented the&nbsp; only true view of reality- a view for which\nhe was prepared even to offer Empirical proof.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(source: A Short\nIntroduction to Hinduism \u2013 By Klaus K. Klostermaier p. 168).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regarding mystical\ninsights, Schrodinger tells us: \u201cThe multiplicity is only apparent. This is the\ndoctrine of the Upanishads. And not of the Upanishads only. The mystical\nexperience of the union with God regularly leads to this view, unless strong\nprejudices stand in the West.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(source: The Eye of\nShiva: Eastern Mysticism and Science \u2013 By Amaury de Riencourt&nbsp; p.78).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In autumn of 1925\nSchrodinger wrote an interestingly personal account of his philosophy of life\n(Mein Welten sicht \u2013 My World View). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He completed this only\nin 1960 and in chapter 5 of this book he gives the basic view of Vedanta. He\nwrites-\u201cVedanta teaches that consciousness is singular, all happenings are\nplayed out in one <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">universal consciousness\nand there is no multiplicity of selves. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya is the material\ncause of this world. In all the apparently individual form of existence the\nindividual Brahman is present. Schrodinger did not believe that it will be\npossible to demonstrate the unity of consciousness by logical arguments. One\nmust make imaginative leap guided by communion with nature and the persuasion\nof&nbsp; analogies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While scientists like\nSchrodinger did not possess a direct knowledge of Sanskrit to discern first\nhand both the letter and spirit of Upanishads, there are persons like Robert\nOppenheimer who were not lacking in such an advantage. The fact is that\nirrespective of east or west, the great minds everywhere have perceived that\nthe ultimate reality remains timeless and changeless.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobel Prize Laureates\nNils Bohr and Erwin Schroedinger, the founders of quantum physics, were both\nconvinced that quantum processes are the interface between consciousness and\nmatter. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads were\ncollectively considered amongst the 100 most influential books ever written by\neminent people like Thoreau, Kant, Schopenhauer, Schrodinger, Werner Heisenberg\n, Tesla, Einstein etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"... those\nterrifiers of the world stood like two planets both deviating from their\norbits.\" -- Sanjaya, giving teleported , blow by blow account of\nMahabharata war to blind king Dritarashtra -- Mahabharata, Book 8 (Karna\nParva), Chapter 17, 4000 B.C.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 32 BELOW-</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_23.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_23.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jGwwcfAH0BQ/V0ExYNMCQsI/AAAAAAABI38/P5AC2PiDLyYKhEMBd_tdxnPkoTpHTtrhgCLcB/s1600/aaaaa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jGwwcfAH0BQ/V0ExYNMCQsI/AAAAAAABI38/P5AC2PiDLyYKhEMBd_tdxnPkoTpHTtrhgCLcB/s640/aaaaa.jpg\" width=\"324\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "149", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4860545511207616584/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "3712921343127655033", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2016-05-19T19:43:00+05:30", "updated": "2019-04-21T08:42:46+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTU1ODE2MzY2MzgxCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_19.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3712921343127655033", "title": "SANATANA DHARMA , HINDUISM EXHUMED AND RESURRECTED, PART 30 - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0LjUB7XAS5c/Vz3POxqsihI/AAAAAAABIpI/MF8PBrHTtnovdeRuDZoDFr2hJ46gRIx8QCLcB/s1600/we-are-immorEEtal-until-our-work-on-earth-is-done-quote-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS A CONTINUATION OF PART 29, BELOW -&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_18.html\" style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_18.html</a><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--FjJ_Im16m0/Vz7BvjPD7WI/AAAAAAABItM/OZqBMydrpCYme9hVyeDPXmTTfqLYwQzCACLcB/s1600/318892_185550364909949_8706311XC28_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--FjJ_Im16m0/Vz7BvjPD7WI/AAAAAAABItM/OZqBMydrpCYme9hVyeDPXmTTfqLYwQzCACLcB/s640/318892_185550364909949_8706311XC28_n.jpg\" width=\"572\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The laws of the\nuniverse seeks balance . &nbsp;&nbsp;Karma is about\nthe cosmos seeking to restore balance. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma manifests as a\nresult of our negative emotions and thoughts &nbsp;(fear, shame, guilt, anger, regret, hatred,\nself-loathing), not only towards other people, but also towards our self. &nbsp;&nbsp;If we let go of all this stuff, we will be\nliberated.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jiQkAEYpNps/Vz3N0gC3k6I/AAAAAAABIo8/YykK-sDe7TMZ2vdQNXwudwYCzHejf-23gCLcB/s1600/imaSSAges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jiQkAEYpNps/Vz3N0gC3k6I/AAAAAAABIo8/YykK-sDe7TMZ2vdQNXwudwYCzHejf-23gCLcB/s400/imaSSAges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">OUR\nPLANET EARTH IS A SCHOOL FOR BRAHMAN ( GOD ) . &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD , RIPS OFF TINY BALLS OF ENERGY ( SOUL ) FROM ITSELF , WITH REDUCED FREQUENCY, &nbsp;FOR \"MISSION EARTH\". &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">EVOLVED SOULS &nbsp;ON COMPLETION OF \"MISSION EARTH\", &nbsp;ACHIEVE ENOUGH HIGHER FREQUENCY TO REJOIN THE MOTHER FIELD ON THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THEY GIVE BACK THE WEALTH OF EXPERIENCE FROM A BLADE OF GRASS TO AN ELEPHANT TO HUMAN JIVAN MUKTS . &nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THIS IS AN ENDLESS PROCESS , A CLOSED MOBIUS LOOP. &nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\">VERILY, BRAHMAN KNOWS EVERYTHING BY SELF EDUCATION, &nbsp;DERIVED FROM SHEER&nbsp; EXPERIENCE &nbsp;. . . &nbsp;&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\">LIFE IS THE MEANS BY WHICH BRAHMAN UNDERSTANDS HIMSELF. &nbsp;</b><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\">&nbsp; \u2013 &nbsp;Capt Ajit Vadakayil</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-470ForegJmE/Vz7wczCYViI/AAAAAAABIxw/0dkhjtCad80DIznHBQ_BEtIQvNz7fHgggCLcB/s1600/25a9516467440b8ce3eee5d1693e204b49c.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-470ForegJmE/Vz7wczCYViI/AAAAAAABIxw/0dkhjtCad80DIznHBQ_BEtIQvNz7fHgggCLcB/s640/25a9516467440b8ce3eee5d1693e204b49c.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rP9FcClVYfI/Vz7DJhl5Z0I/AAAAAAABItk/_5j3ZPct4YgeqeCmCdg4epO7DpF34PRJACLcB/s1600/hqdRDefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rP9FcClVYfI/Vz7DJhl5Z0I/AAAAAAABItk/_5j3ZPct4YgeqeCmCdg4epO7DpF34PRJACLcB/s640/hqdRDefault.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Children who are more\nexposed to media violence behave more aggressively .&nbsp; They are taught by TV that violence is the\nway to resolve conflict \u2013 as when a TV hero beats up a bad guy to subdue him.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z4VPv0m-hZU/Vz6-SI5n9OI/AAAAAAABIss/v_6fRJpRznU0gGn946w2jtrGOD7o-x4ygCLcB/s400/iww33mages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The west is full of BROKEN families because\nthe parents are guided by LUST and materialism.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TT3lCjFShis/Vz67bBwE32I/AAAAAAABIsc/p_Ip6VMBmSA9mXkot3SO3NPEbgRaIIfAgCLcB/s1600/ximages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TT3lCjFShis/Vz67bBwE32I/AAAAAAABIsc/p_Ip6VMBmSA9mXkot3SO3NPEbgRaIIfAgCLcB/s320/ximages.jpg\" width=\"265\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What children want most\nis the parents attention. Bad behavior is usually an attempt to get attention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantrums are not bad\nbehavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantrums are an\nexpression of emotion that became too much for the traumatized child to bear.\nNo punishment is required. What your child needs is compassion and safe, loving\narms to unload in.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PI6DgviTJoo/Vz64sFuXZXI/AAAAAAABIrs/ler7B3mb7aIwaAvlLtGdOpDsmaPNXxh3gCLcB/s1600/imddeages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PI6DgviTJoo/Vz64sFuXZXI/AAAAAAABIrs/ler7B3mb7aIwaAvlLtGdOpDsmaPNXxh3gCLcB/s400/imddeages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEVER&nbsp; EVER TRAUMATIZE\nA CHILD --&nbsp; THE CHILD WILL NEVER FORGET\nIT&nbsp; --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;HE/ SHE WONT VISIT YOU IN YOUR OLD AGE HOME,\nWHEN THE EQUATION IS REVERSED BY TIME.. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KuB9Dylsgg8/Vz64IbzrVwI/AAAAAAABIrk/7iKQ98t04ost3h75_rzHbGQlZBN7wRYKgCLcB/s1600/dosswnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you beat your child , remember - time\nreverses this equation&nbsp; -- one day your\nchild will be stronger and more powerful than you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma does\nnot allow you to sweat the small stuff, like what they do in the west over\ntrivial things . Not everything is a big deal.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qNm3378Yku0/Vz66RW-mAoI/AAAAAAABIsM/QEAvFOiTtocIyseEMwqmLInOdmjrr4X5gCLcB/s1600/imagdxes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qNm3378Yku0/Vz66RW-mAoI/AAAAAAABIsM/QEAvFOiTtocIyseEMwqmLInOdmjrr4X5gCLcB/s400/imagdxes.jpg\" width=\"324\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The biggest punishment for a man\nis when his own son treats him like shit. The greatest sorrow for a man is to\nsee his own son wasting away. No man likes to lose. But when his own son beats\nhim in a game of chess or tennis, for the first time,&nbsp; he feels on top of the world.&nbsp;&nbsp; Remember this -&nbsp;&nbsp; It is a paradox you must understand !!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ABn9M9Org_M/Vz6_Ry-JU2I/AAAAAAABIs4/e-WDyeakFQwqPl5KLIPsOwOcDPG4VjYzgCLcB/s1600/imEESages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ABn9M9Org_M/Vz6_Ry-JU2I/AAAAAAABIs4/e-WDyeakFQwqPl5KLIPsOwOcDPG4VjYzgCLcB/s400/imEESages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindu mother initiates\nher child to prayer. &nbsp;&nbsp;As a child when my\nmother made me pray, it ended with by gratitude , by thanking God for his\ngreat, unconditional love.&nbsp; This busts\nworry. Hope anchors the child\u2019s soul.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jgm6LYsIn1k/Vz6455vBMCI/AAAAAAABIr0/SsWj2WxaO_oRaoVpfF1u_3Ximq6iSSjJgCLcB/s1600/imagfffxes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is NOT the type of\nprayer when you allow the child to sin recklessly and wipe it off with one\nFriday \u201csolidarity display\u201d prayer.&nbsp; What\ntype of prayer is that , where immediately after praying you run out as a\nmarauding gang and start killing people enmasse?.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; What does she know ?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_zEb7lRTxco/Vz65vQujYpI/AAAAAAABIsE/j8ddBSCoqUEAS00AJ06UgvYhIi-ErXeUACLcB/s1600/dodd%2Bwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; BECAUSE THEN IT WOULD BE IN THE GROOVE OF SNEAKING ( SNITCHING ) AND PERSONAL VENDETTA.<br />\n<br />\nIT IS ENOUGH FOR ME TO KNOW THAT ONE \"MAN\" SMOKED IN A FLAMMABLE AREA- TO MAKE SYSTEM CORRECTIONS.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA , I FOLLOWED BY OWN SYSTEMS - I NEVER CARED BY COMPANY SYSTEMS WRITTEN BY IDIOTS .<br />\n<br />\nYES- THE COMPANY HAD A CHOICE --SACK ME FOR INSUBORDINATION<br />\n<br />\nTHEY DID / COULD NOT , AS I HAD A UNIQUE TRACK RECORD OF RUNNING GOOD SHIPS.<br />\n<br />\n30 YEARS IN COMMAND , NEVER FAILED ANY INSPECTION. &nbsp; &nbsp;AT SEA EVERY 4 MONTHS WE TAKE OVER FROM WHERE SOMEONE LEFT OFF. &nbsp; &nbsp;LUCK NEVER FUCKED ME.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">MY SUCCESS AT SEA ( THOUGH I WAS A MARTINET ) WAS BECAUSE I DID HUMOR MANAGEMENT</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every person has a\ndestiny. According to the Law of Karma, our individual souls have some control\nover many of life's events.&nbsp;&nbsp; Throughout\neach incarnation destiny and free will meet, again and again. They intersect in\nour individual karma. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is the true\nspiritual law governing interactions. &nbsp;It\nstarts with the energy of a single thought, which develops and grows over time\nthrough our feelings, attitude, words, actions, and relations. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-92rDwnpeH9U/Vz7AaPZ0LmI/AAAAAAABItE/AJAffpZTt9g2xhYe9ZYpHi19BJxzXolVQCLcB/s1600/quote-karma-is-not-fate-for-man-acts-with-free-will-%255B%255Bcreating-his-own-destiny-the-vedas-tell-sivaya-subramuniyaswami-126-15-43.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-92rDwnpeH9U/Vz7AaPZ0LmI/AAAAAAABItE/AJAffpZTt9g2xhYe9ZYpHi19BJxzXolVQCLcB/s640/quote-karma-is-not-fate-for-man-acts-with-free-will-%255B%255Bcreating-his-own-destiny-the-vedas-tell-sivaya-subramuniyaswami-126-15-43.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The law of karma dictate\nthat every single action results in a reaction. We have a choice in what\ninitial actions that we take. &nbsp;Then we\nhave our free will to respond to the energy force that returns to us as the\nresulting reaction. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through our free\nwill, we can choose actions that bring success and happiness to ourselves and\nothers.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"512\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3sn33lS0Jvg/Vz7EbBJRbdI/AAAAAAABIt0/jLq3O8DUDOghv7him9Truu1cz3eBslfoACLcB/s640/ganesdhi-mlk.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Below: Jew Rothschild used his agents Gandhi and Martin Luther King Jr to tell the oppressed black man, &nbsp;to endure all atrocities and turn the other cheek, while spinning the pathetic charkha.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Bhagawad Gita teaches us to </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>STAND AND FIGHT&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bwQvSbmmHT8/Vz7Djpq-xXI/AAAAAAABIto/Lt_xaT1O4M0AjUb8ifCPZE82_ZRCpBjKwCLcB/s1600/imWRages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bwQvSbmmHT8/Vz7Djpq-xXI/AAAAAAABIto/Lt_xaT1O4M0AjUb8ifCPZE82_ZRCpBjKwCLcB/s400/imWRages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: Sanatana Dharma does NOT allow you to be a COWARD !</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TqqG8HEhNDQ/Vz7EzrPLf1I/AAAAAAABIt4/lq-Rljp3WnghOl-aImeAeyxjQ4M0G29RgCLcB/s1600/imddages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gpwVfI8GOSs/Vz7GrBBNdZI/AAAAAAABIuY/WyYMf4o7klMuogXqg7yvERtchscpSMIbgCLcB/s1600/stress-management-ESfor-teachers-7-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
