text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-O4XXfHyF09Y/Vz7GApyYFvI/AAAAAAABIuI/N2DHwb3T11wZe3QNNf_xLX9LcPZu0YZCACLcB/s1600/geeFGta.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-O4XXfHyF09Y/Vz7GApyYFvI/AAAAAAABIuI/N2DHwb3T11wZe3QNNf_xLX9LcPZu0YZCACLcB/s400/geeFGta.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: The white invader did DIVIDE AND RULE and taught us the virtues of NON VIOLENCE even as our &nbsp;watan, wives , mothers and daughters were raped .&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Bhagawad Gita taught us 6000 years ago to give MOONH TODH JAWAAB.</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-t-hD77OwN54/Vz7Ir9nkrpI/AAAAAAABIuo/D8oB7gIUPhsbkf4-Cfl-0zEdTI2sLI9HwCLcB/s1600/20W3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"508\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-t-hD77OwN54/Vz7Ir9nkrpI/AAAAAAABIuo/D8oB7gIUPhsbkf4-Cfl-0zEdTI2sLI9HwCLcB/s640/20W3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Bhagawad Gita is a\nchapter of Mahabharata\u2014 &nbsp;priceless &nbsp;700-verses in Sanskrit penned in 4000 BC (chapters\n25 - 42 of the 6th book of Mahabharata).<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>It deals with &nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">DHARMA, &nbsp; FATE, &nbsp;DESTINY, &nbsp;KARMA, &nbsp;FREE WILL , YOGA, &nbsp;CHOICES , &nbsp;BEING\nIN THE MOMENT , DOING YOUR DUTY, &nbsp;CHANGE </span>&nbsp;etc</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tEFhXaIP1Cw/Vz7LESDKTpI/AAAAAAABIu4/vJNkBQiiCqAfm6o4aZLOoC0wiBIAVcF5gCLcB/s1600/change_14DDS40149429.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"492\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tEFhXaIP1Cw/Vz7LESDKTpI/AAAAAAABIu4/vJNkBQiiCqAfm6o4aZLOoC0wiBIAVcF5gCLcB/s640/change_14DDS40149429.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u094d\u0932\u0948\u092c\u094d\u092f\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u094d\u092e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0917\u092e\u0903</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0925</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928\u0948\u0924\u0924\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u092f\u094d\u092f\u0941\u092a\u092a\u0926\u094d\u092f\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0930\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0939\u0943\u0926\u092f\u0926\u094c\u0930\u094d\u092c\u0932\u094d\u092f\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u094d\u092f\u0915\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u094b\u0924\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0920</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u0930\u0902\u0924\u092a\u0965</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">klaibhya\u1e41 m\u0101 sma gama\u1e25\np\u0101rtha naitattvayyupapadyate, k\u1e63udra\u1e41 h\u1e5bdayadaurbalya\u1e41 tyaktvotti\u1e63\u1e6dha para\u1e41tapa.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do not yield to\nunmanliness, O son of Prith\u0101. It does not become you. Shake off this base\nfaint-heartedness and arise, O scorcher of enemies! (2.3) &nbsp; <b>Bhagawad Gita 4000 BC.</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-94Jh6Qdxtyg/Vz7KfvAhRtI/AAAAAAABIu0/T8VeN1LqvPsQXPhq7NxDaM9NP2e57A8xgCLcB/s1600/DZgita-005b.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-94Jh6Qdxtyg/Vz7KfvAhRtI/AAAAAAABIu0/T8VeN1LqvPsQXPhq7NxDaM9NP2e57A8xgCLcB/s640/DZgita-005b.jpg\" width=\"475\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In essence, we reap\nwhat we sow.&nbsp;&nbsp; We harvest our karma.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The joy of living\nrequires our participation. Our actions and reactions continue throughout our\nlives. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is not crime and\npunishment at all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have chosen the\ncircumstances that we are living today through our actions in the past. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Free will allows us to\nmake choices that can modify and shape our destiny. Free will has a major\ninfluence on destiny.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WF5nbFvwdsE/Vz7dzZ3tv0I/AAAAAAABIv4/WfOsmsHrqgYfy3ZSOaoGtljHoyXdpq2pACLcB/s1600/downlEESoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WF5nbFvwdsE/Vz7dzZ3tv0I/AAAAAAABIv4/WfOsmsHrqgYfy3ZSOaoGtljHoyXdpq2pACLcB/s640/downlEESoad.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two kinds of karma\nthat represent our fate are: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Sanchita Karma \u2013 Our\nentire accumulated karma that represents all the actions we\u2019ve performed in all\nour past our lifetimes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Prarabdha Karma \u2013\nOur current life karma. Our prarabdha karma is that portion of our entire\nsanchita karma that is allotted to us to experience in our current lives. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two kinds of karma\nthat represent our free will are: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Kriyamana Karma \u2013\nThis is our free will to take current actions to change our current life\nsituation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Agama Karma \u2013 This\nis our free will to make a plan or set an intention to take an action in the\nfuture. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-O9vc9D3poLM/Vz7NYqKk5AI/AAAAAAABIvQ/4LnKnP3MXu42mspTxAgVrWq4_ob-gItIQCLcB/s1600/downloffffffad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"370\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-O9vc9D3poLM/Vz7NYqKk5AI/AAAAAAABIvQ/4LnKnP3MXu42mspTxAgVrWq4_ob-gItIQCLcB/s640/downloffffffad.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without kriyamana and\nagama karma our life would be entirely predestined at the moment of birth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma can be\nfixed/strong or non-fixed/weak, or a combination of the two. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the karma is strong\nthen the predetermined event will almost certainly happen. If the karma is weak\nthen it may be relatively easy to avert it. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rMXYPWwcFB0/Vz7bM-1JDXI/AAAAAAABIvo/MUZ5VXDjq8EqvzdXfHf85bbibBTiOClOgCLcB/s1600/bhagavad-Dgita-4-36.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"378\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rMXYPWwcFB0/Vz7bM-1JDXI/AAAAAAABIvo/MUZ5VXDjq8EqvzdXfHf85bbibBTiOClOgCLcB/s640/bhagavad-Dgita-4-36.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/EHqgUTzsQCk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/EHqgUTzsQCk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The three levels of\nmagnitude are:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Fixed karma (Dridha)\n\u2013 This is karma that cannot be changed by any effort on our part. Only the\ngrace of &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">God can alter fixed\nkarma (Dridha).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Mixed karma\n(Dridha/Adridha) \u2013 This is karma that can be changed but only with substantial\neffort. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Non-Fixed karma\n(Adridha) \u2013 This is karma that can be easily changed with some effort.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-A8Ztlgx0wAU/Vz7Ml45sdII/AAAAAAABIvI/7V1qiAFBHycB_1LfeyZwi1uIu_qbbkOdQCLcB/s1600/imfsages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-A8Ztlgx0wAU/Vz7Ml45sdII/AAAAAAABIvI/7V1qiAFBHycB_1LfeyZwi1uIu_qbbkOdQCLcB/s400/imfsages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanchita Karma is the\nvast store of piled-up Karma accumulated in the preceding and in all other\nprevious births and yet to be resolved.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In other words, it is the aggregate sum of yet\nunseen Karmas committed during innumerable previous existences.&nbsp;&nbsp; This is your total cosmic debt. It is the accumulated\nresult of all the actions from all our past lifetimes and from the current\nlifetime till this moment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus Sanchita Karma is\nour total Karmic debt (combination of Karmic Credit and Karmic Debit.) Every\nmoment of every day we are adding to the account by performing a Good or bad\nKarma. We also reduce Karma balance from our account sometimes by selfless\nservice and spiritual practice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From the accumulated\nkarmas (sanchita karma) a certain portion is taken out for being worked out or\nconsumed in this birth. Many ripe karmas amongst the accumulated sanchita join\ntogether and bring one life. This forms the prarabdha karma of the present\nlife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Souls released from\nrepeated birth and death are transferred to the mother field of brahmaAn . From\nhere, they never fall down to earth again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">m\u00e4m upetya punar janma <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">du\u00f9kh\u00e4layam a\u00e7\u00e4\u00e7vatam <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">n\u00e4pnuvanti mah\u00e4tm\u00e4na\u00f9 <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">sa\u00e0siddhi\u00e0 param\u00e4\u00e0\ngat\u00e4\u00f9</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">After attaining Me, the\ngreat souls, who are yogis in devotion, never return to this temporary world,\nwhich is full of miseries, because they have attained the highest perfection.</span></i>\n(Bhagavad-gita &nbsp;8.15 4000 BC )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astrology has been a\ntool to mitigate the magnitude of Karma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astrologers are like\ndetectives looking for clues. When we\u2019re looking at a chart and trying to\ndetermine the level of magnitude of a particular karma we\u2019re literally counting\nthe number of reinforcing indications.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oynGU3z3iYs/Vz7a-I78_DI/AAAAAAABIvk/TBXzSWj9mEcZ6Jc9wpu_fREVQ1nip2bDwCLcB/s1600/bAFGDRA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oynGU3z3iYs/Vz7a-I78_DI/AAAAAAABIvk/TBXzSWj9mEcZ6Jc9wpu_fREVQ1nip2bDwCLcB/s320/bAFGDRA.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\nsmall number of indications represent a non-fixed karma (adridha), or only a\npossibility of the event manifesting.&nbsp;&nbsp; A\nlarge number of indications represent a more fixed karma (dridha) or a relative\nprobability of the event manifesting. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BCl2FNdlYFI/Vz7awpPb1uI/AAAAAAABIvg/i95YuqQNQegPCcbg0r4VTt4r6rWcc1wmACLcB/s1600/F101.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"236\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BCl2FNdlYFI/Vz7awpPb1uI/AAAAAAABIvg/i95YuqQNQegPCcbg0r4VTt4r6rWcc1wmACLcB/s400/F101.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 'Law of Karma',\nstates that a points of merit is added to our life for every positive deed we\ndo and similarly a points of demerit for every negative deed we do</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">- the number of points ( marks)</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">depend on the nature and gravity of the\nevent.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Throughout our lives,\nwe are either settling an old account of fulfilling our destiny, or creating a\nnew one and once if it is not settled in this birth, it gets carried over to\nthe next birth.. Karmic debt can never be closed for it gets carried over again\nand again till we repay it. Similar is the earning of karmic credit &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything in the\nUniverse is in a state of creation, maintenance, or destruction. The cosmic\nforces involved in this are Brahma / Vishnu/ Shiva.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The trinity are NOT\nmortals, as made out to by indophile fakes of literary fests , Amish Tripathi ,\nDevdutt Pattanaik etc.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My posts on SANATANA\nDHARMA will carry over till the sun goes supernova \u2013like Vedanta . &nbsp;A few decades later people will wonder who\nthese jokers like Amish Tripati, Devdutt Pattanaik etc are.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The\nUpanishads contain such godlike fullness of wisdom on all things that I feel\nthe authors must have looked with calm remembrance back through a thousand\npassionate lives, full of feverish strife for and with shadows, ere they could\nhave written with such certainty of things which the soul feels to be sure</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.\"--\nA. E. George Russell - Poet, mystic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind creates a\nthought, maintains or follows it for some time, and the thought ultimately dies\ndown (perhaps to be replaced by another thought). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to the\nthree states of consciousness, the fourth state of being is called Turiya or\npure consciousness, where the mind is not engaged in thinking but just observes\nthe thoughts. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actions in the Turiya\nstate do not create karma. Meditation is a practice aimed at giving individuals\nthe experience of being in this objective state. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An individual who is\nconstantly in the turiya state is said to have attained moksha where their\nactions happen as a response to events (and not because of thought process);\nsuch actions do not result in accumulation of karma as they have no karmic\neffect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE DOT ON OM IS THE\nSTATE OF TURIYA, THE TRANSCENDENTAL STATE BEYOND MAYA.</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE FREQUENCY OF OM IS 7.83 HERTZ ( SAME AS EARTH ) &nbsp;, IT NUMERICAL EQUIVALENT IS 108, &nbsp; ITS GEOMETRY IS SRI YANTRA WHICH CONTAINS THE THEORY OF EVERYTHING.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-M1EQ-d3V4X0/Vz7iCN0z3BI/AAAAAAABIwE/FgT-w281ZSMyfCFu83LOJVJnuZzJQTCGACLcB/s1600/SSimagesCAWL6LND.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-M1EQ-d3V4X0/Vz7iCN0z3BI/AAAAAAABIwE/FgT-w281ZSMyfCFu83LOJVJnuZzJQTCGACLcB/s400/SSimagesCAWL6LND.jpg\" width=\"309\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Four stages of\nconsciousness : consciousness plus thinking is waking,&nbsp; consciousness minus thinking is turiya,\nunconsciousness plus thinking is dreaming,&nbsp;\nunconsciousness minus thinking is sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally, the\nsemi-circle symbolizes Maya and separates the dot from the other three curves.\nIt is the illusion of Maya that prevents us from the realization of this\nhighest state of bliss.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The semi-circle is open at the top and does not touch\nthe dot. This means that this highest state is not affected by Maya. Maya only\naffects the manifested phenomenon. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya thoughts\nsubside and one becomes increasingly more awake; the mind settles down and\nconsciousness itself becomes primary.&nbsp;\nMediators describe this as pure consciousness or unbounded awareness.\nOne sees the entire world and all things within it as part of oneself, and\noneself part of all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya&nbsp; is a state of transcendence, the result of\narduous meditation.&nbsp; There can be no\nconsciousness without passage through intense pain. The Upanishads equates this\nexperience with enlightenment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We ordinary people lack\ncontact with our fourth state of consciousness, and so we fail to live up to\nour potential as human beings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This utterly quiet,\npeaceful and blissful state is the ultimate aim of all spiritual activity this highest\nstate is not affected by Maya The Waker, The Dreamer, The Deep Sleeper and The\nObserver.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya is freedom from the\nlimitation of the other states . You experience detachment and joy .&nbsp; Turiya Consciousness&nbsp; is the ultimate goal of spirituality for here\nyou know what freedom is all about.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The dot, point, or\nbindu of OM symbol represents the fourth state, the absolute consciousness,\nwhich encompasses, permeates, and is the other three\u2014this is Turiya. (Silence\nafter A, U, and M of OM Mantra)&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TURIYA means\n\u201cconsciousness minus thinking\u201d . It represents consciousness free from material\ninfluence or supreme consciousness . In Turiya there is the absolute awareness\n. It is the experience of ultimate reality and truth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya, the self\ndoes not think, feel, or do, but rather observes thought, emotion, and action\ncapable of truly understanding the totality of the universe. Turiya has no\nlimits and no endpoint. It is infinitely transcendent, which means its\npotential is forever expanding.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are now a unique\nindividual and you are a vital part of a larger universal life force that\ntranscends everything on earth.. Reality and truth become more clearly defined,\nallowing you to perceive that which lies above, below, and beyond the human\nexperience. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHEN YOU ACHIEVE TURIYA\nYOU ARE NOW A JIVAN MUKT , ENTITLED FOR MOKSHA. &nbsp;YOUR THIRD EYE IS OPEN.&nbsp; YOUR SOUL IS FREE EVEN WHILE INSIDE YOUR BODY\n. THE SOUL CAN LEVITATE.&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PcWmkIRlCeU/Vz7l2gEqWNI/AAAAAAABIwQ/CaMt1qOKxXM1DIl8i-vQ_mSUq9SiXWlLQCLcB/s1600/moksah_10_01.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"173\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PcWmkIRlCeU/Vz7l2gEqWNI/AAAAAAABIwQ/CaMt1qOKxXM1DIl8i-vQ_mSUq9SiXWlLQCLcB/s400/moksah_10_01.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Guru said: A\nJivanmukta who has reached the Imperishable Turiya state can never be affected\nby the pairs of opposites. He always rests in his own Sat-Chit-Ananda Swaroopa.\nHe roams about happily.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The egoism of the\nJivanmukta is like a burnt cloth which has got the appearance of a cloth but is\nactually reduced to the state of ashes. The individual consciousness of the\nJivanmukta is powerful enough to maintain the existence of his physical body,\nbut it is not capable of bringing to him another birth as an embodied being.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;His Sanchita-Karmas get fried by the fire of Brahma-Jnana or Knowledge of the\nAbsolute Reality. He has no Agami Karmas to bring future births because he has\nno feelings of Kartritva and Bhoktritva. His actions are cosmic movements and\nnot the instincts of the sense of egoism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\nBY THE WAY LEVITATION IS NOT ABOUT HUMAN PHYSICAL BODIES DEFYING GRAVITY</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">Below: A bunch of CHOOTS. &nbsp; They will have slip discs when they are older.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/JyXAB5L3EIQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/JyXAB5L3EIQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">A Jivanmukta realises\nthat he is beyond the three bodies and five Koshas, he is the witness of the\nthree states, he is pure Consciousness.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Some FAKE gurus have\ndeclared themselves to be Jivan Mukts ( played their drama like Bollywood heroes\n) and got themselves buried ( instead of cremation ).&nbsp; Their souls are destined to be trapped on earth\nforever. &nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a burial religion\n( single holy book ) &nbsp;man had a evolved\nsoul, his last stage on earth will be , BEING BORN IN INDIA AS A HINDU . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The western Christian man\nhas understood this , and now wants to be cremated. &nbsp;&nbsp;The Muslim is stuck.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And poor Veera Shaiva Lingayaths-- their leaders were agents of Jew Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-P_xriKts5ZU/Vz7oKFFpEDI/AAAAAAABIwk/4O3hnFruB_o3RfMv7jP0evX7lDo-eDjsACLcB/s1600/moksddh_10_08.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He whose mind does\nneither sink nor float amidst pains and pleasures is indeed a liberated sage.\nHe has rendered his mind completely quiescent by identifying himself with\nBrahman.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Videha mukti is MOKSHA\nor \"liberation attained by a person after death\". &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In contrast Jivanmukti\nrefers to achieving \"liberation while alive\" ( ancient Maharishis whose souls could leave their bodies and come back at will )&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5Gb1WNjlhzo/Vz7pepn602I/AAAAAAABIws/BLe44P8x6W8_U-Ijjq7iXJLMhRGWvwQDQCLcB/s1600/mokeedsh_10_09.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"81\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5Gb1WNjlhzo/Vz7pepn602I/AAAAAAABIws/BLe44P8x6W8_U-Ijjq7iXJLMhRGWvwQDQCLcB/s400/mokeedsh_10_09.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Jivanmukta has a\nconsciousness of body in the form of a Samskara; the Videhamukta has no\nconsciousness of the body.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/moksha-final-stop-to-endless-cycle-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/moksha-final-stop-to-endless-cycle-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jivanmukta who has\nrealised that there is nothing anywhere except Brahman merely, does not have\nthe departing of the soul, as in the case of other individuals. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He does NOT need to be cremated so that his\nskull pops for the soul to shoot up to an astral layer riding on a carrier\nsoliton wave. In Hinduism a Jivan Mukt is buried in upright yoga nidra position.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tvvXC11fWOE/Vz7q6NkihvI/AAAAAAABIw0/jqn0CzoS2DwQ38cGI4DVz9xi2JRmw9d0wCLcB/s1600/mokssh_10_10.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"71\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tvvXC11fWOE/Vz7q6NkihvI/AAAAAAABIw0/jqn0CzoS2DwQ38cGI4DVz9xi2JRmw9d0wCLcB/s400/mokssh_10_10.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The highest state of\nMoksha is the merging of individual consciousness ( soul ) &nbsp;in Absolute Consciousness ( mother field of\nbrahmAn ) . &nbsp;&nbsp;Eternal Existence, Infinite\nKnowledge and Immortal Bliss is Moksha or Final Emancipation.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: The Hindu does NOT compete with the Joneses. &nbsp; He is in the business of evolving from within - &nbsp;on the path to liberation .&nbsp;</b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_vBIYZtHm4w/Vz7rvAfdKmI/AAAAAAABIw8/WHC3gzCE23kWzQ5lABJez7wuymQOy98UQCLcB/s1600/433a44457732180cc8c43ede743a65ea91.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_vBIYZtHm4w/Vz7rvAfdKmI/AAAAAAABIw8/WHC3gzCE23kWzQ5lABJez7wuymQOy98UQCLcB/s400/433a44457732180cc8c43ede743a65ea91.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"No partiality and\ncruelty (can be charged against God) because of (His) taking other factors into\nconsideration.\" \u2014 <b>Brahma Sutra 2.1.34</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\nMayawati can stop bitching that god made Aishwarya rai more beautiful than her.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BCsluIYh6v4/Vz7ujHMh9bI/AAAAAAABIxI/uRBvf1HJ2Yol4KULP99Cgi3H8eso44ySQCLcB/s1600/imeeeages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BCsluIYh6v4/Vz7ujHMh9bI/AAAAAAABIxI/uRBvf1HJ2Yol4KULP99Cgi3H8eso44ySQCLcB/s400/imeeeages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma teaches by\nexperience NOT by punishment. &nbsp;&nbsp;BrahmAn subjects\nhimself to experience by sending parts of his own body ( field) &nbsp;to earth . &nbsp;We ( souls ) are all here to learn lessons as\n\"spiritual beings in human form\".&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jpT1iGAhP8k/Vz7wq5R15mI/AAAAAAABIx4/LPcW2-Zl-osjlHKh9KpF0Hin6-kz1lbmACLcB/s1600/irrfmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"313\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jpT1iGAhP8k/Vz7wq5R15mI/AAAAAAABIx4/LPcW2-Zl-osjlHKh9KpF0Hin6-kz1lbmACLcB/s400/irrfmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>The only way to achieve a state of karmic balance is to love and be fair.\n</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nb4zJRQ99wM/Vz7u0sWZQxI/AAAAAAABIxM/PziqfPy6ZBA1JTaxmkWDmsAwnlR84OExACLcB/s1600/isssamages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"251\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nb4zJRQ99wM/Vz7u0sWZQxI/AAAAAAABIxM/PziqfPy6ZBA1JTaxmkWDmsAwnlR84OExACLcB/s400/isssamages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma gives you the\nopportunity at every moment to become open to greater levels of love and\ncompassion. It operates impersonally: applying to everyone, all the time, no\nexceptions. It is very logical: what you sow is what you reap in exact and\nprecise measure.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GQRCU280Shg/Vz7wF0SdU0I/AAAAAAABIxo/fbtTCKUukq4euy5hHqgP0eGXRryOLz4bwCLcB/s1600/image9os.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GQRCU280Shg/Vz7wF0SdU0I/AAAAAAABIxo/fbtTCKUukq4euy5hHqgP0eGXRryOLz4bwCLcB/s400/image9os.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Karma is as predictable as the laws of gravity: what is done\nto you is the net result of what you have done to others. The goal of karma is\nto give you all the experiences that you need to evolve into greater levels of\nlove, joy, awareness, and responsibility.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5AUSnuMtpOM/Vz7u-NNfr3I/AAAAAAABIxQ/LEx3u8AMtkIDjO_kUbmO_CRlg6l-c-nLQCLcB/s1600/isss3mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5AUSnuMtpOM/Vz7u-NNfr3I/AAAAAAABIxQ/LEx3u8AMtkIDjO_kUbmO_CRlg6l-c-nLQCLcB/s400/isss3mages.jpg\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Karma teaches that you are totally\nresponsible for the circumstances of your life. Karma drives us from oneness to\nwholeness to unity with life. Karma forces us to look beyond ourselves\n(oneness) so that we can see ourselves as we truly are (wholeness or Self\nRealization).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f8Q5ExgfsNY/Vz7vTxmcMBI/AAAAAAABIxY/G7fTFkV2Af8I6gTLYyJU2DG9VcUERWBygCLcB/s1600/imffxcages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f8Q5ExgfsNY/Vz7vTxmcMBI/AAAAAAABIxY/G7fTFkV2Af8I6gTLYyJU2DG9VcUERWBygCLcB/s400/imffxcages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once we truly understand ourselves, we can see our divinity (God\nRealization) and our unity with all life. Karma drives us to service. Belief in\nkarma ought to make the life pure, strong, serene, and glad. Only our own deeds\ncan hinder us; only our own will can fetter us<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mZT9czeaCyw/Vz7viw77HCI/AAAAAAABIxg/jWmCH4eBzngkFno8sqyKiXbmMgu_DNIDQCLcB/s1600/imageeecs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mZT9czeaCyw/Vz7viw77HCI/AAAAAAABIxg/jWmCH4eBzngkFno8sqyKiXbmMgu_DNIDQCLcB/s400/imageeecs.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: purple; color: yellow; font-size: large;\">HEY CHOOT STEPHEN HAWKINS-- HOW DID YOU GET ON TO THAT WHEEL CHAIR?</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hqsIRlQee7I/Vz7w4zGDL6I/AAAAAAABIx8/CYJjePtvve8adpa7Czmh93HacUax9BMEQCLcB/s1600/imaeesges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hqsIRlQee7I/Vz7w4zGDL6I/AAAAAAABIx8/CYJjePtvve8adpa7Czmh93HacUax9BMEQCLcB/s400/imaeesges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">HAVE YOU CREATED ANYTHING OF USE TILL TODAY LIKE NIKOLA TESLA ?</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CWwk7NdEyjs/Vz7xTqE6yNI/AAAAAAABIyE/JhzDJ9qYiAsHQvwLRlqL5pyuudwNtSKVQCLcB/s1600/hawEEking7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CWwk7NdEyjs/Vz7xTqE6yNI/AAAAAAABIyE/JhzDJ9qYiAsHQvwLRlqL5pyuudwNtSKVQCLcB/s640/hawEEking7.jpg\" width=\"616\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karmic baggage is\naffected by improper channeling of energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu is a composite\namalgam of panch tatva or five elements such as air, earth, fire, water and\nsky. Vastu Shastra is the group of scientific principles made for structural\ndesigning in order of prime methodology for synchronizing your structure with\nnature and its energy inflow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu makes the\nindividual to live in balance and harmony with the panch tatva.&nbsp;&nbsp; Vastu Shastra is the only science which\ninstructs us how to maintain best equilibrium of these five elements in a\nbuilding and make best use of them to energize mental and physical energies of\ninhabitants to the maximum extent. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is about creating\namicable settings or a place to live or work, in most scientific way by taking\nadvantages of the benefits bestowed by the five elements of the nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu accomplishes the\npositive vibrations and energy inflow within houses and professional premises,\nwhich leads to the environment of absolute success, harmony, peace and good\nhealth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu Shastra as is\npractised presently and is based on the 125 verses contained in Brihat Samhita\nof Varahamihira. This very point indicates a vital link between the astrology\nand vastu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu cannot change\nsomeone\u2019s destiny but it can make sweet things sweeter and bitter things less\nbitter under proper guidance by experts.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dqPpXS9PVtY/Vz7_uTfx8vI/AAAAAAABIyw/t3K2s0qsyfoH8b9z5UorAckYXyXQVbUUgCLcB/s1600/imageFFs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dqPpXS9PVtY/Vz7_uTfx8vI/AAAAAAABIyw/t3K2s0qsyfoH8b9z5UorAckYXyXQVbUUgCLcB/s400/imageFFs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astrology is not\ndeterministic and it\u2019s given to man to change the course of events to avert the\nmisery, agony and disaster threatened by evil influences of certain\ninauspicious combinations or dispositions of planets by taking appropriate\nremedial measures on time.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no\nplace for fatalism in astrology..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most important utility of astrology is to\nforewarn man to enable him to forearm himself to face troubles and calamities\nand to take steps in accordance with remedial principles of Astrology to\novercome or at least minimize the evil effects expected. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/atapa-snana-bathing-home-and-workplace.html\" style=\"background-color: cyan;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/atapa-snana-bathing-home-and-workplace.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">pi = 3.1416, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Royal Egyptian Cubit =\n0.524 m<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3.1416 feet = 0.957 m<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2x (0.957 / 0.524 ) =\n2x&nbsp; 1.8263 = 3.6526 = 365.26 x 10-2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Number of days in a\nyear: 365.25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THE TINY SOUL GETS STRETCHED BY EXPERIENCE .<br />\n<br />\nTHE SOUL AS IT EVOLVES INCREASES ITS FREQUENCY. &nbsp;THIS IS EVOLUTION - NOT THE ONE PROPAGATED BY MAD MAN CHARLES DARWIN.<br />\n<br />\nONCE THE FREQUENCY IS SAME AS THE MOTHER FIELD ON THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER , IT MERGES BACK , GIVING BACK TO THE FIELD, ITS RICHNESS OF EXPERIENCE<br />\n<br />\nyou cannot create experience-you have to undergo it. pain of mistake is part of experience . good judgement flows from experience .<br />\n<br />\nFAKE GURUS SIT IN A HOLE AND GIVE LECTURES ON LIFE MANAGEMENT - WHAT IS IT WORTH ?<br />\n<br />\nYES , YOUR SOUL ( YOU) WAS INDUCTED ON EARTH AS A PLANT, THEN TREE , THEN BIRD, THEN ANIMAL, THEN CONSCIOUS ANIMAL, THEN HUMAN WITH LOW VIBRATIONS , THEN HUMAN WITH HIGHEST VIBRATIONS , THEN BACK TO SOURCE FIELD.<br />\n<br />\nAT THE LOWEST ASTRAL LAYER -- AFTER DEATH YOU FIND ALL LOW VIBRATION , SINGLE AURA LAYER SOULS LIKE A ZOO. &nbsp; &nbsp;CRIMINALS AND PEDOPHILE HOMOSEXUALS ARE IN THIS LOWEST LAYER.<br />\n<br />\nFROM SECOND TO SIXTH ONLY HUMANS EXIST. THEY KEEP GETTING RE-INDUCTED BACK ON EARTH TO PURIFY AND EVOLVE BY EXPERIENCE. KARMA IS THE TOOL.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOUR SOUL SHOOTS TO SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER - YOU BECOME GOD. &nbsp; &nbsp;YOU WILL NOT BE RE-INDUCTED AGAIN AS YOUR SOUL MERGES WITH THE MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD ( GOD ).<br />\n<br />\nBRAHMAN , THE FIELD , KNOWS EVERYTHING BY SHEER EXPERIENCE<br />\n<br />\none day your pet dog will be a human. respect the soul within the dog.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_87b+seedC9E9D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_87b+seedC9E9D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: x-large;\"><b>ARYANS</b></span> (<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> RESPECTED FOR WISDOM</span></b> -meaning in malayalam / sanskrit ) WERE FROM KERALA.<br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nnamboodiris were the creamy layer intellectuals among THIYYAS of kerala because they knew sanskrit.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nlater parashurama gave them lands and the namboodiris became powerful.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">ARYANS DID NOT COME FROM OUTSIDE INDIA.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nALL OF THEM WERE MATH PROFESSORS IN KODUNGALLUR, TAXILA, NALANDA , SARASWATI DHAR</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKum\u0101rila Bha\u1e6d\u1e6da is a FAKE and backdated creation of Jew Rothschild.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kum%C4%81rila_Bha%E1%B9%AD%E1%B9%ADa</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nadi shankaracharya existed in 2000 BC - he was a BHATTATHIRIPAD</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAryabhatta ( 2700 BC ) one of the top 5 mathematicians ever , lived in Kerala as his astronomical calculations used a latitude near Calicut. If you say on April 14th and August 23rd , the sun was exactly overhead , it means that particular day the declination of the sun is the same as the latitude 11 deg 16 min N of the place you stay. ( sun travelling from equator to tropic of cancer and back, due to tilting of earths axis )</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBiharis love to claim Aryabhatta as their own. It is like ivy league Cornell university trying to claim my son is American . Of course he had gone there to present his thesis at Nalanda university in Patna and also use their observatory.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAryabhatta was the first to calculate Pi of 3.1416 and the solar year of 365.358 days . He propounded a heliocentric universe 4000 years before Copernicus, with elliptically orbiting planets and a spherical earth spinning on its axis explaining the motion of the heavens. He was the father of plane / spherical Trigonometry and Algebra, when Europe was in the dark ages.. Today you don't see this pioneers name in the list of top 100 mathematicians.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAryabhatta was the first to compute the circumference of the earth, with an error of just 64 miles.. Aryabhatta gave a method to find the cube root of numbers and dealt with arithmetic,geometric and indeterminate equations in algebra. He dealt with square,cube, triangle, trapezium, circle and sphere in geometry. He was called Arjehir by the Arabs.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPoor Galileo did a Aryabhatta 4 millineums years later , that the earth is round and circles the sun , and the church blinded him , so that he can never look into another telescope .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMAJJA HAI</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKISSI KOH KUCHCH NAHI PATHA</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_116b+seedGktuD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_116b+seedGktuD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carnivorous animals\nhave been created by God.&nbsp; They kill and\neat other animals. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Animals do NOT have ego\nand hence are NOT affected by laws of Karma.
