margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jWjFL_dNA5c/V0CSo-HKGWI/AAAAAAABI2Q/-KifdFwXtR0I3kAmZutjBxP-MXzJ8u9VQCLcB/s400/iftttmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Abrahamic\nreligions if every life is considered as an isolated event then there is\nabsolutely no explanation for events that happen in life. &nbsp;You will be living in darkness and despair.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no explanation why someone is born wealthy while other spends entire\nlife in hunger. There is no explanation why one child is born ugly with heart\ndefects while other one is beautiful and enjoys benefits of healthy body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If life and events are\nGod\u2019s will as metioned in&nbsp; single holy\nbook religions, then that means God is either random and he punishes people or\nrewards them at his sweet will. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nimplies that God is NOT fair and has no idea of what is happening in this\nuniverse because everything works as per his random will, wish and sweet fancy.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MIND YOU , THESE ARE\nTHE PEOPLE WHO CALL HINDUS PAGANS ( BACKWARD ) AND HEATHENS ( SAVAGES )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aMCQssctF_c/V0CSQeBHDAI/AAAAAAABI2I/Kpl__u4qJMQYZaWq1E5FS5VP-jeJDpmuQCLcB/s1600/imr4ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aMCQssctF_c/V0CSQeBHDAI/AAAAAAABI2I/Kpl__u4qJMQYZaWq1E5FS5VP-jeJDpmuQCLcB/s320/imr4ages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God CANNOT punish or\nreward people based on his will and sweet fancies.&nbsp; God is neither partial nor unjust.&nbsp; God is not responsible for the wealth of one\nman or the poverty of another. You suffer on account of your own actions\n(Prabdha karma). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Things do NOT happen in\nthis universe by accident or chance in a disorderly manner or with God\u2019s Random\nWill. They happen in regular succession and events follow each other in a\nregular order. They happen exactly as per the perfect system laid down by the\nGod called Law of Karma.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-D3Ld6SrHXIU/V0CR3Cn6lmI/AAAAAAABI2E/GhZFTerjqAQpd7m8Jby-d-KrVSEseRYDwCLcB/s1600/imagedds.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-D3Ld6SrHXIU/V0CR3Cn6lmI/AAAAAAABI2E/GhZFTerjqAQpd7m8Jby-d-KrVSEseRYDwCLcB/s320/imagedds.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God loves every one\nequally and he is fair to everyone. It is true that the entire universe and our\nlives run on the \u201cWill of the God\u201d we Hindus call fate. But at the same time\nthat \u201cGod\u2019s will\u201d (cosmic system in place) is perfect and fair (not imperfect\nand unfair that runs on irregular impulses of God\u2019s desires or passions.) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No wonder Abrahamic\nreligions are living in darkness even after 2000 years.&nbsp;&nbsp; Things do not happen in this universe by\naccident or chance in a disorderly manner. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4QeApu4r0NY/V0CRqe8eTlI/AAAAAAABI18/_Gn-k77cHnoIHm9rMNDusMpBGf7_F5d8QCLcB/s1600/feed4soul_leearning_listen360_vk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4QeApu4r0NY/V0CRqe8eTlI/AAAAAAABI18/_Gn-k77cHnoIHm9rMNDusMpBGf7_F5d8QCLcB/s400/feed4soul_leearning_listen360_vk.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu does not\nbelieve in a single life on earth, followed by eternal joy or pain. Hindus know\nthat all souls reincarnate, take one body and then another, evolving through\nexperience over long periods of time. To a Hindu death is not fearsome. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before Moksha, the soul\nmust go through all the experiences of life in the physical world. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Understanding the way\nkarma works, the Hindu naturally seeks to live a good and virtuous life through\nright thought, right speech and right action.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crime is less in Hinduism .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dEDC7VGbBW4/V0CQ4OEyYRI/AAAAAAABI1s/zxNudTKfy-0xvHGqEkxfz83sNm6iazCIACLcB/s1600/teanjching.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"286\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dEDC7VGbBW4/V0CQ4OEyYRI/AAAAAAABI1s/zxNudTKfy-0xvHGqEkxfz83sNm6iazCIACLcB/s400/teanjching.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\none thinks, speaks and act correctly, one feels good about oneself, for we are\nthen living in harmony with the whole of creation, expressing the higher\nqualities of our own divine soul.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We perform an action\nwithout expecting or wanting anything in return. When all actions are mentally\nsurrendered to God, one will not be affected by their reaction. By maintaining\nthis attitude, Hindus attain purity of heart and mind.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_w-b-GlfA1w/V0BsHa7-7EI/AAAAAAABI1I/TsX_qhasWOEDGZX6J71xD8_Rwb_pMzR5ACLcB/s1600/iDDmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_w-b-GlfA1w/V0BsHa7-7EI/AAAAAAABI1I/TsX_qhasWOEDGZX6J71xD8_Rwb_pMzR5ACLcB/s400/iDDmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The great beauty of\nHinduism lies in professing </span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>hope </b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and promise for all. There is no terrifying\nstate such as \"eternal damnation\" in Hindu doctrine. No one is\ndamned.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-panfYjBlMuE/V0Br8Cm-a6I/AAAAAAABI1E/5E0FPcaF1EIr3ZCi4e_NJ-PImCGpLXBigCLcB/s1600/imaEEEges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-panfYjBlMuE/V0Br8Cm-a6I/AAAAAAABI1E/5E0FPcaF1EIr3ZCi4e_NJ-PImCGpLXBigCLcB/s400/imaEEEges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole world agrees\non one truth. That Hinduism cherishes the largest storehouse of scriptures and\nphilosophy on the earth, and the oldest. &nbsp;It is endowed with a tradition of &nbsp;sages, unrivaled on planet earth.&nbsp; This is NOT gonna change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu knows that\nthe belief in a single life on earth, followed by eternal joy or pain is pure\nnonsense , and this has&nbsp; caused great\nanxiety and fear. Priests , Rabbis and mullahs have taken advantage .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4KSo3LOCzxw/V0CRTExLAPI/AAAAAAABI10/uhjSINkwKrUJ4pvz-ZSogoxsTSUZ-GTUgCLcB/s1600/im4kages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4KSo3LOCzxw/V0CRTExLAPI/AAAAAAABI10/uhjSINkwKrUJ4pvz-ZSogoxsTSUZ-GTUgCLcB/s1600/im4kages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism pujaris do NOT hold any power\u2014they\njust do not have the scope to grab power. .The white invader tried to change\nthis , but now they have been exposed by the blogsite<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu knows that\ndeath must come naturally, in its own course. Suicides are least among Hindus, by percentage .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-l9cbzTmRSAk/V0CPm30jsRI/AAAAAAABI1Y/cHjzf7Rr0VoelP8Eq7q5JIqruv6VdcvegCLcB/s1600/imaxdeges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-l9cbzTmRSAk/V0CPm30jsRI/AAAAAAABI1Y/cHjzf7Rr0VoelP8Eq7q5JIqruv6VdcvegCLcB/s1600/imaxdeges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suicide only accelerates the intensity of one's karma, bringing a series of\nimmediate lesser births and requiring several lives for the soul to return to\nthe exact evolutionary point that existed at the moment of suicide, at which\ntime the still-existing karmic entanglements must again be faced and resolved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-88Ymb49-j4c/V0CP0pQRK_I/AAAAAAABI1c/FcCwmWv_bwsqiUYxSLOUPYMkiTa0GFRugCLcB/s1600/imagsees.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-88Ymb49-j4c/V0CP0pQRK_I/AAAAAAABI1c/FcCwmWv_bwsqiUYxSLOUPYMkiTa0GFRugCLcB/s320/imagsees.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The belief in karma and\nreincarnation brings to each Hindu inner peace and self-assurance. The Hindu\nknows that the maturing of the soul takes many lives, and that if the soul is\nimmature in the present birth, then there is hope, for there will be many\nopportunities for learning and growing in future lives.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_GRyMnT6qWY/V0C3qMjrlxI/AAAAAAABI24/RpW378wkaiwhxhbW7_apM-6EolBhY0PhgCLcB/s1600/gems-owf-bhagavad-gita-chapter2-10-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_GRyMnT6qWY/V0C3qMjrlxI/AAAAAAABI24/RpW378wkaiwhxhbW7_apM-6EolBhY0PhgCLcB/s640/gems-owf-bhagavad-gita-chapter2-10-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are the words of\nChrist : &nbsp;EVERY..WORD THAT MEN SHALL\nSPEAK, THEY SHALL GIVE ACCOUNT THEREOF IN THE DAY OF JUDGMENT. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism, we have\ninstant judgments every split second of our lives rather than one final\njudgement after death. &nbsp;&nbsp;Karma is not\npunishment or retribution but simply a consequence of natural acts.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although it may often appear like a\npunishment (or reward), the purpose of Karma is to perfectly follow the cosmic\nlaw. Through the doctrine of rebirth and the law of karma, Hinduism seeks an\nethical interpretation of life.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To the contention that the law of karma does\nnot leave any scope for the operation of divine grace, Hinduism's answer is\nthat the grace of God is ever flowing equally toward all. Fate is in the hands\nof god , while destiny is in the hands of humans.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We suffer or enjoy because of\nconditioning of our mind. Our past determines our present, and our present will\ndetermine our future.&nbsp; No change will\never be effected by brooding over past mistakes or failures or by cursing\nothers. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The circumstances of our present life, our pains and pleasures, are\nall the results of our past actions in this existence and in countless previous\nexistences. You verily deserve your harvest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No part of the Bible\nspeaks of an eternal soul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ecclesiastic 9:5\nstates: FOR THE LIVING KNOW THAT THEY WILL DIE; BUT THE DEAD KNOWS NOTHING.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: &nbsp;There is NO hell in Hinduism like in the Abrahamic religions.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8tpMqj7aj1Q/V0C7W4SUtYI/AAAAAAABI3E/98JyzNcg8-8xLw2uRy9qij-d93RqHb2jQCLcB/s1600/heaven-hwwwell-29-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THE WEIGHT OF THE HUMAN SOUL IS SLIGHTLY MORE THAN 21 GRAMMES</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_uyN-Gk45VI/V0C-QNaah-I/AAAAAAABI3Q/tjZLFFzITIsrHEVkINZIB-gSHXwPVatWgCLcB/s1600/21_gramsdd_broadway_drama_poster_by_the_turglar.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma even\nVishnu avatars were NOT spared of laws of Karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Vali was killed by\nLord Rama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his next avatar\nKrishna was killed by Vali as a hunter named Jara. &nbsp;Being a God Krishna knew it was coming and\naccepted it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; Nature is in absolute balance and harmony because brahmAn\nknows everything . He has a closed feedback loop mechanism , like the ones used\nin automation today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The great cosmic\nevolution does not work according to a predetermined plan... The evolution\nitself creates the conditions and possibilities of its growth. These\nconditions, however, depend on the individual character of every being, from\natoms to planets, solar systems, etc.... the reason why Hindus believe in\nastrology<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Evolution feels its way\nforward along every conceivable path in order to find the one most purposeful\nfor each and all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In each re-birth on\nearth , we acquire some bad karma and some good karma.&nbsp; Only conscious humans have bad karma baggage\n. Animals do NOT have karma as they have never risen beyond their mooladhara\nchakra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In each incarnation we\nsuffer the consequences of some of our previous bad karma \u2013and every human soul\nhas a&nbsp; RESULTANT KARMIC BAGGAGE plus some\npicked up samskaras , which affect current life on the planet , like phobias ,\ndeep rooted vices etc . <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; A good astrologer can point you in the right direction\u2014he cant\ntake you there .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Universe is&nbsp; not inanimate but conscious; it records our\nactions and provides feedback to us for our psychic growth through the\nmechanism of karma. This karma gets recorded in the form of inchoate formations\nin the higher mental worlds.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These\nformations get fleshed out as they descend through the various planes of\nconsciousness until they materialize at the appropriate time as events in the\nphysical world.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Law of Karma is\ninfallible and everyone&nbsp; is subjected to\nit.. As per the law of karma, every positive deed which we do, generates&nbsp; positive marks, while every sin ( laws of\nuniverse ignored ) results in negative arks , which subsequently we need to\nrepay by enduring happiness or unhappiness in this life of the next<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During our day-to-day\ninteractions, we are either increasing or reducing the karmic baggage\nweight.&nbsp; If the karmic baggage weights\nyou will have another re-birth and another chance to lighten it.&nbsp;&nbsp; We are not consciously aware of the\ngive-and-take karmic accounts generated in our previous births.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In our subsequent births, we may or may not\nbe equipped to settle our destiny and the paradox is that at the same time we\nare creating new karmic accounts.&nbsp;&nbsp; Thus,\nthis loop of karma and destiny binds us and we remain entangled in it. The only\nway through which we can nullify our give and take account and destiny is\nthrough sustained and regular spiritual practice.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ODwy3yNC-ww/VzyPbBqzuQI/AAAAAAABInA/USadUHBFoLwdsEpSwByFjN0rL0EmfEd9gCLcB/s1600/imgg55ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"391\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ODwy3yNC-ww/VzyPbBqzuQI/AAAAAAABInA/USadUHBFoLwdsEpSwByFjN0rL0EmfEd9gCLcB/s400/imgg55ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatan Dharma the true\npurpose of life is to overcome karma (destiny) and attain moksha where you\nbecome god.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ball of energy\nwithin you ( soul ) merges with brahmAn ( mother energy field ).&nbsp; The soul was once part of it.
