, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are 108 mudras .\nMost of the sea of knowledge has been eroded. There are very few genuine tantra\nmasters today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through Mudras you&nbsp; gather these five forces together, bringing\nthem to their home, the Mother Kundalini, which is sleeping at the Muladhara\nChakra,&nbsp; as Static energy of the Mother\nof the Universe. Your Kundalini is sleeping. It has to be awakened , or you\nhave NOT experienced ecstasy and bliss on this planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Apana rises\nupward to the 'Fire Chakra,' the flame of divine fire grows strong and bright,\nbeing fanned by Apana. When the Apana fire mixes with the Prana, which is\nnaturally hot, the spiritual heat of the body becomes bright and powerful.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Kundalini\nfeels this extra heat, she will awaken from sleep; then she goes into the\nSushumna.&nbsp; The Kundalini is coiled like a\nserpent, and by Mudra the Kundalini will certainly move and open the mouth of\nthe Sushumna.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TCIfbA4RBLw/VzrF7liJKPI/AAAAAAABIik/Bip-D7w7NssjcsgAuiT1t_Ww8-mkz2b_QCLcB/s1600/tumblr_nxzsprt3ysW1u11kwao1_1280.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TCIfbA4RBLw/VzrF7liJKPI/AAAAAAABIik/Bip-D7w7NssjcsgAuiT1t_Ww8-mkz2b_QCLcB/s320/tumblr_nxzsprt3ysW1u11kwao1_1280.jpg\" width=\"319\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without moving the\nKundalini, there are no other means that will clear away the impurities of the\n7200 Nadis.&nbsp; The Great Goddess Kundalini,\nthe Energy of the Self, sleeps in the Muladhara. She has the form of a serpent,\nhaving three coils and a half. As long as she is asleep in the body, (finer\nbody), the jiva is a mere animal, and true wisdom does not arise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the important\nMudras: Maha , Nabho , Udiyana, Maha Bandha, Maha Vedha, Kechari, Jalandhara,\nYoni, Viparitakarna, Kaki, Sambhavi etc<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IoNxXhmfFCs/VzrGGHucfPI/AAAAAAABIio/5hvX3eZb3HA1yg88eT70NZPq6sUWoY2TQCLcB/s1600/89653f60.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IoNxXhmfFCs/VzrGGHucfPI/AAAAAAABIio/5hvX3eZb3HA1yg88eT70NZPq6sUWoY2TQCLcB/s1600/89653f60.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudras will NOT be\ntaught by a Guru, unless he sees that you are worthy of being taught. Or it is\nlike giving a tinderbox to a mangy monkey.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudras are NOT mere\nfinger and hand gestures . They are closed electrical circuits\" of the\nsubtle channels in physical and etheric bodies which offer psychic\nprotection.&nbsp;&nbsp; They have been created by\nancient Hindu seers . .&nbsp; They retain the\nefficacy of the audible shabda brahmAn with more potency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gherand Sanhita and\nthe Vajrayana Tantra advise that the Mudras are capable of bestowing great&nbsp; psychic abilities ( siddhi ) on their\npractitioners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Indian\nsculptures show various Mudras. There are 108 of them in Mantra Shastra (the\nbook of incantations), Upasana Shastra (the book of worship and prayers) and\nthe Nritya Shastra (the book of classical dances).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gAwwnZrHlE0/VzrGiBE6TfI/AAAAAAABIi4/cCCCBaxgrGEUnaEsf0BlnIC3Th7W6NGuQCLcB/s1600/lingamdudraa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gAwwnZrHlE0/VzrGiBE6TfI/AAAAAAABIi4/cCCCBaxgrGEUnaEsf0BlnIC3Th7W6NGuQCLcB/s320/lingamdudraa.jpg\" width=\"268\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gains from all\nmudras are permanent and achieved without interfering with the natural working\nof the body mind or spirit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By touching together of\nthe tips of the fingers or the finger tips to other parts of the palms this\nfree energy (Prana) is redirected back into the body along specified channels,\nback up to the brain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_o1AeZnxsNI/VzrGxQbOFII/AAAAAAABIi8/NguUiJXxxBEv6gA9JIIgNrLEevp1AxqWQCLcB/s1600/mudra-hand-dffgiagram.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_o1AeZnxsNI/VzrGxQbOFII/AAAAAAABIi8/NguUiJXxxBEv6gA9JIIgNrLEevp1AxqWQCLcB/s400/mudra-hand-dffgiagram.png\" width=\"360\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The redirected energy traveling through the nerves\nstimulates the various chakras. Keeping the hands on the knees stimulates the\nGupta Nari and makes the energy start from the Mooladhara Chakra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tension applied to the\nnerve/s and/or the neural or psycho-neural circuits formed by the mudras help\nin balancing the five basic elements (or building blocks).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Zo1EVDxZTL0/VzrGV8oognI/AAAAAAABIiw/QFMiy3PvA7kvOb58ECuNc4Ug9B0U1qWwgCLcB/s1600/imaddsges%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This balancing of the\ntension, and redirection of the internal energy effects the changes in veins,\ntendons, glands and sensory organs, to bring the body back to a healthy state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudra devised by seers\nis a very exact and scientific yogic function by which one can develop or&nbsp; change, one's internal and external\ndispositions viz. mental (anger, emotional disturbance, intelligence etc.),\nspiritual (concentration, meditation) or physical (in various diseases,\nillnesses).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is NO allopathic\nmedicine for all these emotional states which cause loss of sleep and affect\nyour work and harmony in the home.&nbsp; They\nare like literal remote control switches bringing quick and effective changes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The function of the\nhuman body is much like a transformer, receiving energy from the Universal flow\nof Prana, distributing that energy, and then eliminating it<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JWYGg4CJkFw/VzrElBC_1II/AAAAAAABIiI/APnesLQTg6E1Vnes4zsplOUcvmbGpZjuwCLcB/s1600/imagef8s%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 24 words of the\nGayatri Mantra have a special relationship with 24 mudras known as GAYATRI\nMUDRAS. They have different names and formations. The importance of Mudras is\nalso clear from the grim qualifier to these:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Etaa Mudraa na\njaanaati, Gaayatri nishphalaa bhaveta</span></i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To him who does not\nknow Mudras, Gayatri becomes ineffectual.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">I AM NOT SHOWING THE <span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">MOBIUS COIL</span> FORMATIONS - &nbsp;BECAUSE THEY CAN MAKE OR BREAK</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-s3FvU2tnZ_Q/VzrfXMO8euI/AAAAAAABIjg/2T_FIyHkiVIGrpHgoAN3nb-eRUXnjfRGQCLcB/s1600/gyanamuddra1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Alpha 7.83 hertz is the\nfrequency of OM , and &nbsp;is also the home\nof the window frequency known as the Schumann Resonance, which is the resonant\nfrequency of the earth's electromagnetic field. &nbsp;The ALPHA frequency&nbsp; is the gateway that leads into deeper states\nof consciousness. In deep meditation, when waves of alpha and theta rhythms\ncascade across the entire brain, a resonance is possible between the human\nbeing and the planet. Energy and information which are embedded in the zero\npoint field or aether field are transferred. The planet communicates with us in\nthis primal language of frequencies. A living being is a&nbsp; EMF field embedded within the EMF field of\nthe earth. Each cell's DNA as a vibrating transmitter/receiver of information.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ItHKQmtpA9o/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ItHKQmtpA9o?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Gheranda\nSamhita, Lord Shiva instructs Goddess Parvati on the mudras and says that the\nby practicing mudras the yogi becomes an adept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MUDRAS DO NOT WORK FULLY\nWITHOUT THE ASSOCIATED ATHARVA VEDA MANTRA.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS MOST EFFECTIVE WHEN DONE BY\nA SAGE WITH RAISED HIS KUNDALINI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudra is the language\nof the soul ( psychic gestures ) and hence you can control involuntary muscles\nand organs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All mudras and\nbandhanas are meant for different systems of the body to gain control over\nthose organs for their efficient functionality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudras were created by\nseers who verified the effects on their own bodies .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudras are part of a\nsystem that uses the body to express and emphasize the intentions of the mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudra is a spiritual or\nsymbolic gesture which helps manipulate prana or energies in our physical body\n(anamaya kosha), mental body (manomaya kosha) and pranic body (pranamaya\nkosha). Mudra can also be translated as a seal, or circuit by pass as it helps\nto create barriers within the body and direct the energy within.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MUDRA CHANNELS THE\nPRANA VIA SPECIFIC NADIS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nadi literally means\n'flow or current'. In the ancient texts it is written that there are seventy\ntwo thousand nadis in the psychic body of man.&nbsp;\nNadis are the subtle channels along which the vital forces of prana\nflow.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Out of the large number of nadis in the psychic body, fourteen are more\nimportant, and of these, three are most important. These three are ida, pingala\nand sushumna.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The prime aim of hatha yoga is to bring about a balance of flow\nbetween the prana in ida and pingala. When these two nadis are purified and\nbalanced, and the mind controlled, the most important nadi, sushumna, begins to\nflow.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sushumna must be flowing if there is to be success in meditation. If\npingala flows, the body will be restless; if ida flows, the mind will tend to\nthink too much. When sushumna flows, kundalini rises through the chakras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also called the yoga of\nthe hands, a mudra [ seal], is a specific hand gesture, or position, that helps\nin releasing the energy locked within our body and directing its flow and\nreflexes to the brain. Mudras are known to alleviate a host of ailments such as\nasthma, depression, piles, cough, diabetes, stress, and even a heart attack \u2013\nto name just a few.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gheranda Samhita\nmentions the following twenty five mudras \u2013 Maha mudra, Nabho mudra, Uddhiyana,\nJalandhara, Mulabandha, Mahabandha, Mahavedha,&nbsp;\nKechari, Viparitakari, Yoni, Vajroli, Shakti Chalini, Tadagi, Mandavi,\nSambhavi, Panchadharana (five dharanas), Ashvini, Pashini, Kaki, Matangi and\nBhujangini.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hatha Yoga\nPradeepika mentions the following ten mudras \u2013 Maha Mudra, Maha Bandha, Maha\nVedha, Khechari, Uddiyana Bandha, Mula Bandha, Jalandhara Bandha, Viparita\nKarani, Vijroli and Shakti Chalana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hatha Yoga\nPradeepika, it is said that the practice of mudras lead to awakening of the\nKundalini Shakti resting at the base of the spine.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kundalini passes through the Sushumna\nnadi (the central pranic channel in the spine) and pierces the six lotuses (or\nchakras) and frees the yogi from all attachments.&nbsp; Mudras should be practiced to awaken the\nGoddess who is sleeping at the base of the spine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It this text, Adinatha (Lord\nShiva) declares that through practice of mudras, the yogi attains all the siddhis\n(or the eight supernatural powers \u2013 anima, mahima, garima, laghima, prapti,\nprakamya, Ishtva and Vashtva).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Practice of the bandhas\nalong with suitable mudra can reverse cell ageing and increase cell voltage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kechari, the king among\nmudras is said to prevent aging and fills the body with divine nectar (amrita).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kechari induces the state of Pratyahara (or withdrawal of the senses) and is\nused for attaining higher states of consciousness \u2013 Dharana, Dhyana and\nSamadhi. It awakens the kundalini Shakti of the practitioner. It is said that\nonce the mudra is mastered, the body can survive without food or water for long\ntime.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doing this mudra, the yogi gets to taste a substance that falls from the\nroof of the nasal cavity, which is described as \u2018amrit\u2019 or nectar. Even a snake\nbite does not affect a yogi who is adept in Kechari mudra. The yogi becomes\nimmortal and can defeat death and live for a long time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When used over time,\nmudras can create inner peace and harmony, health and wealth, and balance the\nleft and right sides of the brain \u2014 and, promote a sense of wellbeing. They can\nalso change your life considerably, through gradual spiritual regeneration. The\ninnate healing power of hands and the 10 fingers are explained in the Atharva\nVeda.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This power can be easily fortified by the practice of special gestures\nformed by varying the position of the fingers through mudras. Mudras heal by\nactivating both the meridians [nadis] as well as the chakras [energy centres] \u2013\nin more ways than one. Imbalances in the chakras are suggested to affect the\nbody\u2019s energy circuit.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the ways to activate and balance chakras is\nthrough mudras. As the five fingers are associated with the lower five chakras,\nthe right positioning and holding of the fingers together in a specific pattern\nbrings balance. The body, thus, gets energised, diseases get healed and,\ngradually, spiritual awakening is experienced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 108 mudras are\nassociated with the Sri Yantra which contains the TOE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1) Seal of Honoring\n(Anjali Mudra)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2) Seal of Invitation\n(Avahani Mudra)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3) Seal of Fixing\nAction (Sthapana Karmani Mudra)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4) Seal of Bringing\nClose (Samnidhapani Mudra)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5) Seal of Full Control\n(Samnirhodani Mudra)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6) Cow Seal (Dhenu\nMudra)/Seal for Creating the Nectar of Immortality (Amriti Karana Mudra)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7) Fish Seal (Matsya\nMudra)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8) Tortoise Seal (Kurma\nMudra)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9) Lotus Seal (Padma\nMudra)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BINDU \u2013DOT - Seal of\nthe Womb (Yoni Mudra)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Yoni mudra invokes the primal energy inherent in the\nwomb or source of creation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/theory-of-everything-consciousness-and.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/theory-of-everything-consciousness-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oVAzVS0UJL0/VzrudIyK9AI/AAAAAAABIjw/5vqGuitDnucTVtwQYZU82L1silyoKrQSQCLcB/s1600/f443c0c26cSdd1fb0c27f6c9e4a38b442.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"287\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oVAzVS0UJL0/VzrudIyK9AI/AAAAAAABIjw/5vqGuitDnucTVtwQYZU82L1silyoKrQSQCLcB/s400/f443c0c26cSdd1fb0c27f6c9e4a38b442.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per Vedanta , all\ndisciplines of various perspectives ultimately lead to the original singular\ntruth of existential unity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedic rishis attempted to describe their\nexperiences with the indescribable absolute reality as being true (satyam)\nbecause it exists, harmonious (rtam) because it has a self-sustaining natural\norder, and vast (brhat) because it is omnipresent beyond imagination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Tantric tradition\nconsiders mudras to be \u201cseals.\u201d&nbsp; They are\nused to seal, or lock into the body, certain energies or states of\nconsciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each mudra has a mantra or Sanskrit power phrase associated with\nit, and the&nbsp; two &nbsp;function together<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudra practice is a key\n(body-mind-spirit ) &nbsp;instrument of\ninternal alchemy . It &nbsp;unlocks doors,\nopening the way for the spirit to heal, expand, and return. Spin theory in\nmudra energetics, explains the movement of the spirit through reality, or the\nopening of an envelope (kosa) of consciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudras are like bridges\nenabling the journey of the spirit to more subtle levels/dimensions of awareness.\nMudras generate specific energetic signatures on vortices of healing (aura\nfields), according to their intended function, which is determined by form (or\nfinger connection formula).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudras direct energy (prana)\nto certain parts of the brain:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Thumb- brain center<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Index- frontal lobe<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Middle- vertex of head<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Ring- parietal lobes</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Tiny- occipital lobe</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/BUjDzxzBBYw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/BUjDzxzBBYw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHAT WAS THE REASON FOR\nMY SUCCESS AT SEA? <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">I TREATED THE SHIP LIKE\nA HUMAN BODY<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">PEOPLE USED TO SMIRK\nBEHIND MY BACK , WHEN AS A THREE STRIPER I WENT ON DECK WITH A STETHOSCOPE. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: 12pt;\">I EVEN HAD A TECH SHORE\nBOSS TELLING ME , NOT TO DO RIDICULOUS THINGS\u2014&nbsp;\nI TOLD HIM TO \u201c</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">FUCK OFF</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: 12pt;\">\u201d &nbsp;AND TELL\nCAPTAIN IF HE HAD A PROBLEM WITH ME&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">I WOULD LISTEN TO PUMPS\n, VALVES AND SUCTION PIPELINES.&nbsp; &nbsp;I KNEW WHICH ALL VALVES LEAKED AND WHERE\nCAVITATION HAPPENED .<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">I KNEW WHICH PUMP HAD\nPROBLEM WHERE , JUST BY LISTENING. <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">AND MY CREW WOULD BE\nMOST SURPRISED WHEN I TELL THEM TO OPEN UP SOMETHING, TO SEE THAT I PREVENTED\nBREAKDOWN MAINTENANCE, JUST IN TIME.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; &nbsp;I COULD MAKE UP A ELECTRICAL CONTACTOR IS\nABOUT TO GO PHUTTT ON THE CARGO CRANE OR ENGINE ROOM.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Someone asked me about\nrahu / Ketu and Lagna / Rashi in Indian astrology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Western astrology was\nderived from vedic astrology. &nbsp;&nbsp;They\nfound it difficult to accommodate the story of SAMUDRA MANTHAN and asuras Rahu\n/ Ketu .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/beyond-21st-dec-2012-opening-your-third.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/beyond-21st-dec-2012-opening-your-third.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Triple enzyme Sri must\nknows that Samudra manthan is a cosmic allegory Shiva and Vishnu are cosmic allegories.&nbsp; They just &nbsp;cant have homosexual anal sex and produce lord\nAyyapa. What a pathetic ignoramus this Triple enzyme Sri is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asuras Rahu and Ketu\nare the North and South Lunar nodes causing the sun and moon eclipses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Vedic and western systems\nsplit the zodiac into 12 constellations (rashis), but jyotishis do not use the\nsame 12 signs that Western astrologers use. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition, Vedic astrology uses 27 other\nconstellations called nakshatras, corresponding to the 27 days of the lunar\nmonth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s important to know which nakshatra the Moon was in at the moment of\nyour birth because it marks the point from which your karma for this life\nbegins to flow. &nbsp;This was considered such\nimportant information in ancient India that children were assigned names based\non their birth nakshatra. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahu and Ketu is\nconsidered as two strong planets as per the principles of Vedic Astrology. But\nastronomically, they do not exist. &nbsp;&nbsp;Since\nRahu and Ketu are believed to have a strong impact on our lives, they are\ndenoted as mathematical points while making calculations in Vedic Astrology. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that eclipses\noccur when the Sun and the Moon are at one of these points gives rise to the\nunderstanding of swallowing of the Sun and the Moon by the snake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Moon moves from\nSouth to North in its orbit and crosses Sun\u2019s path \u2013 the incision point is\ncalled Rahu . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Moon transits\ntowards South and crosses the Sun\u2019s path \u2013 the incision point is called Ketu . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1irrM1CEOpI/VzsSnbXyfuI/AAAAAAABIkE/-fI8tinCk_Ye0DDxMaMnjPW-_j_ruzbfgCLcB/s1600/RahDuKetu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"390\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1irrM1CEOpI/VzsSnbXyfuI/AAAAAAABIkE/-fI8tinCk_Ye0DDxMaMnjPW-_j_ruzbfgCLcB/s640/RahDuKetu.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This point is at 180 degree distance from the\npreviously mentioned incision point (Rahu). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hindu astrology Ketu\nrepresents karmic collections both good and bad, spirituality and supernatural\ninfluences.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahu is one of the\nnavagraha (nine planets) in Vedic astrology and is paired with Ketu.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\ntime of day considered to be under the influence of Rahu is called Rahu kala\nand is considered inauspicious. In Vedic astronomy, Rahu is considered to be a\nrogue planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British made a big\nhue and cry when German Jew Sir Frederick William Herschel ( 1738-1822 )\n\"discovered \" Uranus on March 13th 1781--&nbsp; hi hi the stupid Indians never knew all this.\n.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian Vedic astrology\ndoes NOT use Uranus (Shweta ) Neptune ( Shyama) Pluto ( Teevra )- as named in\n7000 year old Vedas -- just because they are too far away to affect your DNA\nand they stay in one single rashi for too long.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-T_OgdeJ0mL8/VzsTecEyn8I/AAAAAAABIkQ/hPt3ZILufGQrbTNOHx5Y8AVKDL-yxv1HwCLcB/s1600/effectofgrashas.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-T_OgdeJ0mL8/VzsTecEyn8I/AAAAAAABIkQ/hPt3ZILufGQrbTNOHx5Y8AVKDL-yxv1HwCLcB/s640/effectofgrashas.gif\" width=\"540\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sun represents body\nwhereas Moon represents mind and these incision points strongly affect the\nenergies of these two planets. &nbsp;&nbsp;Rahu and\nKetu are not stationary. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a year,\nthey move 19 degrees and 30 minutes which means that Rahu and Ketu take 18\nyears and 6 months to complete 1 round around Earth. &nbsp;&nbsp;These two allegorical planets transit in\nretrograde motion (in opposite direction to all other planets).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Vedic Astrology Lagna\nor Ascendant, is the first moment of contact between the soul and its new life\non earth in Jyoti\u1e63a. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lagna is the\npivot of an individual's horoscope&nbsp; It\nrepresents the soul and body of the individual to whom the horoscope pertains.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lagna is the base\nhouse, from which all the other 11 houses in a horoscope are assessed. &nbsp;&nbsp;At the time of birth each person , one\nparticular sign will be rising from the eastern horizon and that sign is known\nas Lagna or Rising Sign.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your lagna or rising\nsign rules your first house in the horoscope. &nbsp;The first house deals with the physical\nstature, color, form and shape, constitution, health, vitality and vigor,&nbsp; natural disposition and tendencies,\npersonality, struggle for life, honor , dignity, and general structure of life&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lagna is the rising\nnakshtra or sign at the time of birth.&nbsp;\nIt is the most crucial thing in the horoscope which has a lot of impact\non the person\u2019s mind and behavior. &nbsp;It\ndepicts the person himself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rashi is the name given\nto the position of the moon at the time of birth.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; With the Rasi, we face fluctuations on all\nissues of our life depending upon the everyday movement of planetary positions.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When &nbsp;planets transit &nbsp;from one zodiac sign to the next sign, we\nexperience fluctuating results in our life on daily basis. But these qualities\nare temporary in nature. These transits of all 9 planets can bring either\ntroubles or relief that are temporary in nature. &nbsp;That is, the predictions based on your Rasi is\nonly temporary lasting for few days to few months.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the predictions\nbased on your Lagna is more important. &nbsp;Your\nAscendant, or the first house is the most important house in your horoscope. &nbsp;&nbsp;The Lagna signifies your body, the self and\nhas important clues about the guiding traits in your life. Your Lagna\n(Ascendant) is calculated on the basis of your birth date, time and the\nlocation that you were born.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Horoscope is the natal\nchart showing the position of planets and stars at the time of your birth. The\nastrologer will calculate the possibilities based on your Lagna and Rashi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Resonances of earth,\nie, 7.83, 14, 20, 26, 33, 39 and 45 Hertz of earth. 7.83 hz being the strongest\nof all, OM or Schumann frequency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ohm- 7.83 Hz<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gam - 14 Hz<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hleem - 20 Hz<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hreem - 26 Hz<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kleem - 33 Hz<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krowm - 39 Hz<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sreem - 45 Hz<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humans cannot hear less\nthan 20 Hertz- but our hearts can hear it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dolphins are attracted\nto 7.83 hz when it was sent out via sonic instrumentation during underwater\nresearch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
