font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS A CONTINUATION OF PART 26 , BELOW-</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-M1v4aWv1cic/VzXWpzsxYMI/AAAAAAABIYQ/gaoxC48zXlMcrI-i9vC2_uvo6iWvRceLwCLcB/s1600/62628fdf128abfga7791d41baadb21890d.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"336\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-M1v4aWv1cic/VzXWpzsxYMI/AAAAAAABIYQ/gaoxC48zXlMcrI-i9vC2_uvo6iWvRceLwCLcB/s640/62628fdf128abfga7791d41baadb21890d.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cellular Memory is the\nterm often used to describe subconscious body imprints. In the form of\nregression therapy&nbsp; it is essential to\nrelive the past life as fully as possible during the session.. Trauma causes\nfreezing and dissociation.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One needs to\nuncover the depth of the past life characters experience to actually heal\nit.&nbsp;&nbsp; Reliving the past life helps in the\n\u2018unfreezing process.\u2019 In essence, unfreezing wakes up that soul fragment that\nmay still be stuck or split off from the whole psyche.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DFL3xg2kn7E/VzXfM0TSOgI/AAAAAAABIY0/MEei9sHr7Q8yjQOZ91x5y02VZODHoArOQCLcB/s1600/image8Ks.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DFL3xg2kn7E/VzXfM0TSOgI/AAAAAAABIY0/MEei9sHr7Q8yjQOZ91x5y02VZODHoArOQCLcB/s320/image8Ks.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reliving acts as a way\nto revive this \u2018dead\u2019 aspect of the soul. Recalling a past life story from the\nperspective of an observer, instead of being fully in the story suggests that a\ndissociated part of the psyche is having the memory.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UeGh0HLetS0/VzXXduhprZI/AAAAAAABIYg/0B3Fjp0jZW8La5i1YqPPAK23caAMsT_TACLcB/s1600/a66e6729711162a198ob0e65e284951c4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UeGh0HLetS0/VzXXduhprZI/AAAAAAABIYg/0B3Fjp0jZW8La5i1YqPPAK23caAMsT_TACLcB/s320/a66e6729711162a198ob0e65e284951c4.jpg\" width=\"218\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A dissociated memory is\nnot an accurate account because, that part of the psyche split off as soon as\nthings got difficult. Every past life we have had ended in death. Each death is\na decisive transition stage for the soul. In therapy, this is where the most\ncrucial part of the healing begins\u2014finishing the unfinished business.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-C9t9HdAuqgg/VzhMRNft8AI/AAAAAAABIdU/ypdZo7ucWkc25IrddQSX3W1D_A5vmGcjwCLcB/s1600/dedlusions.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-C9t9HdAuqgg/VzhMRNft8AI/AAAAAAABIdU/ypdZo7ucWkc25IrddQSX3W1D_A5vmGcjwCLcB/s400/dedlusions.jpg\" width=\"360\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Samskara is the Malayalam / Sanskrit word for\nan indelible impression, from a current or past life, stored in the\nsubconscious mind which cannot be easily recalled to the conscious mind and\ngenerates a predetermined thought pattern, behavior or influence that can\nnegatively affect one\u2019s current life.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By erasing the influence of the Samskara,\na person can become free of its effect in order to lead a more conscious,\nproductive, happy, and fulfilled life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KBnmrJkrFIo/VzXXGQJqqxI/AAAAAAABIYY/yHPUu3cRzlISJQfj_AVaFqMnWNFLViM3QCLcB/s1600/im0ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KBnmrJkrFIo/VzXXGQJqqxI/AAAAAAABIYY/yHPUu3cRzlISJQfj_AVaFqMnWNFLViM3QCLcB/s400/im0ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychotherapy only\napproaches specific Samskaras from our current life, such as child hood issues.\nHowever, many Samskaras from a previous life or lives can still have an\ninfluence in and upon our current life.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the strongest\nimpressions are from a traumatic death which then shows up as fears and phobias. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past life regression\ncannot erase past Karmas but helps in performing Karmas better by removing some\nof the impediments.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasanas affect our\nability to live fully in the present moment and curtail our true nature. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The conscious mind can\naccess the conscious mind, memories and intellect, but not the\nsubconscious.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CxincGVHSs4/VzcI-zKcYwI/AAAAAAABIa8/dpJ3KnwADfsVJUia7PfA_zuMjannfKP3wCLcB/s1600/image8sns.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CxincGVHSs4/VzcI-zKcYwI/AAAAAAABIa8/dpJ3KnwADfsVJUia7PfA_zuMjannfKP3wCLcB/s400/image8sns.png\" width=\"369\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious mind,\nthe causal body, that stores these impressions can be tackled through\nsubconscious states.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through deep\nmeditation we can access these deeper layers of our existence and memories from\nprevious lives.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By exploring our own\npast lives we become aware of these repetitive, unconscious patterns and we\nerase our past by resolving those patterns.&nbsp;\nOnly then, are we free from our past and the whole past is dropped.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without making peace\nwith the past we will not progress.. Karma is not punishment system. Karma is a\nfeed back system through that we learn our lessons from the past and evolve.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past-Life-Regression helps individuals to understand the karmic patterns\ninvolved and the resultant energy blockages. It is these energy blockages that\nmanifest as diseases, which are sometimes chronic. The understanding that flows\nclears the energy blockages and thereby the disease is healed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example a person\nwho had this fear of closed spaces (claustrophobia) had experienced a past life\nwhere he was buried alive in an earthquake. Once he relives this trauma, he was\nable to overcome his claustrophobia immediately. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past-Life-Regression\nhelps us to explore our past lives and through this exploration we realize that\nwe are eternal beings. We understand that death is a mere transition from one\nstate to another and that the essence of our being continues into eternity as\nwe have lived before and are going to live again after \u2018death\u2019. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-A8KB6oALrjE/VzbpMrQiFxI/AAAAAAABIZ8/kEqItZ4mkCImn4l4PGYLUPk6ncFOuSCSwCLcB/s1600/im90a8Nges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-A8KB6oALrjE/VzbpMrQiFxI/AAAAAAABIZ8/kEqItZ4mkCImn4l4PGYLUPk6ncFOuSCSwCLcB/s400/im90a8Nges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Experienced and\nqualified past-life-regression-facilitators do not give suggestions during\nregression.&nbsp; They only direct the client\nto seek the root cause of an issue, or the memory of the client's present\nproblems and situations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only an experienced\npractitioner whose belief system is compatible with the concept of past lives\nshould conduct past-life-regression work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samskaras which have\nleft a very deep impression on our personality.&nbsp;\nSamskara has nothing to do with our intellect or buddhi. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We should not look at\nthings only from the intellectual standpoint but from the aspect of the total\npersonality. This is what meditation teaches.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the time of mantra\nmeditation a mala is therefore very important. The mala does not allow an\nindividual to become completely submerged in the unknown depths of\nconsciousness. It maintains one part of the awareness outside, on the process\nof moving and reversing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This counting of the beads and the turning of the mala\nforms a break in the pattern and depth of our concentration so that we maintain\nexternal, conscious awareness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as a healthy body\ncan resists toxins and pathogens, a healthy mind can ward off the negative\nsensory influences around it<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FgVzmK5a6wQ/VzXWYXW1I-I/AAAAAAABIYM/gU2KxLfjUmMM7noCjbvKBGeQ7f8F4k5ZACLcB/s1600/dimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FgVzmK5a6wQ/VzXWYXW1I-I/AAAAAAABIYM/gU2KxLfjUmMM7noCjbvKBGeQ7f8F4k5ZACLcB/s400/dimages.jpg\" width=\"329\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fate ( vidhi ) and karma are very much related and sound the same-but both are NOT the same..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Karma is something that you get based on what you put out. &nbsp;On the\nother hand Fate, is that will happen inevitably.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FzaGopgFqwE/VzboaP3Zz3I/AAAAAAABIZs/TxymyhEEKAwJfrbx49P7UTiMmKk5dCoRQCLcB/s1600/ima8Nges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FzaGopgFqwE/VzboaP3Zz3I/AAAAAAABIZs/TxymyhEEKAwJfrbx49P7UTiMmKk5dCoRQCLcB/s400/ima8Nges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Fate\ncan be called as something that is predetermined. &nbsp; &nbsp;It is something that has been\nwritten in your life even before you were born. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_MFfFmNyqxw/VzbnkH6XTcI/AAAAAAABIZc/m8QTd-RTubUP6Clvz6pRg5M_W1kR5D-cgCLcB/s1600/im7HNages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_MFfFmNyqxw/VzbnkH6XTcI/AAAAAAABIZc/m8QTd-RTubUP6Clvz6pRg5M_W1kR5D-cgCLcB/s1600/im7HNages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By fate, it has been already\ndecided that you should be born to certain parents, born at a certain place, have\na wife and children etc. &nbsp; Fate is that one cannot change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5_mtakkyDh4/VzbouYtmDzI/AAAAAAABIZ0/Tav9xVFvbwwGjC8gH_wwpP3SAhDy44lMQCLcB/s1600/ima8NBges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5_mtakkyDh4/VzbouYtmDzI/AAAAAAABIZ0/Tav9xVFvbwwGjC8gH_wwpP3SAhDy44lMQCLcB/s400/ima8NBges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Karma is the result of your actions. &nbsp;If you do something good, you\nwill get good tings in return and if you do bad things, you will get likewise in return.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qxkggsQAnnw/Vzbn3N1hSBI/AAAAAAABIZk/TtI0JN625bw0kRnxu_ROiBYYY990guEUACLcB/s1600/imag0Mes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qxkggsQAnnw/Vzbn3N1hSBI/AAAAAAABIZk/TtI0JN625bw0kRnxu_ROiBYYY990guEUACLcB/s1600/imag0Mes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fate\nmeans that there are no choices in life; it is predetermined. &nbsp;On the contrary,\nkarma means that there are choices in life. You have the right to choose the\ngood and bad karma.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Karma is related to the soul whereas fate is not.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When\nkarma is related to one\u2019s actions, fate is related to god\u2019s will. &nbsp; In Karma, it\nis the human beings who have the control whereas human beings have no control\nof fate; it is the will of god.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>&nbsp;Karma comes from within a person and fate\ncomes to you without your knowledge.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Unlike karma, fate is something that has\nbeen already decided.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>&nbsp;Karma or the actions that you do in the\npresent life is passed on to the next life. &nbsp;But fate is not passed on to the\nnext life.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Fate ( vidhi )is the outcome of our past karmic\nbaggage \u2013 and god has decided in advance this is what you deserve.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fate can be broadly classified into two\ncategories: durbala vidhi meaning weak karma phalam and prabala vidhi meaning\nstrong karma phalam. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 200%;\">Durbala (weak ) vidhi can be weakened or even totally\neradicated by prayer while prabala ( strong ) vidhi cannot be changed by prayer.</b><br />\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\">Below: &nbsp; &nbsp;Sri Rudram from Yajurveda ( 5000 BC )&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 200%;\">fourth Kanda of the Taittirya Samhita</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 200%;\">Chanted in Shiva temples all over India&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/VP8Wv1P1NFE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/VP8Wv1P1NFE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>Prayer will give us the fortitude to\nface adversity. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sri Rudram shows the\npresence of divinity throughout the entire universe . Shiva ( cosmic allegory )\nis both garden and graveyard, the slayer and the most benevolent one. Almighty\ncosmic force Shiva is impartial and ubiquitous. Shiva represents the\nconsciousness within everything, the pure essence within all, referred to in\nthe Hindu scriptures as Sat Chit Ananda: truth, consciousness and bliss. &nbsp;Chanting Rudram is a powerful prayaschith (\nprayer for repentence ).</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">Karmic\nnegative baggage has to be lived and worked out. There is no way of avoiding\nit.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-az4s2VUOazU/VzbnVhKW_YI/AAAAAAABIZU/lp8-bR2LNK0RPUHCC-CWl6DQhijMeY8_gCLcB/s1600/ima999ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"238\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-az4s2VUOazU/VzbnVhKW_YI/AAAAAAABIZU/lp8-bR2LNK0RPUHCC-CWl6DQhijMeY8_gCLcB/s400/ima999ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humans are the result\nof their deeper mind and its store of countless impressions from the past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankalpa is a\nresolution for self transformation out of free will. &nbsp;When divinity is added to the Sankalpa; it\ngains strength and gets proper direction. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga Nidra provides the\ntools to \u2018weed out\u2019 these unconscious negative patterns and in their stead\nplant positive seeds deep in the subconscious mind, gradually allowing\nexpression from the highest aspect of the self. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--RQFPWS-BhM/VzhLPP9sNdI/AAAAAAABIdM/uMzK346aEz8qMWlxPie9czSjkJhoJ9VWgCLcB/s1600/dharmamdeans.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"192\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--RQFPWS-BhM/VzhLPP9sNdI/AAAAAAABIdM/uMzK346aEz8qMWlxPie9czSjkJhoJ9VWgCLcB/s320/dharmamdeans.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga Nidra not only teaches that the\nconscious mind obediently follows in the wake of the subconscious and\nunconcious mind, it also reveals the gateway to the garden of the deeper mind. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Utilising the sankalpa\nprovides the tools needed to plant whatever is desired in the life of each\nindividual. The only limitation is the imagination.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YXTRQI7EG_Q/VzbnJQK4NXI/AAAAAAABIZQ/Eil6CgwKwK0J5-o7SdPzOozziIVyEj27wCLcB/s1600/evolv00e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"492\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YXTRQI7EG_Q/VzbnJQK4NXI/AAAAAAABIZQ/Eil6CgwKwK0J5-o7SdPzOozziIVyEj27wCLcB/s640/evolv00e.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankalpa is not a\nmundane &nbsp;new year\u2019s resolution of the\nwhite man.&nbsp; Sankalpa is an intent when in\na receptive state. &nbsp;Sankalpa is a short,\npositive statement or affirmation, mentally repeated whilst sinking into a deeply\nrelaxed alpha mind state. It acts as a foundation in accomplishing the task or\nreaching the goal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sankalpa mentally\nstated with conviction, faith, and determination used daily will grow very\nstrong roots and will bloom willingly.&nbsp; Awareness\nis directed to a particular possibility that exists within, presenting a goal\nwhich, with repeated use, will gradually manifest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern society trains\nthe individual to ignore that the power of transformation lies within.&nbsp; There is always a tendency to blame external\nfactors for unhappiness and difficulties.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>MY SHIP WAS BERTHED AT A QUAY IN NEWYORK WHERE THEY WERE SHIPPING AWAY THE DEBRIS OF WORLD TRADE CENTRE. &nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>SO I SAUNTERED ACROSS TO THE VAST JUNK FIELD, TO FEEL THE NEGATIVE ENERGY . &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>A YOUNG WHITE UNIFORMED MAN CAME TO BE AND SAID HE IS IN CHARGE OF THIS JUNK .</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>&nbsp;I ASKED HIM AS A CONVERSATION OPENER \"ARE THERE ANY MELTED GOLD NUGGETS IN HERE\". &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>HE SAID- I DID NOT LOOK &nbsp;. &nbsp; AND THEN HE GAVE A LECTURE ON KARMA. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>HE WAS SPOT ON -- HE HAD HINDU WISDOM .</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1V1SCWOXJbc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/1V1SCWOXJbc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-udntDJ_CvhE/Vzbmh6_bfpI/AAAAAAABIZE/fl4a5oLgei09lw4K_rF33j7Obtln71CoACLcB/s1600/imagMMMes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"362\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-udntDJ_CvhE/Vzbmh6_bfpI/AAAAAAABIZE/fl4a5oLgei09lw4K_rF33j7Obtln71CoACLcB/s400/imagMMMes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma is when we are\nwalking the path of our soul's purpose. When we are walking our path we are out\nof karma. We are no longer creating cause and effect. We are in flow with the\nuniverse, with our spirit. Our soul is line with the Divine.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IBc-zRJa_hc/Vzbm0coc64I/AAAAAAABIZI/w1SFuGN3Dj0VJjN1PlV8ApMkWmjCMb88gCLcB/s1600/im000ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"236\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IBc-zRJa_hc/Vzbm0coc64I/AAAAAAABIZI/w1SFuGN3Dj0VJjN1PlV8ApMkWmjCMb88gCLcB/s400/im000ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN KERALA WE DO NOT\nMOVE INTO A NEW HOME , WITHOUT DOING GANAPATI HOMAM&nbsp; . THE WHOLE HOUSE IS FILLED WITH SMOKE . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/griha-pravesh-house-warming-ceremony.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/griha-pravesh-house-warming-ceremony.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/bsL0T346CLc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/bsL0T346CLc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dv7VvXsdjd0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/dv7VvXsdjd0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_60TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_57B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_57BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_57b+seedN2hcD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_56T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_56TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><div class=\"continue\" id=\"bc_0_56I\" kind=\"ci\" style=\"border-top-color: rgb(153, 153, 153); border-top-style: solid; border-top-width: 2px; cursor: pointer;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; line-height: 22.4px;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/00643592643901563589\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2277216421421159168\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_59MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Ajit,<br />\n<br />\nCan the intensity of the prabala vidhi be reduced through spritual practices like meditation, mantras, yoga practice etc?<br />\n<br />\nKindly advice.<br />\n<br />\nRegards<br />\n<br />\nAneesh</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_59BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_59b+seedN2hdD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_58TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_58TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_58TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_59b+seedN2hdD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_58TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_58TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_58TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c570438228922130420\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_58M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;\">May 14, 2016 at 3:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_58MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi sot,<br />\n<br />\nthere were VASHIKARAN MANTRAS in atharva veda which could lighten prabhala vidhi<br />\n<br />\nthese were NOT written down in 5000 BC<br />\n<br />\nthe oral tradition still continues in certain parts of india<br />\n<br />\nFATE IS WHAT IS MEANT TO BE - WILLED BY GOD , WHO HAS TRACKED THE SOUL PATH -- IT WILL ALWAYS FIND A WAY .<br />\n<br />\nfate determines whom your marry . your actions out of free will decides if she will continue staying with you.<br />\n<br />\nsee it is all intertwined.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY MY WIFE MATCHED MORE THAN 500 HOROSCOPES FOR MY ELDER SON WHEN HE HAD TO CHOOSE A WIFE.<br />\n<br />\nARE WE CRAZY?<br />\n<br />\ni dont think so !<br />\n<br />\n6000 YEARS AGO BHISHMA VANQUISHED EVERY FOE ON THE BATTLE FIELD OF KURUKSHETRA , TILL AN EXASPERATED KRISHNA STOPPED KAAL CHAKRA ( TIME ) AND REVEALED HIS VISHWA ROOP.<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THAN BHISHMA IN ALL HIS WISDOM , LAID DOWN HIS ARMS AND ALLOWED ARJUNA TO PEPPER HIM WITH ARROWS.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_59b+seedN2hdD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_59b+seedN2hdD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/cGUDcwnbrJg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/cGUDcwnbrJg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/XxBFNQJDi8E/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/XxBFNQJDi8E?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Below: Poison injected by the white invader.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Krishna did NOT rush at Bhishma with a chariot wheel to kill him , with Arjuna hanging on to his leg . &nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Krishna stopped the WHEEL OF TIME -where arrows stopped in midflight . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Bhishma read his FATE&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sLs2F9BYaYI/Vzb1ShO3rCI/AAAAAAABIac/6N7EwqnUtPslvauq3q5TEr7gf7GURzMBACLcB/s1600/hqdefaulEt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sLs2F9BYaYI/Vzb1ShO3rCI/AAAAAAABIac/6N7EwqnUtPslvauq3q5TEr7gf7GURzMBACLcB/s640/hqdefaulEt.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">On the tenth day of\nbattle , with arrows sticking all over his body so thickly that there was not\neven an inch of intervening space, Bhishma fell headlong to the ground from his\nchariot.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">As he fell, the gods,\nwho looked on from above, folded their hands in reverent salutation and a\ngentle breeze, laden with fragrance and cool raindrops, swept over the\nbattlefield.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Thus fell the great and\ngood Bhishma, the son of Ganga, who came on earth to hallow it and all it\nbears.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The blameless hero who,\nunasked, made the great renunciation to give joy to his father. The undefeated\nbowman who had humbled the pride of Rama of the axe.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The selfless worker for\nrighteousness' sake, thus repaid his debt to Duryodhana, and lay wounded to\ndeath sanctifying with his life-blood the battlefield.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">As the grandsire fell,\nthe hearts of the Kauravas also fell along with him.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Bhishma's body did not\ntouch the ground, on account of the arrows sticking out all over his body. His\nbody shone more brightly than ever before, as it lay as on a bed of honor,\nsupported by the shafts that had pierced his flesh.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Both armies ceased\nfighting and all the warriors came running and crowded round the great hero,\nwho lay on his bed of arrows. The kings of the earth stood with bowed heads\nround him, as the gods round Brahma.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"My head hangs\ndown unsupported,\" said the grandsire. The princes who stood near, ran and\nbrought cushions. The old warrior rejected them with a smile and, turning\ntowards Arjuna said: \"Dear son Partha, give me a cushion befitting a\nwarrior.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">When Arjuna, whose\narrows were just then burning the grandsire's flesh, heard those words\naddressed to him, he took three arrows from out of his quiver and so placed\nthem that the grandsire's head found support on their points.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Princes,\"\nsaid Bhishma addressing the assembled chiefs, \"Arjuna's arrows were indeed\nwhat my head required to be supported on. This pillow gives me satisfaction.\nNow, I must lie thus until the sun turns north. My soul will not depart till\nthen. (</span><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> THIS IS THE ICHAMRIYTHYU DATE OF MAKARAVILAKKU AT SABARIMALA , KERALA</b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> )\nWhen I pass away, those of you who may be alive then may come and see me.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Then the grandsire\nturned again to Arjuna and said: \"I am tormented with thirst. Get me some\ndrinking water.\" At once, Arjuna raised his bow, and drawing, it to the\near, shot a shaft down into the earth near the grandsire on his right side.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Upon the opening made\nby the arrow, there gushed a stream of pure sweet water to the very lips of the\ndying man. Ganga came up, says the poet, to quench her dear son's burning\nthirst. Bhishma drank and was happy.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Duryodhana, may\nyou be wise!\" said Bhishma, addressing the Kaurava prince. \"Did you\nsee how Arjuna brought me water to quench my thirst? Who else in this world can\ndo such a deed? Make peace with him without further delay. May the war cease\nwith my exit. Listen to me, son, make peace with the Pandavas.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The grandsire's words\ndid not please Duryodhana. Even when dying, the patient does not like medicine.\nHe objects to the bitter taste. All the princes retired to their camps.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN he learnt that\nBhishma lay wounded and dying, Karna hurried to the place and fell at his feet\nand said:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Eldest of the\nrace. Radha's son, who, through no fault of his, incurred your great\ndispleasure, humbly prostrates himself before you.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">When after humble\nsalutation Karna stood up, the grandsire, greatly moved, tenderly placed his\nhand on Karna's head and blessed him.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"You are not\nRadha's son, young man,\" he said in loving tones: \"You are\nKuntidevi's own first born. Narada, who knows all the secrets of the world,\nhimself revealed this to me. Son of Surya, truly I entertained no dislike for\nyou. But I was grieved to see your increasing hatred of the Pandavas although\nthey gave you no cause for it\"&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"I know and admire your valor and your open\nhandedness. And I know also that you belong to the class of Phalguna and\nKrishna in prowess. It is proper that you befriend the Pandavas. Therein lies\nthe right path for you who are their brother. With the closing of my part in this\nwar, may the chapter of your enmity also close. This is my wish, Karna.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Karna listened\nrespectfully and replied: \"Grandsire I know I am Kunti's son, and not\ncharioteer born. But I have eaten Duryodhana's salt and must be true to him, to\nbe true to my own lineage. It is impossible for me to go over to the Pandavas\nnow. You must permit me to repay with my life, if it so be the debt I owe to\nDuryodhana for his love and trust. I have erred greatly in word and deed. You\nmust forgive me for it all and give me your blessings.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The great acharya, who\nknew all the laws of right conduct and what Karna said, replied: \"Do\nreflect for a while and then do as you wish, for that is the right way.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Even when Bhishma was\nmortally wounded and lay dying, the battle did not cease. Discarding the\ngrandsire's words of wisdom, the Kauravas resumed the battle.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Deprived of Bhishma's\nleadership, the Kaurava forces felt like sheep without a shepherd when Bhishma\nno longer led them.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Indeed, even as Bhishma fell wounded, the men shouted: &nbsp;</span></i></span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"O Karna, you are\nthe one left to lead and protect us.\"</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-29XscmlF7z4/Vzb5sTGtmtI/AAAAAAABIas/K2b6TDHMogs8WNGKKfyS2a-ESyIx-AaEACLcB/s1600/bhagavad-gita_clip_Dimage002.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"303\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-29XscmlF7z4/Vzb5sTGtmtI/AAAAAAABIas/K2b6TDHMogs8WNGKKfyS2a-ESyIx-AaEACLcB/s400/bhagavad-gita_clip_Dimage002.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">NO EPIC PAST , PRESENT OR FUTURE CAN EVER BE EVEN A FIREFLY IN FRONT OF MAHABHARATA , WHICH SHINES LIKE A BRILLIANT SUN.</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The Mahabharata is the\nlongest poem ever written</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>&nbsp;It consists of more than &nbsp;211, 000 individual metered verse lines, and\nlong prose passages. &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>More than 2 million\nwords in total, the Mahabharata is more than 12 times the length of the Iliad\nand the Odyssey combined.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nBelow: Kerala astrology has divination inherent ( Prashnam vekkal ) and is unlike the rest of India &nbsp;. Cowrie shells are used . <br />\n<br />\nI have witnessed this process when a bride had to be chosen for my elder son. &nbsp;We have to show both the horoscopes of my son and the prospective girl. .<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-DbWWBPdksI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/-DbWWBPdksI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ayc1V_tBAZU/VzcgskA63FI/AAAAAAABIbM/H4AgQuj_UeMhaeWxfiYOHS5w4FEIPhOtgCLcB/s1600/IMG_979w3.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ayc1V_tBAZU/VzcgskA63FI/AAAAAAABIbM/H4AgQuj_UeMhaeWxfiYOHS5w4FEIPhOtgCLcB/s640/IMG_979w3.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient maharishis, devised these astrological systems\nin order to help people align with their \u201cdharma\u201d or life purpose by giving\nthem a bird\u2019s eye view of their life and suggesting what to do and when</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">..\n&nbsp;<span style=\"background-attachment: initial; background-clip: initial; background-image: initial; background-origin: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-size: initial;\">The value of predictive astrology is to help us come into harmony with\nthe seasons of our lives.</span> &nbsp;<span style=\"background-attachment: initial; background-clip: initial; background-image: initial; background-origin: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-size: initial;\">If we plant a seed out of season it\nhas a more difficult time coming to fruition. &nbsp;Likewise, we can use predictive astrology to\npin point favorable time periods for any activity in our life.</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vCKxXL8SXbk/VzchUmhpo2I/AAAAAAABIbQ/JKKcFq-WRmo8c9lu0ZwIXQWkazxWp8etQCLcB/s1600/horoscope-englifsh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"410\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vCKxXL8SXbk/VzchUmhpo2I/AAAAAAABIbQ/JKKcFq-WRmo8c9lu0ZwIXQWkazxWp8etQCLcB/s640/horoscope-englifsh.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: &nbsp; To remove Gulika ( son of Saturn -Shani ) effect for my son and his prospective wife &nbsp;, my wife went to the temple and lit pandham ( fire torch ) - to block Prabala Vidhi - this is Atharva Veda stuff .</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lbabIzCB3ug/VzciIhJjL2I/AAAAAAABIbg/6NIsbSrTu80RNQRBTwH9quW4sAKPZ2TcQCLcB/s1600/1dg8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"419\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lbabIzCB3ug/VzciIhJjL2I/AAAAAAABIbg/6NIsbSrTu80RNQRBTwH9quW4sAKPZ2TcQCLcB/s640/1dg8.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma exists to guide\nus back on track when we go astray. Karma is often slow to respond and,\nbecause of its intimate relationship with destiny, often waits until a future\nincarnation..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UKhqnZs2ce0/VzhHSbeaeFI/AAAAAAABIdA/dKWRzRvIC7IqVzk0tSuJq17FNOHaltpAQCLcB/s1600/imagesd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UKhqnZs2ce0/VzhHSbeaeFI/AAAAAAABIdA/dKWRzRvIC7IqVzk0tSuJq17FNOHaltpAQCLcB/s400/imagesd.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is because karma works behind the scenes \u2013 we only see the\neffects in the physical world. Karma and destiny are woven into the very fabric\nof our lives to the extent that the average person barely notices their\neffects.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>Below: YOGA is NOT a mere physical exercise like ZUMBA dancing -- SHAKING THE BATOOTA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ri3KVb3os2M/VzhGV1UixAI/AAAAAAABIcw/U8rAzsd3A9ErNumkZ8XilkhJ4nercJQxwCLcB/s1600/sanatana-dharmFFa-12-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ri3KVb3os2M/VzhGV1UixAI/AAAAAAABIcw/U8rAzsd3A9ErNumkZ8XilkhJ4nercJQxwCLcB/s640/sanatana-dharmFFa-12-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Aor6HjWVgio/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Aor6HjWVgio?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vengeance is not the\nsame as justice.&nbsp; An act of vengeance\nwill result in bad karma for ourselves. Even holding onto vindictive thoughts\ngenerates&nbsp; bad karma.&nbsp; Animals are not subject to individual karma\nbecause there are NOT conscious creatures with free will<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kfbyxnTWpQI/VzhF6R5p8yI/AAAAAAABIco/Dazsj2Hn05IyIS4V1F90y1zaUVMj61vfACLcB/s1600/doFwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kfbyxnTWpQI/VzhF6R5p8yI/AAAAAAABIco/Dazsj2Hn05IyIS4V1F90y1zaUVMj61vfACLcB/s400/doFwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sitting back and\nletting people suffer, and will result in bad karma. This does not mean that we\nshould give to every lazy beggar who is mentally and physically healthy who\nasks us for money<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fizbqh3B7DM/VzhFuIvzojI/AAAAAAABIck/JNEYG3PGt24rZz4zay7tzshEGMSNVpxNQCLcB/s1600/downEEload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fizbqh3B7DM/VzhFuIvzojI/AAAAAAABIck/JNEYG3PGt24rZz4zay7tzshEGMSNVpxNQCLcB/s400/downEEload.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: &nbsp; Samsara is a\ncontinuous cycle for the human soul --&nbsp;\ndeath - shooting up of soul on soliton gravitational wave when skull pops during cremation - parking in a astral layer\nof same frequency ( any of bottom six astral layers )&nbsp; - re-induction back on earth to lessen karmic baggage on own terms using own conscience -- &nbsp;cycle continues&nbsp; , till the </span><span style=\"color: red;\">PURIFIED AND EVOLVED SOUL&nbsp; WITH NIL KARMIC BAGGAGE</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;shoots up to the seventh astral layer ( vaikunta ) of\nhighest frequency to merge with the mother morphogenetic consciousness field of\nbrahmAn ( god )</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">READ ABOVE ONCE MORE !</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/05/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_13.html?showComment=1463296684043#c7737145583711493473\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">May 15, 2016 at 12:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_71MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nKARMA, MOKSHA, REINCARNATION THEORY WAS INTRODUCED BY SEER MAHARISHIS<br />\n<br />\nTHEY ARE IN THE REALM OF THE DIVINE<br />\n<br />\nTODAY THE WEST ACCEPTS THIS - BECAUSE THEY HAVE CURED PEOPLE OF DEBILITATING PHOBIAS<br />\n<br />\nI HAD A YOUNG FEMALE CHARTERER BOSS COMING ON BOARD . SHE WAS SCARED OF CLIMBING LADDERS .<br />\n<br />\nSO EVERY TIME SHE CAME ON BOARD SHE WOULD STAND AT THE GANGWAY ON THE QUAY<br />\nAND I AS THE CAPTAIN HAD TO GO DOWN TO THE JETTY AND TALK.<br />\n<br />\nONE DAY SHE SAID , SHE WANTS TO COME ON BOARD AS , THE WORK REQUIRED A COMPUTER .<br />\n<br />\nSO I CARRIED HER PIGGY BACK<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU, I COULD FEEL THIS FEMALE HOLDING ON FOR DEAR LIFE , EYES SHUT , AND THINGS QUIVERING<br />\n<br />\nAFTER WE FINISHED THE OFFICIAL BUSINESS --I ASKED HER --<br />\n<br />\nARE YOU SCARED OF CLIMBING OR DESCENDING , -- MORE ?<br />\n<br />\nSHE SAID CLIMBING DOWN<br />\n<br />\nI HAD A TEN MINUTE SESSION --<br />\n<br />\nTHEN WE WENT OF DECK-- I CLIMBED DOWN THE ( MOT GANGWAY ) FIRST .<br />\n<br />\nTHEN I TOLD HER TO WALK DOWN , WITH THE FULL SHIPs CREW WATCHING<br />\n<br />\n( it is hajaaar unusual for a captain in uniform to carry a young good looking woman up the gangway with her miniskirt riding up and her thong showing in between her sweet batuta. even the duty engineer has come up and was peeping )<br />\n<br />\nSHE WALKED DOWN.<br />\n<br />\nTHE MIND HOLD DARK SECRETS OF PREVIOUS LIVES . YOU CAN GET IT OUT AND EVAPORATE IT.<br />\n<br />\nSORRY MAD MAN SIGMUND FREUD-- SHE DID NOT HAVE TO FUCK HER FATHER .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fd7e1fXYIuM</b></span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
