line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>The white man has ridiculed Hinduism stating\nthat Hindus have taken fatalism to an extreme and we do nothing about changing\nour pathetic situation.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>They say we Hindus consider that life of\nearth is a suffering and we must escape from mother earth , by getting Moksha.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>This is a foul and immoral LIE. &nbsp; People who have\nread our Bhagawat Gita will NOT accuse us this way. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hydrogen is formed into\nhelium, and helium is built into carbon, nitrogen and oxygen, iron and\nsulfur\u2014everything we're made of. We have stuff in us as old as the universe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To\nkeep alive, our cells have to divide and grow. We're aware of that because we\nsee children grow.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our bodies are never static. We're dynamic beings, and we\nhave to be dynamic to remain alive. This is not just true for us humans. It's\ntrue for all living things.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By about 5 billion years ago, stars in the Milky\nWay had generated all 108 elements now present on Earth. All organic matter\ncontaining carbon was produced originally in stars <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon, the fourth most\nabundant element in the universe, is the key component for all known life on\nEarth. &nbsp;It &nbsp;life exists somewhere else in the universe, it\nwill also be carbon based<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astrology does not say\nthat events must and should happen, but gives the benefic and malefic\ntendencies that can be directed or modified through conscious effort. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In astrology , the\nplanets do not dictate, but indicate the energies that are influencing a\nsituation in a given time</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT IS WRITTEN IN\nVEDANTA WILL TAKE ANOTHER 500 YEARS FOR MODERN SCIENTISTS TO FIGURE OUT</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; HE IS NOT CONSIDERED FIT BE GO TO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER.<br />\n<br />\nAS PER THE HADITH , WHEN MOHAMMAD THE PROPHETs SOUL RODE TO SEVENTH HEAVEN ( ON A WHITE HORSE -LATER COPIED BY GURU GOBIND SINGH ) HE SAW JESUS CHRIST ( WHO NEVER EXISTED ) AND JOHN THE BAPTIST IN THE SECOND LAYER.<br />\n<br />\nwhen we do namaste we respect the SOUL ( ball of energy ) inside the other man , as it is a piece of god.<br />\n<br />\ndeath of a tree means - its soul has left .<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE MOTHER FIELD OF BRAHMAN IS PURE COSMIC ENERGY<br /><br />SHIVA , BRAHMA , VISHNU AND THEIR WIVES PARVATI / SARASWATI / LAKSHMI ARE COSMIC FORCES.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nPARVATI IN HER CREATIVE FORM IS SHAKTI--IN HER DESTRUCTIVE ( BLACK HOLE ) FORM IS KALI.<br />\n<br />\nRAM, KRISHNA AYYAPPA , PARASHURAMA ARE HUMAN AVATARS OF VISHNU WITH 13 STRAND DNA AND MORE<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">ONLY VISHNU HAS AVATARS .</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_118b+seedJRqaD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_118b+seedJRqaD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astrology explains\nlife's reactions to planetary vibrations. It is a science of correlation of\nastronomical facts with terrestrial events. The planets do not dictate, but\nindicate the energies that are influencing a situation in a given time.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nbirth horoscope reveals the general path of destiny by way of the disposition\nof the planets. The timing of events is indicated by the Dasha &nbsp;periods because they show when a planet will\ncome into its relative strength or weakness. The exact timing is further\ndetermined by the transiting planets which are influencing the Dasha &nbsp;lords.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Dasha cycles are unique to Vedic\nAstrology and are an essential component to the astrologer's accuracy of\npredictions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala ask any Hindu ( even communists ) about KANTAKA SHANI \u2013\nhe will tell you it is something BAAAAD. ( when Saturn is in 1st, 8th or 10<sup>th</sup>\nfrom Lagna, or Chandra lagna in transit ) Kantaka means thorn. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">They kept two cabbages\nA and B side by side.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Surya is sun<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Savitr is twilight<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pusan is pastures<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usha is dawn<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soma is amrit<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ashwin is healing rays<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marut is storm<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The relationship\nbetween karma and astrology can be likened to that of a thermometer and body\ntemperature. &nbsp;&nbsp;Only an idiot will say that the thermometer can\nbring down a fever.&nbsp; A kind of subtle\ndeterminism exists in nature and astrology recognizes it. Today we know moon\nand sun causes tides to rise and fall.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I wrote about KARVA CHAUTH, &nbsp;I was trending No 1 on twitter with all\nChutney Marys and Pickle Johns abusing me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today the post below is\nthe No 2 most read post among my 997 odd posts.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Verily, &nbsp;a BAAAAD pudding\nis being eaten ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TEE HEEEEEEEE !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/karva-chauth-synchronising-fertility.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/karva-chauth-synchronising-fertility.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person who attains\nmoksha will melt his ego. The ME and what is in it for me vanishes and he stands\nfree from all desires, actions and consequences in a total state of oneness.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are bound to this material world through\nattachment, desire, and the inability to see or experience the oneness of all\nlife. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya (illusion) is both the\npsychological separation between ego and the universe and the psychological\nfilter that colors all of our experience. Maya is our memories, conceptions,\njudgments, and biases that present a distorted sense of reality<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through the practice of\nyoga, we seek to create the tools to consciously and willfully \"pierce the\nveil\" of maya and see the transcendent nature of reality. These tools\ninclude selfless work (karma yoga), self-dissolving love (bhakti yoga),\nabsolute discernment (jnana yoga), and meditative immersion (raja yoga).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most fundamental\ntool yoga gives us to create moksha is conscious awareness. Through the use of\nawareness we can slowly begin to see our projections, desires, attachments and\njudgments for what they are. Once these distorting factors become conscious,\nthey are able to dissolve and unblock the way to a direct experience of\nreality.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body of the \u201crealized man\u201d or Jivan Mukt&nbsp; continues to exist until his karmas and\nprarabdhas ( greater responsibility ) has worked itself out,&nbsp; and then his mortal coil falls away on his\nown free will , and he attains Moksha.&nbsp; You\ncannot be deemed a Jivanmukta unless you have the noble qualities for it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cJivanmukta&nbsp; is one who is devoid of likes/dislikes,\nsorrow/elation and whose intellect is divine.\u201d-<b>Mahopanishad (2/57) 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the liberated sage\nthere is no delusion for he sees oneness everywhere. He is not affected by\neither what he has done or what he has not done. But he knows his prabdhas. He\nis free from all the modifications of the mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such people have\nsterling virtues like conscience, lack of ego,&nbsp;\ngratitude , lack of desires- selfishness- greed- jealousy- anger- and\nfear, unlimited compassion,&nbsp;&nbsp; respect for\nuniversal laws,&nbsp; raised consciousness and\nhumility (which yours truly does NOT have though I hold a rare Moksha Jatakam).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism it is your\nown conscience, (which arose out of awakened consciousness ) which connects you\nto the greater metaphysical unity.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the literary\ntraditions of the Upanishads, Brahma Sutras and the Bhagavad Gita,&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience\nis the label given to attributes composing knowledge about virtues and vices\nbut also good and evil, that a soul acquires from the completion of acts and\nconsequent accretion of karma over many lifetimes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The awareness of vice\nand virtue is inherent in the soul.&nbsp; </span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana as \u201ceternal moral order\u201d\nencourages Hindus to seek&nbsp; moral truth\nwherever it might be found, each individual must realize this truth through his\nor her own systematic effort.&nbsp; Never do\nanything against conscience even if the state , your society or your religion\ndemands it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism you sin, if you go against your conscience.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How\nmany judges in a court of law exercise their conscience&nbsp; or even&nbsp;\nlisten to the voice of conscience-- and these guys say they take care\nof&nbsp; humanity and society, right?&nbsp; There can be no accuser as powerful as your\nown conscience. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you ever seen a\nlawyer with conscience? These are the people who become judges and hold power\nover life and death.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is indeed a higher court than\ncourts of justice or courts of honour, and that is the court of conscience. It\nsupersedes all other courts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you ever noticed that it is your conscience\nwhich tell you, enough is enough.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any person of honor\nchooses rather to lose his honor than to lose his conscience. Nobel peace prize\nwinners striking and killing unarmed civilians with drones to preserve their\nway of life, talk about \u201cthis years fashion in conscience\u201d in Presidential debates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And they go around with\ntheir work happily , with an audience clapping and cheering them on. What\nirony! Once your conscience, which is the window to your spirit,&nbsp; is offended it shows on your face --as it is\ngood bye tranquil mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such evil people\nmistake short memory for a clear conscience. Conscience is your inner\nantenna.&nbsp; Human dignity requires an\nupright conscience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deep within his\nconscience every man discovers a celestial law which he has not laid upon\nhimself,&nbsp; even society or his upbringing\n-- which he must obey.&nbsp; It is his most\nsecret core, and his sanctuary, where he is alone with God, to have a silent\nand short dialogue . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To youngsters who are\nabout to take up a career , I will tell them this\u2014\u201cNever take up a job in which\nyou cannot apply your own conscience\u201d&nbsp;\nThis is in case you want to happy , when your work is a continuous\nfestival of joy. Then you can have&nbsp; a\nface without lines , like yours truly at the age of 60.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience an aspect of\nextended consciousness beyond survival-related dispositions . Conscience is a\ngift of crisis--- It tells you the right thing to do when you don't have time\nto figure it all out. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience thinks in a\nflash, in terms of metaphor, feelings, pictures, and the spatial whole and\ndoesn't fit neatly into the cause-and-effect model. Your conscience will not\nforce you to do things that are truly wrong for yourself or other people in\ncontradiction with the laws of the universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot command our\nconscience to use it at will. It just surfaces spontaneously when certain\ncircumstances are present\u2014it suddenly appears as a feeling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA HAS\nALWAYS URGED TO USE CONSCIENCE . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience extrapolates\nlarger truths . Use it as a guide always, never ignore it. If you do NOT have a\nconscience you cannot attain moksha , no matter whether you pray to God -- 5 times\na day on your knees. Moksha is not an achievement, therefore there is no\ncompetition.&nbsp; It is liberation from , the\ncycle of death and rebirth.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your soul\nachieves its pure self. Moksha is the fulfillment of life's purpose. Life ends\non this earth plane.&nbsp; You are liberated\nfrom littleness into vastness, from bondage to boundless bliss. . The conquest\nof ignorance, ego, attachment, and impulse brings about liberation (moksha) for\nthe individual. Without jnana, there can be no moksha.&nbsp; Jnana is always revealed in spontaneous\nutterances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the sensual\ndesires are blowing strong, the&nbsp;\njnana-lamp cannot burn.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga destroys destroys all impulses\nand urges towards the sensual world. Yoga and jnana are like oil and flame. The\noil is yoga and jnana is the illumining flame of the lamp. Even if at the last\nmoment of his life one is able to realize this&nbsp;\njnana , he is certain to be liberated from the cycle of birth and\ndeath.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why almost all\natheists cry out to god just before they die. This is the time hypocrisy goes\nfor a toss.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moksha does NOT make your soul extinct, rather this ball of energy\nwithin you merges with the mother field from which it has taken off on a long\nand difficult &nbsp;journey.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is true home coming.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is now the &nbsp;final end of anymore earthly sojourns for your\nsoul.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nHindu scriptures tell us&nbsp; that the energy\nbody of Atman is \u2018na jAyate\u2019 (never born), \u2018na mriyate\u2019 (never dies).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember you are\nimmortal\u2014&nbsp; you were born with the stars ,\nat the beginning of cosmic creation.&nbsp;\nYour cadaver/ body is like a pair of jeans , you discard on death .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sanskrit&nbsp; word atman, means \"God within,\" is the\nsoul.. We do Namaste to the soul of the other person.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Atmano\nmokshartham jagat hitayacha\"</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Pursue&nbsp; moksha while keeping in view the welfare of\nthe world.'-&nbsp; <b>Rig Veda 5000 BC</b><span style=\"background: lime; mso-highlight: lime;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3XN2udHPsoc/Vzjc04kK7OI/AAAAAAABIek/c8qehObMozgn8bBqv-owMjA2M1KsZ_hwACLcB/s1600/imafges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"236\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3XN2udHPsoc/Vzjc04kK7OI/AAAAAAABIek/c8qehObMozgn8bBqv-owMjA2M1KsZ_hwACLcB/s400/imafges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jnana marga is known as\nthe path of wisdom, and places much emphasis on study and pursuit of knowledge.&nbsp; This includes the study of philosophy that\naddress spirituality and the laws of the universe. In this path,\nself-realization (Atma siddhi/ Atmavidya) is the key to obtaining moksha. And\nthe core of this knowledge is 'Tat tvam asi'. 'you are indeed the Self' .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Watch your\nthoughts, they become words.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Watch your words, they\nbecome actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Watch your actions,\nthey become habits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Watch your habits, they\nbecome your character.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Watch your character,\nit becomes your destiny.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To attain Jnana, you\nmust have one-pointedness of mind (Ekagrata). Ekagrata comes through Upasana.\nUpasana comes through purity of heart (Chitta Suddhi).&nbsp; Chitta Suddhi comes through Nishkamya Karma\nYoga.&nbsp; To do Nishkamya Karma, you must\nhave controlled the Indriyas. The Indriyas can be controlled through Viveka and\nVairagya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ego structures are the\nprimary cause of our bad karma; i.e. they are responsible for the \"bad\"\nbehaviour that generates bad karma. Animals do NOT have ego. This is why\nanimals do NOT have karmic baggage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z4EDY4kGaso/VzjcXvwf0dI/AAAAAAABIeg/NI6S0quhRFAtyLHhAZSNeA9_iJHgdp7EQCLcB/s1600/ircmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z4EDY4kGaso/VzjcXvwf0dI/AAAAAAABIeg/NI6S0quhRFAtyLHhAZSNeA9_iJHgdp7EQCLcB/s400/ircmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many white men come to\nIndia to get rid of their drug habits .&nbsp;\nThey come to deewed the garden of their minds by ANTAR MAUNA .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a\nmisnomer as the actual practice of antar mouna is the elimination of\nconflicting and contradictory tendencies from the normal behaviour of the\nvrittis, and not 'inner silence' - stopping the thoughts and remaining at\npeace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vritti means literally\nspiral vortex (of consciousness)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Z85KY5SYio0/VzS22N3YEtI/AAAAAAABISg/V6TA1msrbQ4fDtwTzSPpu0JFzUnBKkCJgCLcB/s1600/6a01a73de83feerr970d01bb07c4dcbb970d.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"383\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Z85KY5SYio0/VzS22N3YEtI/AAAAAAABISg/V6TA1msrbQ4fDtwTzSPpu0JFzUnBKkCJgCLcB/s400/6a01a73de83feerr970d01bb07c4dcbb970d.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the context of yoga,\nthe presence of vrittis in consciousness is regarded as impediments to\nenlightenment.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The goal of yoga to\n\"still\" or \"silence' the modifications in consciousness, the\nvrittis, and thereby set the stage to learn the technique of samadhi, an\nadvanced mental method for achieving enlightenment.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0n0_XU0aPSI/VzS3Baso-bI/AAAAAAABISk/JgwLDs6LxVIxFMfgTe4xTnyolNd_GrDDgCLcB/s1600/imagesdr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0n0_XU0aPSI/VzS3Baso-bI/AAAAAAABISk/JgwLDs6LxVIxFMfgTe4xTnyolNd_GrDDgCLcB/s1600/imagesdr.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The goal of the yogi is\nthus not to suppress, or annul their vritties, rather it is to find a\nharmonious balance, and ultimately, to channelize these tendencies inward Mind\ngains great strength when the Vrittis are harnessed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0xDbAAqh33Q/VzS9CvJl8uI/AAAAAAABIS4/-5xyBmAWNVUL9P51jkcYufgih_IqQOVAACLcB/s1600/ima76ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0xDbAAqh33Q/VzS9CvJl8uI/AAAAAAABIS4/-5xyBmAWNVUL9P51jkcYufgih_IqQOVAACLcB/s1600/ima76ges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation can cause\nyou to witness yourself and centre you for better evolution of your body, mind\nand spirit.&nbsp;&nbsp; Animals who are not\nconscious cannot witness themselves.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you develop the witness, it empowers your ability to know who you\nare, both as an individual living in the world, and as a transcendent,\nuniversal consciousness.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QFLRhYjuc8Y/VzS9JD9QddI/AAAAAAABIS8/gSQXm3FfxWUMkDqOTQkWJGrCkN82Ue_hQCLcB/s1600/im556ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QFLRhYjuc8Y/VzS9JD9QddI/AAAAAAABIS8/gSQXm3FfxWUMkDqOTQkWJGrCkN82Ue_hQCLcB/s1600/im556ages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Witnessing\nrequires you to be in the moment and to see things as they are.&nbsp;&nbsp; It enables you to respond with greater\nskill, intuition grace and wisdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The witness is the\nsilent,&nbsp; peaceful centre of your\nbeing.&nbsp;&nbsp; It is from this perspective that\nyou view your mind, the eternally changing, thinking, emoting, feeling, remembering,\ndesiring part of you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--FwBKPh92uo/VzTBF8a4l2I/AAAAAAABITQ/VwcLVxtBUsoi84wWautE_1E8VZ3xU8TvQCLcB/s1600/im6jmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--FwBKPh92uo/VzTBF8a4l2I/AAAAAAABITQ/VwcLVxtBUsoi84wWautE_1E8VZ3xU8TvQCLcB/s1600/im6jmages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cultivating the witness\nin meditation enables you to forge the correct relationship between the\nunchanging witness and the ever-changing mind.&nbsp;\nYou learn how to make the mind a tool that you can use to live a fulfilled\nlife.&nbsp;&nbsp; If you have not developed the\nwitness then your mind becomes your master.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2KF5xyPU2rs/VzTBAD9MSdI/AAAAAAABITM/taI5yurJ258MTDBKIGmfayrykFZvKT9sACLcB/s1600/image885s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"380\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2KF5xyPU2rs/VzTBAD9MSdI/AAAAAAABITM/taI5yurJ258MTDBKIGmfayrykFZvKT9sACLcB/s400/image885s.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antar Mouna meditation\ndeweeds the garden of the mind off accumulated negative thoughts, memories and\nemotions.&nbsp; You can analyze and understand\nthe negative thoughts and how they relate to your life and behavior and\ntransform negative thoughts into positive states.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antar mouna, enables\npeople to release oppressive mental tensions by self psychotherapy..</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally we tend to\nallow 'good' thoughts to arise to conscious perception; we accept and enjoy\npleasant thoughts. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost all of us , do\nthis mental suppression -- when an unpleasant, painful or 'bad' memory or\nthought arises, we tend to quickly push it back down into the subconscious\nlayers of the mind.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every single suppressed\nthought that remains unexpressed causes a block in the free flow of the mind.\nThe thoughts and experiences stay submerged in the subconscious realms of the\nmind in seed form, causing pain, unhappiness and frustration in life.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without even realizing it, we build up a\nvast accumulation of suppressed thoughts which cause a lot of tension and\ndisturbances in the mind and personality without obvious cause.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To find lasting\nhappiness or peace of mind, these mental impressions have to be rooted out. We\nremove the unwanted weeds from the mind. They have to be removed by the roots\nor the weed will grow back.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If left to fester in\nthe mind, these negative mental impressions poison the psyche and lead to\nirritability, aggression, anger, non-specific depression, a tendency to worry,\nbeing fearful without reason, and permanent tiredness.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This affects all our interactions in life and\nreduces our ability to be efficient, creative and dynamic at every level of our\nlives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antar mouna enables us\nto exhaust these unwanted thoughts after which we can experience corresponding\nsurges of energy and inspiration and life starts to take on a new\ndimension.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antar mouna is a\npowerful and wonderful yogic psychiatric tool .&nbsp;\nYou can understand and befriend your mind, its tendencies and reactions\nthat arise due to thoughts. &nbsp;Antar mouna enables\nus to train the mind, to focus the monkey chatter on one point which many of us\nhave trouble with.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can witness (\ndrashta ) your own mind.&nbsp; This allows\ndeep-rooted tensions, long forgotten painful memories, fears, hatreds and\nphobias to arise in a relatively controlled manner and to be eradicated. The\npractice provides a basis for clearing all the mental dross and rubbish \u2013 it is\na form of mental shankhaprakshalana. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A modern psychiatrist\njust fleeces you \u2013 he loves your money and hence he will put his hooks on your\nforever .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally the term\nshankhaprakshalana is applied, shankha meaning 'inner passages ', prakshalana\nmeaning 'cleaning'. &nbsp;&nbsp;Shankha Prakshalana\nYoga is one of the ancient Kriya yoga methods . Shankha Prakshalana does not\njust clean you intestines but clean the entire digestive system starting from\nmouth till urethra/anus.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Vsfyw5NoPX0/VzWBRDmwZ8I/AAAAAAABIT0/NTf76aMEOkAGYsO5mVrFnHwb944X3ktpACLcB/s1600/ima3jfges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Vsfyw5NoPX0/VzWBRDmwZ8I/AAAAAAABIT0/NTf76aMEOkAGYsO5mVrFnHwb944X3ktpACLcB/s400/ima3jfges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The practice of antar\nmouna is divided into six stages: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stage 1 of antar mouna\nis concerned with the sensory perceptions of external stimuli. The awareness is\nconsciously directed to focus on the FIVE HUMAN SENSES one by one , and be\naware &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You do NOT analyze ,\nyou just witness and be aware .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are now able to reduce\nthe influence of the outside impressions on our perception \u2013in a manner where familiarity\nbreeds contempt. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">DIGRESSION: You can\nmarry the most beautiful woman on the planet , after 6 months&nbsp; she can be nude in front of you and she cant turn\nyou on \u2013 &nbsp;but if you see the ass of your neighbours\nplain jane daughter, the wind blew her skirt up, &nbsp;you get turned on . Indeed familiarity is a wizard\nwho is cruel to beauty . The paradox is familiarity with corruption breeds acceptance\n.&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscious and\nintentional perception of the outside world automatically leads to disinterest.\n&nbsp;The mind becomes bored quickly having\nchecked out all the possible distractions and thus ceases to be either\ninterested or disturbed by its environment. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOME MUMBAI SLUMS ARE\nTWO METRES OFF THE RAIL TRACKS.&nbsp; A MOTHER\nWILL SLEEP WITH HER BABY AND SHE WONT BE WOKEN UP BY THE NOISY SOUNDS OF THE TRAINS\nWHIZZING PAST \u2014 &nbsp;BUT EVEN IF HER BABY WHIMPERS IN HIS SLEEP , SHE WILL WAKE UP. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zy0c9yX9wKY/VzV_8IMPM_I/AAAAAAABITk/tC25zFJ2rZYedT2YnUxIFVCZwR3eSPX0wCLcB/s1600/slums1-415x2e60.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"250\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zy0c9yX9wKY/VzV_8IMPM_I/AAAAAAABITk/tC25zFJ2rZYedT2YnUxIFVCZwR3eSPX0wCLcB/s400/slums1-415x2e60.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE\nHUMAN MIND CAN BE TRAINED TO IGNORE. ( that is why god gave PAIN )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2gLe3-vlDQ4/VzWBJt5G4DI/AAAAAAABITw/8EYlWO9LW9kgOTB4bXTjQ2ya-PdSvXtOwCLcB/s1600/im77ages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2gLe3-vlDQ4/VzWBJt5G4DI/AAAAAAABITw/8EYlWO9LW9kgOTB4bXTjQ2ya-PdSvXtOwCLcB/s1600/im77ages.png\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Same way , we develop\nthe capacity to remain centred, detached, completely undisturbed and unaffected\nby anything going on around us. &nbsp;&nbsp;Therefore,\nstage 1 induces the first level of pratyahara, i.e. dissociation of the senses\nfrom the outside world, which prepares us to go inside for the second stage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In stage 2 of antar\nmouna we leave the outside world and turn inside to work with the mind. &nbsp;We sit in a relaxed manner and start to\nobserve the mind 'screen' in front of the closed eyes. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aim is to view and exhaust the samskaras\nwe carried from past life, the negative thoughts, experiences, phobias, old\nmemories, emotions and fears, i.e. the useless debris, which arise from inside\nthe subconscious mind. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regular practice\nof this stage cleans the mind of old dross and prevents the accumulation of\nmore rubbish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vNzk2siMhOI/VzWAy1WGQ_I/AAAAAAABITs/AfQdWoB8XC85yCdx0UQEt1UTBKgeK9erACLcB/s1600/imatges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"234\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vNzk2siMhOI/VzWAy1WGQ_I/AAAAAAABITs/AfQdWoB8XC85yCdx0UQEt1UTBKgeK9erACLcB/s400/imatges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stage 2 has three requirements:\nThe first is to allow the mind total freedom to think anything it wants,\nwithout any restriction. &nbsp;&nbsp;Letting all\nthoughts bubble up spontaneously to the surface, being aware of any\ncorresponding emotions or feelings, especially fear, panic, greed, lust, guilt,\nhatred or anger. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There should be no\ncontrol, judgement or criticism of any thoughts \u2013 they may be about work, home,\nfood, sex, friends, enemies, likes, dislikes; trivial or lofty, sublimely\nbeautiful or violently murderous. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-swE8fmdXp2c/VzWMTQcQnLI/AAAAAAABIUQ/6WeQioqzBXgiVvGM3lqYz1lSgGdwL4CJgCLcB/s1600/im5lages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-swE8fmdXp2c/VzWMTQcQnLI/AAAAAAABIUQ/6WeQioqzBXgiVvGM3lqYz1lSgGdwL4CJgCLcB/s400/im5lages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some may be connected,\nothers will be random.&nbsp; &nbsp;Sometimes there may be a torrent of thoughts,\nat other times there may be just a trickle. &nbsp;&nbsp;No matter, what is important is the second\nrequirement which is that we maintain absolutely vigilant awareness of the\nspontaneous thought process<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After some time with\nthis stage, by giving the mind this freedom to spontaneously express, the\ntorrent of babble starts to thin out a bit. The mind starts to become a little\nquieter.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HWzfS0uJtNo/VzWMLPjJ92I/AAAAAAABIUM/uLOGIwY8uZQtjdgCuhGmJDISQwwe_HVhACLcB/s1600/ima9lfges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HWzfS0uJtNo/VzWMLPjJ92I/AAAAAAABIUM/uLOGIwY8uZQtjdgCuhGmJDISQwwe_HVhACLcB/s320/ima9lfges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The third requirement\nis courage, openness and honesty, for deep, hidden and suppressed parts of our\npersonality will be revealed to us with antar mouna.&nbsp; &nbsp;This\nmay be some beautiful, loving part of ourselves that has been dormant, or\nperhaps some ugly dark side that has equally been hidden. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We learn to understand the nature of our mind\nand its multifarious activities, to befriend it and to become aware of and\nobserve our emotional reactions to the different thoughts. &nbsp;&nbsp;This process enables us to accept ourselves\nfully, not as we'd like to be, but as we really are.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MWPW4KSFUuw/VzWMFzlfxUI/AAAAAAABIUI/mVfInji93rIs-3642GDocYlnAhl4gWs_wCLcB/s1600/image4jds.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"309\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MWPW4KSFUuw/VzWMFzlfxUI/AAAAAAABIUI/mVfInji93rIs-3642GDocYlnAhl4gWs_wCLcB/s400/image4jds.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stage 3: Creation and\ndisposal of thoughts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In stage 3 of antar\nmouna we consciously create and dispose of thoughts at will. It is the opposite\nto stage two. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here spontaneous\nthoughts are not allowed. Rather a particular theme or thought is chosen at\nwill, then reflected upon for a while, generating as many connected thoughts as\npossible related only to that theme. Looking at the issue from all angles,\npondering on it, if another person is involved, considering things from their\npoint of view and so on. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After a few minutes,\nthis theme or thought is then thrown quickly out of the mind, like a film\ndirector giving the order to 'Cut' when a scene is finished, and another theme\nis chosen. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This can be repeated\nseveral times, choosing a different issue each time. The practitioner must choose confronting, difficult, negative issues and themes, rather\nthan inconsequential thoughts which will tend to be a waste of time.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In stage 3 it is really\npossible to work at a psychotherapeutic level. &nbsp;&nbsp;Although stage 2 helps to release mental\ntensions by allowing them to erupt without inhibition, many of these\nsubconscious thoughts are deeply embedded in normally inaccessible regions of\nthe mind, firmly fixed and rooted through habitual suppression, and therefore\ndo not necessarily arise spontaneously.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In stage 3 the posed\nthoughts stir up a train of associated thoughts. These consciously created\nthoughts incite and attract deeper thoughts and memories. &nbsp;The analogy is that of fishing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind is\nbaited with a thought. The bait is put into the water (the subconscious mind)\nand attracts other fish (deeply embedded sub and unconscious thoughts or\nimpressions) which are caught, brought up and then released. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This releases psychoneural knots and blocks. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DrpfDLMPqAk/VzWWGVIvqyI/AAAAAAABIUo/KWciBYUBv5ktvrof-UIXjTE6uUYBH3mKACLcB/s1600/i7jmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DrpfDLMPqAk/VzWWGVIvqyI/AAAAAAABIUo/KWciBYUBv5ktvrof-UIXjTE6uUYBH3mKACLcB/s1600/i7jmages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You hit a mental block\nwhen you lose your train of thought smack in the middle of your work. Confusion\nis said to be one of the main causes of mental blocks.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nyour mind is clear, thoughts flow in and out and you know exactly what needs to\nbe done. And, it gets done just the way you visualized it to.&nbsp;</span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are inspired\nby some unknown force that just propels you forward and then WHAM! You stop!!\nSomething threw up an uncertainty, a doubt and even fear.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People\nare not aware of the concept of \"Cell Memory\" and its impact on our\ndaily functioning.&nbsp;</span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-83Ce6QUDJmY/VzWWCYdk55I/AAAAAAABIUk/tZkTy0WmaT8euGzq7Sarav_CBIdKXT2GQCLcB/s1600/imad2ges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-83Ce6QUDJmY/VzWWCYdk55I/AAAAAAABIUk/tZkTy0WmaT8euGzq7Sarav_CBIdKXT2GQCLcB/s1600/imad2ges.png\" /></a></div>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the cells of our body contain a fluid known as cytoplasm\nwhere all of our experiences, both good and bad, are stored in an encoded form.\nSince all of our cells are connected, each individual cell has access to the\ninformation stored in other cells all over the body. Trauma or difficult\nmemories create turbidity in the cytoplasm, which in turn restricts the\ncommunication between the body's cells.</span>&nbsp;</span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-73mEkF5Fax8/VzWWTm-K9JI/AAAAAAABIUs/sPl8A-iR3YofBAa7j1ozmRdeMAVFwdUwACLcB/s1600/im3bages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-73mEkF5Fax8/VzWWTm-K9JI/AAAAAAABIUs/sPl8A-iR3YofBAa7j1ozmRdeMAVFwdUwACLcB/s1600/im3bages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we undergo a\ndifficult experience such as a failure or defeat, all of our cells remember the\nexperience and, when a similar situation occurs, the cells rebroadcast the\nprevious experience. This causes us to create a protective system which shuts\ndown our ability to deal with the present situation and, in effect, creates a\nmental block.&nbsp;</span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LB-CZWfnW7M/VzWXg9AF19I/AAAAAAABIU8/bBxclSv7LqcotNX8hUdIg_QGrT4KJjtogCLcB/s1600/image99s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LB-CZWfnW7M/VzWXg9AF19I/AAAAAAABIU8/bBxclSv7LqcotNX8hUdIg_QGrT4KJjtogCLcB/s1600/image99s.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The importing side does not receive enough energy from the rest\nof the body's cells and slows down.
