, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SANATANA DHARMA HAS PROPAGATED LAWS OF KARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE WHITE INVADER INJECTED POISON THAT HINDUS\nBELIEVE IN FATE ( DESTINY )<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AN INTELLIGENT MAN WILL NOTE THAT KARMA AND\nDESTINY ARE AT LOGGERHEADS.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CONSCIOUS MAN HAS BEEN GRANTED FREE WILL BY\nGOD<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ASTROLOGERS CLAIM THAT THEY CAN READ YOUR\nDESTINY.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I MUST NOW EXPOUND FURTHER -&nbsp; AND REVEAL WHAT IS THE STAND OF SANATANA\nDHARMA-&nbsp;&nbsp; SO THIS CHAPTER &nbsp;(25 ) WILL BE AN\nIMPORTANT ONE. .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AFTER ALL 99.999 % HINDUS HAVE BEEN FOOLED\nINTO BELIEVING BY THE WHITE INVADER , THAT THERE IS HEAVEN ( SWARG ) AND HELL (\nNARAK ) IN HINDUISM&nbsp; -- AKIN TO THE\nSINGLE HOLY BOOK / SINGLE MESSIAH RELIGIONS..</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALLOWING YOURSELF TO BE\nFOOLED IS BAD KARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PERSECUTION MANIA\nDRIVEN JEWS ARE STILL LYING AND MOANING HOW NAZIS KILLED SIX MILLION OF THEM .&nbsp; THIS IS BAD KARMA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KICHYrrdNFI/VzLQET9xCVI/AAAAAAABIOE/5EUvkl5uic0XpBnhGqt7CksMBw-qFR6nQCLcB/s1600/downloadr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KICHYrrdNFI/VzLQET9xCVI/AAAAAAABIOE/5EUvkl5uic0XpBnhGqt7CksMBw-qFR6nQCLcB/s400/downloadr.jpg\" width=\"257\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DOING NOTHING WHEN YOU\nCOULD PREVENT A BAD MAN DOING EXTREME HARM , TO HUMANS, FLORA , FAUNA IS BAD\nKARMA.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Willfully and knowingly\ntransgressing the LAWS OF THE UNIVERSE generates a lot more negative karma than\nunintentional or ignorant transgressions.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Jgad_mDsDiM/VzLPxOWMzAI/AAAAAAABIN4/3USSD85XvbcascFTsfhOdlUQKD2A6h97gCLcB/s1600/downleoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"361\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Jgad_mDsDiM/VzLPxOWMzAI/AAAAAAABIN4/3USSD85XvbcascFTsfhOdlUQKD2A6h97gCLcB/s400/downleoad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whenever you act with intention you\ncreate Karma. Actions are considered to be thoughts, emotions, words and deeds,\nand the motive, desire and intent behind each.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of Karma is\nto attain harmony.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although many of the\nmajor events in your life are astrologically predestined, , god has given you\nconsciousness and FREE WILL to mitigate the impact of the event, or to\ntranscend it entirely.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jc8fRK1difw/VzLNi2myvLI/AAAAAAABINQ/qdgXFych33w22bZZF5vnrXeitwjmd_cDQCLcB/s1600/downlosad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As &nbsp;a &nbsp;soul\nevolves , and he is on the verge of a Jivan Mukt ( moksha after death ) he is\nable to enjoy all the warmth and joy that life has to offer, but detaches from\nthe negativity by allowing it to flow through &nbsp;without affecting him.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Z-bsWbDG280/VzLP57sfQvI/AAAAAAABIOA/3mP_NQKzwFUZfB7gTh1p5uwfHObqjcX8ACLcB/s1600/dowcnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He will use his conscious\nfree will to respond to any situation. &nbsp;He will respond with positive emotions,\ncompassion and integrity, as he has learnt his karmic lessons.&nbsp;&nbsp; He lives harmoniously, &nbsp;and increases his vibrational rate.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-olOZ9Io4HQQ/VzLPVoefkgI/AAAAAAABINw/F6G3kQWgwZc2_5um5xdYtJCO2xrB1tplwCLcB/s1600/imadges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-olOZ9Io4HQQ/VzLPVoefkgI/AAAAAAABINw/F6G3kQWgwZc2_5um5xdYtJCO2xrB1tplwCLcB/s400/imadges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The seven astral layers accommodate different\nvibrations . &nbsp;A &nbsp;bad sinner soul , with huge karmic baggage ( part of it carried over from his previous lives on earth ) with lowest vibration will\nafter death be parked in the lowest astral layer- to be re-inducted back on\nearth to suffer .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a LIE created by the white invader that Brahmins enjoy\nand unskilled varna suffers .&nbsp; &nbsp;Happiness has nothing to do with varna of\nintellectuals, &nbsp;fighters, &nbsp;skilled class and unskilled class\u2014 only a foreign\nfunded idiot will refuse to understand this..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-W1z2DK5Hako/VzLQSMS16wI/AAAAAAABIOI/efcN3E0aDTkvEX5mPz95N9vorYFOATjbQCLcB/s1600/d44owcnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beliefs can be changed\nwhen you recognize those that are not working for you, and begin programming\nwhat will create success and harmony in your life. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are NOT an animal\u2014you are a conscious\nhuman with free will and the power to choose.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThe unlimited creative power of your mind, through dedication, awareness\nand training, can be the wisdom to rise above your Karma. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sanatana Dharma guides you in this aspect.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_LmMUegfB9Y/VzLOzWDoNeI/AAAAAAABINs/ZGey0CeGTTExtc4K8ma3RF_TE_m_LzwFwCLcB/s1600/imagges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within\nphysical and spiritual laws, you can manifest any reality you desire to\nexperience. In regard to changing your behavior, you must decide which\ndisharmonious behavior you want to eliminate. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then be aware that you don't have to change\nhow you feel about something to affect it, if you are willing to change what\nyou are doing.&nbsp;&nbsp; Hindus&nbsp;, when they want to even TURN OVER A NEW LEAF\n, do a vrat as a ritual. It is a thousand times more stronger than a bullshit\nnew year resolution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is about harnessing your meandering mind , which aids\nself focus to awaken your dormant powers within. Vrat has been given pride of\nplace in Sanatana Dharma .&nbsp; The white man\nhas always wondered what the hell is this penance and boon stuff you read in\nHindu puranas.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well there is a method to\nthe madness.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-F5PWlQEEnA8/VzLOibwKvII/AAAAAAABINk/ehvMmr48N1Ynsau31T6iNzgyrA2pHKTgwCLcB/s1600/imdages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-F5PWlQEEnA8/VzLOibwKvII/AAAAAAABINk/ehvMmr48N1Ynsau31T6iNzgyrA2pHKTgwCLcB/s400/imdages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sabarimala pilgrimage\nis a VRAT. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pilgrims have to\nobserve a 41 day VRAT or penance , before they go to the temple . There are no\ncheaters. Nobody monitors, &nbsp;as it is\nabout your own mind cleansing. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For 41\ndays the pilgrims abstain from sex, masturbation, alcohol, cigarettes,\nnon-vegetarian food, &nbsp;foul language ,\nlack of discipline and bad thoughts. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nhave to wear black cotton clothes, be barefooted ( in preparation for a steep\nforest mountain trail trek )&nbsp; and cannot\nshave or cut their hair, to remind them of their vrat and their\ndetermination&nbsp; keep away from worldly\nobjects of pleasure, and NOT to hurt the feelings of others. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have to bathe twice a day and visit the\nlocal temple to offer prayers. They sleep for 41 days on the floor without\npillows. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sabarimala pilgrimage is a great leveler..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nwas all about steadfastness in purpose. &nbsp;Nothing\ncan bar the way of such a determined soul--never mind that the whole world is\nagainst you..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It takes 21 days to\nbreak a bad habit . &nbsp;It is about cell\nmemory. &nbsp;Sabarimala affords double the\ntime. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vrat has a spiritual\ntinge and hence it sends a message to an onlooker about how resolute you are in\nachieving your goal,&nbsp; that you are firm\nas a rock and unwilling to surrender to destiny--that you plan to forge the\nhinges of your destiny on your own terms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non-violence, love, truth\n, unselfishness, sacrifice, grace, honesty form the warp and weft of this vrat\nfabric.&nbsp; Optimism , courage ,\nperseverance , contemplation and fortitude form the fibre.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TSs_Hdw3Tq0/VzLOCg846vI/AAAAAAABINc/7PGSZANxxKMgCi5EgAn9OXx8RWTfPu79QCLcB/s1600/e833d3764a36bfa11v282dac70c6d6422.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"293\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TSs_Hdw3Tq0/VzLOCg846vI/AAAAAAABINc/7PGSZANxxKMgCi5EgAn9OXx8RWTfPu79QCLcB/s400/e833d3764a36bfa11v282dac70c6d6422.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gratitude is inherent\nin Sanatana Dharma . &nbsp;At Sabarimala on\nthe last day of the vrat pilgrims are filled with a sense of gratitude.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When large numbers of conscious humans with &nbsp;similar vibration are gathered for a shared\npurpose, their combined energy directed to the attainment of that purpose is &nbsp;resonated multifold. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This esoteric awareness and mass consciousness\ncontributes to world peace .&nbsp; This is\nQuantim physics and the shallow white mind will NOT understand this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YI43FAAFxho/VzLN4d14x9I/AAAAAAABINY/45N_t8I1Tkcro2XEiInTz2flIN3SIZcpACLcB/s1600/downdload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; When the laws are transgressed, suffering will result. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of karma is\nto attain harmony and balance. The universe is perfectly balanced. When you are\nin harmony you are in balance. There is nothing permanent without harmony as\nharmony can be considered another name for Love.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Once you have evolved to the\nposition of living an entire life in harmony, you are free from the wheel of\nreincarnation. You have got Moksha. You soul ( YOU ) has shot up to the seventh\nastral layer or Vaikunta and merged with brahmAn\u2014and you are now god.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Until you have resolved\nyour Karma and fulfilled your Dharma, you will continue to reincarnate into\nsequential lifetimes upon the earth. &nbsp;You\ndecide what lessons you need to learn for each life experience.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whenever you\nact with intention (actions being your thoughts, emotions, words and deeds and\nthe motive, intent and desire) you create karma.&nbsp; &nbsp;Dis-harmonious acts, are rooted in fear-based\nemotions, must be eventually balanced and resolved. When you can live a life of\nperfect harmony, liberation will follow. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The choice is yours. If you give love\n, fairness with grace , you will receive the same in return. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BdxOq1K5FX4/VzLZKAA_1sI/AAAAAAABIOg/LUh9JUKhY8Eddmdq9LLLq313GFSwSXVhACLcB/s1600/imrages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BdxOq1K5FX4/VzLZKAA_1sI/AAAAAAABIOg/LUh9JUKhY8Eddmdq9LLLq313GFSwSXVhACLcB/s400/imrages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Promote what you love instead of kicking what\nyou hate. You cant live a positive life with a negative mind. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negativity , ego and greed steals your happiness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tIJPk6uAIjY/VzLY4tv2NWI/AAAAAAABIOc/fe-z96e3Pzku2paNXoZAkyGwNvEeyzCawCLcB/s1600/downlofad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tIJPk6uAIjY/VzLY4tv2NWI/AAAAAAABIOc/fe-z96e3Pzku2paNXoZAkyGwNvEeyzCawCLcB/s400/downlofad.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No matter how much you\nresist, there are some things or situations which cannot be changed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Change what you can change, but have the\nwisdom to accept unalterable situations as they are without wasting mental or\nphysical energy attempting to change what you cannot change.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Out of this\nacceptance comes involved detachment--the ability to enjoy all the positive\naspects of life, but to allow the negativity to flow through you without\nresistance and without affecting you.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life is all about paying a bad hand well\nand with grace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">Nothing\nin the Universe can harm you except your own attitude. &nbsp;God has made you conscious , with free will\nand empowered you with choice<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">You,\nand you alone choose the attitude with what you will respond. &nbsp;Your attitude can worsen or lighten any event.\nNo two people respond to the same situation in the same way. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">Every earthly incarnation includes traumatic\nexperiences, and the better you understand the workings of Karma, the more\nlikely you will be to put events in a spiritual perspective. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">This\nis the magic of Sanatana Dharma steeped in spiritually and not graceless MAAR\nDOH KAAFIR INFIDEL SAALE KOH type graceless dogma.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">No Hindu will rush out of temples after\nFriday prayers and kill people.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">No Hindu\ngoes on a pilgrimage to throw stones at some TRINITY pillar depicting devil with\nfaces showing extreme negativity</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only a mind dipped in\nSanatana Dharma can be a change manager. &nbsp;&nbsp;This is why white men come to India for life\nmanagement which involves CHANGE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Effective life\nmanagement means creating an equilibrium-- Life is a combination or physical,\nintellectual and spiritual aspects. &nbsp;&nbsp;When you enter a spiritual life , you can see\na situation as it is from different angles and not as you want.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Belief in predetermined\ndestiny is the only refuge of weak minds clinging on to single messiah religions\nHinduism teaches you to take responsibility for your failures. &nbsp;&nbsp;Sanatana Dharma teaches you to be IN THE\nMOMENT . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOW is food on the\ntable\u2014the past is SHIT in the septic tank and the future is unknown and not\nworth worrying about endlessly.&nbsp; Fear of\nthe future tends to produce the things we are afraid of.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white man who came\nto India for mental solace , left with the greatest wealth which could be given\nonly by India -- contentment with little.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He now knows deep within his heart that REAL &nbsp;richness consists of a singing heart, not his\nown jet plane. He now does NOT feel the need to impress others or catch up with\nthe Joneses. He now wants to be an ORIGINAL , not a plastic imitation . He now\ndares to be himself.&nbsp; He knows from now\non he will NOT quit trying .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have written two\nposts on CHANGE as I worked as a CHANGE MANAGER at sea.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shallow western\nmind , cannot descend into the depths of what I have written ( for NOT TOO BRIGHT laymen ). &nbsp; They can do only\nsurface snorkeling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/domino-effect-in-change-management-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/domino-effect-in-change-management-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hindus have never been afraid of God \u2014they love\ntheir gods. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Although bad karmic baggage\nusually results in suffering it is not a punishment for punishment's sake; nor\nis it divine retribution. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Karma is\nsimply an opportunity to make good by CHANGE \u2013 &nbsp;it neither punishes nor rewards; it simply\nguides. &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">The law of karma is not the\ncause of suffering, &nbsp;it is merely the\nCHANGE agent.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is self-balancing\ndivine justice; it is 100% fair and absolutely infallible.&nbsp; It doesn't matter if a criminal seems to GET\nAWAY WITH IT \u2013 see Jew Rothschild has got away with it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no getting\naway with it \u2013 karma will eventually catch up with him&nbsp; -if not in this life then the next life <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cant have\nhalfwits designing a bridge. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cant\nhave a hospital sweeper </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">crying foul that\nshe is not being allowed to brain surgery. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cant have a cook crying that he is NOT\nbeing allowed to command a ship. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; The\nhigher self keeps track and a log of these deceit , which only you know and\nnobody else .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is not some\nmysterious metaphysical, or supernatural, force or power that somehow comes\nback to haunt you.&nbsp; &nbsp;Karma is simply what we do in a conscious\nmanner .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bad deeds and\nthoughts&nbsp; yield spoiled fruits, called\npaap, and good deeds bring forth sweet fruits, called punya. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Destiny is commonly\nregarded as fate- but both are as different as chalk and cheese.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fate is usually seen as\n\"set in stone\" and often has negative connotations.&nbsp;&nbsp; Fate is an agent that predetermines and\norders the course of events. It means that events are \"meant to be\"\nand are set in motion by an external force or intelligence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Destiny is more of a\nlikely outcome and often has a positive feel, e.g. he is destined to become a\nstar.&nbsp;&nbsp; Destiny guides us towards a\nspecific goal, but without our wilful participation we will not achieve our\ndestiny.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma we forge the hinges of our destiny on our own terms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are in control of\nour destiny but have no control over our fate.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Destiny cannot be forced on us; if we are\nforced then it is our fate. &nbsp;Fate is\ndetermined by GOD who has overriding powers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By assuming the\nposition of Shambhavi Mudra a Yogi should see the self.&nbsp; When the Brahma is seen in the form of a dot\nhe should fix his mind on it and nowhere else.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nA Yogi who knows the science of Shambhavi he himself becomes Brahma&nbsp; and none else.&nbsp;&nbsp; I, Lord Maheshwara (Shiva), am telling this\nagain and again that this is truth.-&nbsp;&nbsp;\nGherand Samhita ( Hatha Yoga ) 5000 BC Negative thoughts&nbsp; create negative feelings and hence stress and\nillness.&nbsp; Our inner voice evaluates,\njudges, compares and worries.&nbsp;&nbsp; Most\npeople live with such a tormentor in their head draining them of energy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Silencing the body is\neasy, but silencing the mind is difficult in this modern age.&nbsp; Silencing is about grace, harmony and\ntranquility. Exhaustion or being drugged out of your mind is NOT tranquility. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the modern age\npeople get stressed, and they need to still the mind--the chattering monkey,\nwhich remains entangled in the past and the imagined future, but never in the\npresent.&nbsp; A person stops thinking either\nwhen he is dead or when he has realised.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When your ego powered\nmind is chattering like a monkey or the angry sea, you miss the truth.&nbsp; Truth can be communicated only in silence.\nFor this deep silence you need to have harmony between the mind, body and spirit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shambhavi Mudra\nsynchronizes the 2 brain lobes to create inner balance.&nbsp; When the left and right sides of the brain ,\nare in balance the human DNA generates scalar waves.&nbsp;&nbsp; When two energy fields exactly cancel out each\nother the 5th dimension is accessed which is all pervasive and has the power to\nheal.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is now in touch with\nhigher levels or higher dimensions of functioning.&nbsp; He will have&nbsp;\nemotional stability and level headed approach to problems which confront\nhim.&nbsp; This is a fast,&nbsp; amazingly simple, drug-free method of\nstimulating neural pathways in the brain.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>All right, now let me\ntalk about practicals.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Wear loose fitting\nclothes which does NOT constrict you in any way.&nbsp; Sit on a smooth surface , in a comfortable\nmeditation pose .&nbsp; This is to eliminate\nsense of touch / feeling.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Put your thumbs in your\nears and palm your eyes with your middle and fourth finger.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;
