font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>You will feel intense\nvibrations inside your ear \u2014 the cochlea spiral passage resonated to 7.83 hertz\n( OM frequeny and also earth\u2019s heart beat frequency ) and your brain produces\nNITRIC OXIDE .<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Now select a silent,\nNOT so bright, cool place space, where there are NO strong smells&nbsp; .&nbsp; This\nis to prevent any input of sense of hearing/sense/ smell .&nbsp;&nbsp; If you can even feel the clock ticking-put&nbsp; ear plugs \u2013only if you are a beginner.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Keep the head,&nbsp; shoulder and spine upright and straight.&nbsp; And place the hands on the knees in (Jyana\nMudra).&nbsp; Upright is to keep the spirit level\nin the inner ear at equilibrium so that your brain lobes get balanced and\nsynchronized.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Shut your eyes.&nbsp;&nbsp; No need to be cockeyed .<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Simply be mindful of\nin-and-out diaphrgmic breathing where you stomach rises and falls.&nbsp;&nbsp; You may feel that your breathing is too\nshort, too long, too gentle or too heavy.&nbsp;\nDo not try to control it.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When you become\ndistracted, gently refocus your attention on your breathing.&nbsp;&nbsp; Restrict your attention to what is occurring\nin the immediate present moment.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When you feel you have\nblocked out all ahara ( feed ) via your senses of smell, sight, hearing and\nfeeling , take a deep breath where you fill your lungs only 90 % and hold it\n.&nbsp; Put your tongue on your upper palate\nand tickle it for just 2 seconds and stop.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Now start exhaling VERY\nslowly while keeping the tip of your tongue stationary on the roof of your\nmouth.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Don't think about the\npast or future\u2014 don't think about anything at all.&nbsp; Let go of worries, concerns , and\nmemories.&nbsp; Empty your mind of everything.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>To be frank you cannot\nthink even if if want to \u2014I can challenge you on this .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Do this 3 more times\n.&nbsp; This means you inhale again , hold\nyour breath and do the same thing.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Later on you do NOT\nneed to hold your breath and you can do this procedure for LONGER TIME ,\nwithout ear plugs and your eyes open against a blank far away wall of your\nroom.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Do this exercise 5\ntimes a day.&nbsp; You must NOT have a full\nstomach.&nbsp;&nbsp; You can drink some water\nbefore you do this.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This is it !<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-hansi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\u2014</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">so\nsimple so fast , right?<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The difference between\nprayer and meditation is that the former is a petition to God, and the other is\na detached observation of one's own mind, and its processes, after squelching\nthe 5 senses .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aim of every form\nof meditation is to still the mind, or you cant purify it and get rid of deep\nrooted negativities , which affect your health.&nbsp;&nbsp; If you do meditation the right way , you\nmind will NOT control you \u2013rather you will control your mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For a layman-- you are\nstressed when your hands feel cold, your heart rate, breathing, and muscle\ntension increases.&nbsp; The result is that\nyour immune system goes for a toss and you get depressed or burnt out..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Depression is a weird\nfeeling of loss .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Healing is NOT a\nphysical process, rather it is mental.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nModern medicine is all about destroying the symptoms .&nbsp; ( never mind a pancreas is doing its job\nfaithfully\u2014hey, remove it ).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind can wipe mistakes\noff the DNA blueprint and destroy any disease that has disturbed the\ndesign.&nbsp; DNA's ability to repair itself\nis affected adversely when a person is in depression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation experiences\nsilence, and is devoid of drives, wishes, fears , thoughts and emotions.\nAfterwards when the mind returns to its usual level of consciousness, it has\nacquired some freedom to move..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grace and peace are the\nhallmarks of a healthy non-delusional mind in a healthy body.. The happiness is\nstable.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do Shambhavi Mudra in a\ngrateful frame of mind , to thank the universal laws, which sustain this\nplanet.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For people who do NOT\nknow what the amygdala is\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All sensory data must\nfirst pass through the amygdala for emotional analyzing, before being sent off\nto the cerebral cortex for processing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amygdala has in\nturn been implicated in nearly every psychiatric disorder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Children with anxiety\ndisorders tend to have a smaller left amygdala. Amygdala uses more blood than\nany other part of the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We humans are conscious\ncreatures because we have more amygdala nuclei.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are functional\ndifferences between the right and left amygdala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electrical stimulations\nof the RIGHT amygdala induce negative emotions, especially fear and sadness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amygdala is the center\nfor emotional intelligence, as all sensory data must first pass through the\namygdala for emotional analyzing, before being sent off to the cerebral cortex\nfor processing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do Shambhavi mudra to\novercome emotional and mental blocks that create negativity and spoil your\nsocial relationships. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do it to boost your\nimmune system and to improve&nbsp; health and\nhappiness by allowing the body\u2019s natural intelligence to do whatever it takes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soccer club Arsenal had\na genius striker named Dennis Bergkamp. &nbsp;He\nhad a morbid fear of heights and he would never take a flight. &nbsp;So this star player could not play in AWAY\ngames.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Due\nto his fear of flying, Bergkamp has been affectionately nicknamed the\n\"Non-Flying Dutchman\" by Arsenal supporters. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If he had come to India\nhe would have been cured . It would be a simple case of PAST LIFE REGRESSION and\ndissolving the past life samskara .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Probably in his previous life he fell down\nfrom a height to death . &nbsp;This is a\nsamskara within him carried over by his soul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma past\nexperiences are known as samskara and, if you are aware of them you can get rid\nof them by simply witnessing them.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you meditate you\nwitness yourself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/vipassana-meditation-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/vipassana-meditation-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If some samskaras come\nup to the level of the conscious mind during meditation and you re-live the\npain and emotion, it is possible to get rid of it completely. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The problem lies in\nknowing what our samskaras are, because generally we believe that our desires,\nambitions, likes and dislikes are samskaras when actually they are not. &nbsp;&nbsp;They are patterns or modifications of mind-\nvrittis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samskaras go much\ndeeper than that. They belong to the realm of the unconscious mind and\nconstruct the human personality. &nbsp;Without\nsamskaras we would not be classified as human beings. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we try to understand\npersonality in general, we will find that even animals have personalities. &nbsp;They have samskaras which go beyond the\ninstinctive aspect of animal consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Aof_esjEJYI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Aof_esjEJYI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The literal meaning of\nsamskara in Malayalam and Sanskrit is, 'akara' meaning &nbsp;'form', or 'personality', and 'sam' meaning\n'the totality of'.&nbsp; &nbsp;When we deal with the\naspect of consciousness, energy and personality in each object or being, we are\ntalking about the samskara.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matter\ncontains energy, energy has movement and within that movement there is some\nunderlying conscious awareness which maintains it in its orbit in the field. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">That is what we call\nsamskara.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samskaras are related\nto karma too. Consciousness &nbsp;has been\ngiven certain impressions which we can call experiences of the deeper self. We\nbecome aware of these impressions when we practise deep meditation, not\nsuperficial meditation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we transcend the conscious, subconscious and\nunconscious experiences of personality it is possible that initially we become\naware of certain traumas that have taken place in our early childhood, and of\nwhich we did not have any conscious recollection. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A human being is not a\ntotally different entity than its experiences in its previous lives. &nbsp;YOU are the soul within your mortal coil. &nbsp;The soul is indestructible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past life issues that\ncarry into the current life are the result of karma. Samskara is intrinsically\ntied into the laws of karma that govern the cycle of rebirth. Keeping in mind\nthe nature of traumatic imprints and how they cause continual recreation of the\noriginal traumatic event, one can also look at samskaras as trauma imprints\nre-manifested from life to life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the essence of\nkarma to bring forth the actions of the past to the present. The inability to\ncomplete even the simple action of \u2018fight or flight\u2019 as a result of trauma in\npast lives is also carried into the present as the soul continues to create\nfrom its own wounded place in an ongoing effort to heal. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once my Dutch Chief Engineer told me, - a guy\nhalf his size put his hand in his pocket removed his wallet and walked away ,\nand he could not react or even lift his hand , though he knew what was happening . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of us are born\nalready with some degree of &nbsp;Post\ntraumatic stress disorder (PTSD) . This is &nbsp;a debilitating condition that often follows a\nterrifying physical, life threatening, or perceived as life-threatening, event .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each Samskara has\ninherent in it the capacity to once again recreate that very experience which\noriginally caused it. &nbsp;Our past life\nphysical, emotional and mental bodies are not wiped clean in-between lives, but\ncontinue to recreate themselves in each incarnation through the subtle bodies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This transmission of past physical, emotional and mental wounds constitute a\nlarge part of what we are meant to heal in our present lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today western past life\nregression therapists come to India, to understand their subject.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do not allow past life\nsamskaras restrain your in your present life. &nbsp;There are people who are severely handicapped\nby obsessive compulsive disorders. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me deal with the\ncommonplace hoarding mentality.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people fill their\nhouses with junk, not even throwing away an old torn pair of shoes. Probably in\ntheir previous life they died in prison or died of famine. &nbsp;Hoarding is an effort to manage the anxiety\nraised by obsessive doubts.&nbsp; Hoarders\nexperience intense anxiety when they even think of discarding what most others\nview as useless objects.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hoarders are suspicious of other people touching\npossessions , as they feel it may be thrown away , when they are not around. &nbsp;They invent traps and usually fall in the trap\nand die. People with personality disorders , generally, blame others for their\nproblems. &nbsp;People with OCD need to deal\nwith their samskaras - wipe out the blue print and insert a healthy one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OCD in this lifetime is\nusually directly traceable back to a past life where the disempowering trait or\nbehavior was created. The spiritual purpose of OCD is to force the individual\nto seek the answer to why they are now being \"plagued\" with thoughts\nand behaviors that they have no control over.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The obsession to do or not do a\nparticular thing or act in a certain way was created in a past lifetime The\nrelated compulsion does not stop until the past life is healed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS CANNOT BE\nDONE BY A MAD MAN NAMED SIGMUND FRUED WHO WILL ASK YOU IF YOUR MOTHER HAD SEX\nWITH YOU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The compulsion is like\nhaving a knife stuck in your groin. No matter how much you bandage the wound,\nyou will not heal it until the knife is pulled out. The past goes right on\nsending the pain of compulsion which goes on feeding the undesirable present\nday obsession until the pain is stopped at it's source.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the life lesson\nassociated with OCD has been fully learned and \"absorbed\" into the\nindividual's body-mind, the \"disempowering\" trait or behavior will\nfall away. &nbsp;&nbsp;Often all that is needed is\nfor the individual to confront the past life where the OCD originated.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Going\nback to the past becomes the means of freeing those \"afflicted with\nOCD\" from being condemned to repeat those lessons in the future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have OCD and you\ncannot trace the disempowering behavior to an incident in this life, then it\nmost likely comes from one or more of your past lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Porn star Sunny Leone\nneeds to wash her feet ( charan kamal ) every 20 minutes.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Figure it out yourself .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">SOME PHOBIAS </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Acrophobia \u2013 fear of\nheights<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Agraphobia \u2013 fear of\nsexual abuse<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aichmophobia \u2013 fear of\nsharp or pointed objects <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Algophobia \u2013 fear of\npain<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anthropophobia \u2013 fear\nof people <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aquaphobia \u2013 fear of\nwater. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atelophobia \u2013 fear of\nnot being good enough<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atychiphobia, kakorrhaphiophobia\n\u2013 fear of failure<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Autophobia \u2013 fear of\nisolation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aviophobia,\naviatophobia \u2013 fear of flying<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bathmophobia \u2013 fear of\nstairs or slopes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Claustrophobia \u2013 fear\nof having no escape<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coimetrophobia \u2013 fear\nof cemeteries<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cyberphobia \u2013 fear of\nlearning new technologies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Decidophobia \u2013 fear of\nmaking decisions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dementophobia - fear of\nbecoming insane<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Demonophobia,\ndaemonophobia \u2013 fear of demons<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erotophobia \u2013 fear of\nsexual love or sexual abuse<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gelotophobia \u2013 fear of\nbeing laughed at<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glossophobia \u2013 fear of\nspeaking in public <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Harpaxophobia \u2013 fear of\nbeing robbed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hemophobia, haemophobia\n\u2013 fear of blood<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mysophobia \u2013 fear of\ngerms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nostophobia, ecophobia\n\u2013 fear of returning home<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyctophobia fear of\ndarkness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panphobia \u2013 fear of\neverything an unknown cause<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peniaphobia \u2013 fear of\npoverty<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Philophobia \u2013 fear of\nlove<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thanatophobia \u2013 fear of\ndying<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tokophobia \u2013 fear of\nchildbirth or pregnancy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Toxiphobia \u2013 fear of\nbeing poisoned<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Xenophobia \u2013 fear of\nstrangers, foreigners, or aliens</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ophidiophobia \u2013\nfear/dislike of snakes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beside the repetitive\nnature of trauma, the thoughts, feelings and attitudes we have formed, dictate\nhow our future is created from the present and past.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this present life we\nhave certain attitudes and imprints within our DNA because of past life traumas.\n&nbsp;The healing of samskaras and imprints is\nthe aim of Past Life Therapy (PLT). &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PLT cannot be done by a\nperson who does NOT believe in Karma and re-birth theory of Hinduism. &nbsp;The beliefs of a doctor are important to cure\nthe patient .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our past life selves\nlive within us today as sub-personalities. We feel their emotions; manifest\ntheir talents; think their thoughts; are limited by their fears. We are unaware\nthey exist within us. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most problematic\npast lives for us today, are the ones that have unresolved trauma or UNFINISHED\nBUSINESS. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In PLT these problematic inner characters are\nbrought to the forefront of consciousness and worked with to bring resolution ,\nso that they do NOT play havoc and affect the quality of&nbsp; the current life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4093553763592258806\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_77M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_15.html?showComment=1516063668705#c4093553763592258806\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 16, 2018 at 6:17 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_77MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE CALLED ME UP OVER THE CNN TV PROGRAM --WHERE IRANIAN JEWESS CHRISTIANE AMANPOUR WAS DISCUSSING LEORNARDO DA VINCI WITH JEW WALTER ISAACSON, THE EX-CHAIRMAN OF CNN.<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID , EVEN IF LEONARDO DA VINCI STOLE 100% FROM TECHNICAL BOOKS OF THE GREAT LIBRARY AT CORDOBA SPAIN.. HE WAS A GREAT ARTIST<br />\n<br />\nBALLS<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN, I HAVE SEEN THEM ALL--I HAVE BEEN ALL OVER ITALY AND SPAIN --AND SO HAS MY ELDER SON<br />\n<br />\nEVERY HEARD OF BERNINI ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/bernini-unsung-genius-bernini-versus.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLET US ASSUME FR ARGUMENTs SAKE THAT LEONARDO DA VINCI DID NOT STEAL ( ONLY IMAGINE )<br />\n<br />\nHIS TECHNICAL DRAWINGS ARE NOTHING --<br />\n<br />\nI WAS THE FIRST TO SAY THAT PYRAMIDS IN EGYPT WERE BUILT BY WATER FLOTATION POWER--LIKE SHIPS IN THE PANAMA CANAL--THIS IS ON RECORD<br />\n<br />\nLET ME EASE IN SOME MORE<br />\n<br />\nPYRAMIDS WERE BUILT BY KERALA SAGES<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHOW DID THEY GET THE PRECISION--THIS IS BEING TOLD FOR THE FIRST TIME ON THE PLANET--SO HARK<br />\n<br />\nPRECESSION INSTRUMENTS LIKE SPHEROMETER , SCREW GUAGE , VERNIER CALIPERS ETC WERE ALL LIFTED FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY<br />\n<br />\nTOTAL INTERNAL REFLECTION WAS AN INDIAN INVENTION..<br />\n<br />\nAncient Indians were the masters of Total Internal Reflection, and faster than light soliton waves. Today we see it used in fibre optics. Total Internal Reflection was a science written down in our Vedic texts 7000 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nTill the white man discovered diamonds in South Africa in 1886, diamonds were available only in India. In 1726 the white man had found some\" low quality\" diamonds on a Brazilian river bed. The next discovery was in 1906 in Congo.<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT GET THE PRECISION WITHOUT MEASURING INSTRUMENTS AND KNOWLEDGE OF CALCULUS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nA PYRAMID ( ON A MACRO SCALE ) HAS TO BE FIRST DRAWN IN SMALL SCALE ON PAPER--INCORPORATING THE GOLDEN MEAN OF 1.618 AND THE GOLDEN ANGLE OF 51 DEGREES, 49 MINUTES AND 38.25 SECONDS<br />\n<br />\nA DIAMOND ( ON MICRO SCALE ) HAS TO BE ENLARGED ON PAPER<br />\n<br />\nRATNA PARIKSHA was a 5000 year old Sanskrit text on optics which dealt with critical angles, high refractive index of diamond ( 2.4 ) and low critical angle ( 24 deg ) and total internal reflection physics and the art of cutting diamonds, to make it spit fire.. Precision was 100% required as a poor cut brought bad luck<br />\n<br />\nThe EYE OF BRAHMA ( colour changing diamond at middle eye ) would become opaque as soon as it was gouged out and stolen --and it brought a terrible curse. So as soon as the white an stole it , the first thing he did was to cut the diamond ( poorly ).<br />\n<br />\nThis was done even with SYAMANTAKAM ( Kohinoor). Despite cutting it brought bad luck. The queen consulted Indian astrologers and started the BEEF EATER and BLACK RAVEN thingy -it continues even today at the Tower of London<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Sun is low in the sky the rainbow appears relatively high; as the Sun rises higher, the rainbow appears lower in the sky, maintaining the critical 40\u00b0- to 42\u00b0-angle. When the Sun is more than 42\u00b0 above the horizon no rainbow can be seen because the required angle passes over the head of the observer.<br />\n<br />\nThe secondary rainbow has an angular radius of about 50\u00b0 and hence is seen outside of the primary bow. Higher-order rainbows, resulting from three or more internal reflections, are exceedingly weak but can be observed in Kerala in the months of August.<br />\n<br />\nAll this is written in our ancient texts.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_77BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Modern glass mirrors does not reverse images from left to right, it reverses them from front to back relative to the front of the mirror.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
